Imperiali 77, 36100 VICENZA, Italy",Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Paolo Cordaro,"Business networks, networking, and Internet 2.0 are expected to change the paradigms of the Italian and European SMEs company in the near future.ÿA transition from Web 1.0, where companies propose theirÿproduct-service, to web 2.0, where information is exchanged, processed andÿmade accessible intelligently and simultaneously between customer and a vendors network (andÿvice-versa) to achieve competitive advantages, both in terms of cost andÿservice.
In a nut shell,ÿsuccess isÿgetting increasingly dependent on how quickly and consistently you meet market needs.

The project ? B2B Networking Engine ? is aÿnew ways to organize, build and also manage products / machines shop in the sub-contractingÿmanufacturing.ÿUsing the web and the Fiware infrastructure to create organizational models ""2.0"", where different companies, belonging to the same industrial district, cooperate together and are integrated in order to offer next-generation services. ÿA web platform ""innovative and advanced"" and capable of generating ""added value"" and increasing the SMEs competitivity.ÿ

A web platforms able to manage and process all the information actually don?t generate value added along the custom parts supply chain: what about the time spent today for locate a machine shop, deal with multiple emails or faxes to transmit drawings to the machine shop, discuss the design with a machinist, sift through price quotations, andÿso on. On the other way round, how does it cost (time spent) to manage, analize and provide the best quotation and delivery date ?

We are focusing on mechanical parts, CNC turning or milling manufacturing, but scalable to other sectors: all the informations (CAD drw, delivery request, qty and techincal specifications) will be processed in real time to provide information such as quotes, promised delivery date, feasibility, monitoringÿresources fully based on a vendors networks.ÿ

This project would be a new and innovative approach to get custom parts: it's like to evolve from a wooden abacus (today) and an eletronic calculator (tomorrow).

Project wrap-up:
- write-off all the no-value added operations
- to get a effective and JIT quote for every custom parts (we are thinking not only to the ""mechanical world"" but potentially to all the custom parts with a CAD drw)
- to create a innovative IT framework as first step to develop other applications such as on mobile
- make a new ERP integration with the SME / sub-contractor.

Goals:
- a users Interface may open new cost effective opportunity for End Users and the SME
- a Business Network 2.0 where the SME may have automated integration with new potential worldwide users without adding cost

- a ecosystem of services where mechanics sub-contractors may demand many activity (drw validation, cost and ERP analysis ) to a external platform and achieve new level of competivness and cost reduction.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

102,CREA102,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Social IT srl - software and consulting,LE(stre)SS : an application for the stress management and the quality of social life,"Via Kufstein 5, 38121 Trento (TN), Italy",Consumer health/wellness,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Social IT srl and InMente cooperativa sociale as partners,"Our idea consists in an application/website, called LE(stre)SS, for the assessment of stress level and proposal of practical and effective solutions through an innovative ?social? concept.

The stress condition has a significant presence and impact on modern western society, and it has spread more and more due to the recent economic changes in Europe, which have caused an increase in the job insecurity perception. Stress has negative consequences on quality of life, on productivity at work and ultimately on health conditions, also resulting in extra expenses for companies and for healthcare associations.

Our idea is to propose a technological solution to this problem, helping to recognize the stress condition, performing an assessment and proposing practical solutions. This is realized through a friendly and usable application for the stress assessment, created thanks to the psychological ÿexpertise of our partner, InMente. In particular, the assessment will be performed in the dimension of gamification, transforming the tests into both a game and a ?social network?.

Actually, our idea is not a conventional social network, but a ?social accelerator?, which is a truly innovative concept, called YOut. YOut aims at finding the solution ?outside the cycle? of stress, which consists in a problem repeating itself indefinitely in the person's mind. Our application creates the conditions for the introduction of an external element interrupting the vicious cycle, pushing the user to ?go out?, physically and metaphorically, and find a solution of the problem outside of his/her own mind.

Our idea of ?social? is then quite different from that associated with the totality of the existing social networks. In fact, the objective is not to increase the number of contacts, or to connect people who live physically far from each other: the goal is instead cultivating our few ?close? relationships (in both geographic and mental terms), by facilitating ?real?, face?to-face meetings, which can be difficult to organize, while living a busy and stressful life.ÿOr, also, it could be a mean to get to know people better, in order to start to build close relationships. The application actually facilitates the ?match? between the needs of people who are alone, and would simply like to have an instant, overall view on those of their friends who are available, here and now, to ?really? meet them.ÿ

Other means of ?social? solutions would be invitations to events, conferences, courses, activities available in the user?s area of residence, and based on the user?s profile. In addition, a list of professionals and services dedicated to psychological help is proposed, available in user?s area of residence.ÿ
ÿ

As far as we know, no such application currently exists, since the conventional social networks focus on ""virtual"" life and communication, and the existing stress assessment applications consist in a mere palliative approach to the symptoms with no proposal of possible solutions.
ÿ

Our customers would be individual users, companies, companies organizing events and activities interested into the anonym localized data collected, healthcare associations and associations offering psychological help. At the same time, these customers could be our distributors and/or sponsors.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

103,CREA103,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,SAIDEA srl,FREEMS - Free Management Software,"via Kufstein, 5, 38121 Trento, Italy",Other,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Mara Rinner,"Saidea is a company that produces computer services arising intelligence and inventiveness of its staff. It has a network of direct sales made ??by employees and business partners disseminated to the Italian country. One of our most mature software lines, which has had much success, is aimed at the market of social and computerises social cooperatives, associations, foundations, etc.

For the characteristics of the products that we develop and the high costs associated with traditional commercial activities, we cannot reach the market segment represented by smaller organizations (small in terms of incomes but still involving a considerable number of staff, such as for example volunteers).

To attack this market we decided to change the business model. We want to create a software for small non-profit organizations delivered as a SAAS (software as a service) and completely free. The revenues for the maintenance and development of the system will come from some main sponsors that will promote their products and services to all users of the platform, we will create a dedicated website to the sponsors, eventually with an associated marketplace.
The field that we have identified is that of volunteer management, with a system that manages recruitment, selection, communications, activities? planning, attendance check and training.

The field of volunteering is particularly suited to the business model that we intend to apply because the target is sufficiently large and homogeneous to be able to, on the one hand , arouse interest in certain categories of sponsors (eg . Banks, insurance companies, telephone companies, etc. ) and, second, to be used for pay per click campaigns. We also believe that the conditions exist to create a ""viral"" effect that allows a rapid propagation of the application.

To these considerations we can also add the fact that organizations that engage volunteers are generally poorly computerized despite of the large number of personal data that they manage and despite of their need of an advanced management of communications (newsletters, sms, facebook, phone calls, etc.).
The platform will allow the volunteers to sign up and set their time availability, and view requests from voluntary organizations (there will be a multi-parameter search engine).
Organizations, after signing in, will publish requests for volonteers and search for other organizations in the database.

The system, after the first phase of association between volunteer and organization, will be used as management software, this means that it will be possible within the organizations? reserved area to use all functions including:
activities planning,
files sharing,
add data to the volunteer card,
make requests for volunteers,
post events,
manage communications, and so on.

Each volunteer will be associated with multiple organizations, within the reserved area it will be possilbe to view the status of each volunteer report and interact with the organizations. A rating system will allow organizations and volunteers to evaluate each other on a set of parameters that will be defined during the analysis (some of these are: the availability, frequency, personal skills , etc.).
The functions that will be implemented to make the service attractive are the following:
Database management,
Fund raising,
Rating,
volunteers attendance,
Task Management and Planning,
File sharing
Communication Management.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

104,CREA104,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,DataMind Srl,Easy USE,"Via Linussio, 51, c/o Parco Scientifico e Tecnologico ""L. Danieli"", Edificio A, 33100 Udine, Italy",HUMAN HEALTH AND SOCIAL WORK ACTIVITIES,B2B,4,9,YES,IN,Sebastian Raducci,"All pregnant women have a morphology ultrasound as a routine part of their antenatal (pregnancy) care. This ultrasound will check that the baby is growing and developing normally. It is performed in the middle part of the pregnancy, usually between 18 and 20 weeks gestation, but it can be repeated between 24 and 34 weeks gestation. It is a detailed scan of the developing baby. After all routine measurements are completed, and provided that the baby is healthy and growing well, 3D/4D pictures of the baby (e.g. face, full body) are done.

All parents enjoy the bonding experienced when they see their baby on 3D/4D imaging. They show them to their relatives, they show them to their friends, they even share them on social networks. They are the first pictures of their baby.

Easy USE"" (USE stands for UltraSound Enhancement) is an innovative cloud service that processes this ultrasound data to enhance the images, increasing their resolution, making them much more detailed and providing parents with beautiful 3D/4D images of their baby.
ÿ

Usually (when the baby is healthy) a DVD containing images/videos of the baby is released to the parents, so they can watch it again at home and share it with friends and relatives. The images/videos contained in these DVDs are raw data, because they were made to check that the baby is growing normally. They are intended for medical use during the scan, but after the scan the DVDs are seen by people (which aren't doctors) on their TVs or PCs.

Easy USE"" offers a way to significantly improve the beauty of this images/videos, acting on resolution and increasing the level of detail automatically. In this way parents, friends and relatives can get a much better experience looking at this enhanced images/videos. This completely new approach is possible making use of DataMind image processing experience and innovative algorithms developed through years in medical, photography and industrial fields.",Tech provider,,0,0,0,0,0,,Software,Authoring and Publishing Software,Applications,Content Applications,1,X,www.datamind.biz,0,50000,datamind.biz

105,CREA105,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Lal? SRL,MAKE VCV,"Via Messina 6, 20154 Milano, Italy",Consumer other,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Cristina Sivieri Tagliabue,"MakeVCV is an app allowing users to choose among different models of Videocv, compose a personalized videocurriculum through guided steps for data insertion, and produce autonomously a professional video. MakeVCV is an intuitive tool that makes it possible to everyone the production of his own video-candidacy, and allows the recruiter to observe in a simple way the characteristics of the candidate, while also having kind of fun. MakeVCV has developed a Technology/Patent allowing to create a?connection? between html and ?web-based? languages with professional programs of video editing. The end result is an APP allowing the user to fill up with his own data a pre-defined and dynamic model but, at the same time, apt to personalization. The Videocv can be downloaded on mobile and internet. The market now developing around videocv is still uncertain and undefined.Present offerings have weak spots: some require a personalized production (agencies and videomakers), restricting therefore the market to areas close to the agencys office. Others have mediocre graphics, uneffective contents
column2: some other consider videocv as an integration of the traditional paper cv, which must be necessarily loaded into the usersaccount and remains necessarily the key tool of job search. MakeVCV is a high quality (graphics and content)product, guiding the user to produce an effective tool, free of traditional logics of paper cv. The ideal customer of MakeVCV is a professional siming at a new challenge.He comes from any work environment. In particular, professionals who want to make themselves known in a new and viral way by potential customers
column3: people wanting a new or improved position
column4: young people, graduated or not, who have the ambition to make their abilities known to companies. The MakeCVC APP will be available in PREMIUM creative version and in a FREE one, that we call VIEWER. The PREMIUM version, obtainable for FEE (payment) can be downloaded on mobile phone and allows creation of personalized video curriculum. After filling a questionnaire/data and selecting graphic elements like colors, characters,music you get a file that is automatically processed by the editing software, programmed to produce a 2 minute max. video. To avoid long waits caused by slow upload and download, the APP offers immediately to the user a sharable link of the video being produced, that will be placed in online repository: in this way the user has the possibility to send a link with a simple touch, obviously in addition to the possibility to download on his own device the full HD video. At the end of the creative process, MakeVCV premium gives the possibility to create a marker to place on his personal card or paper CV. This marker, with the imprinted logo of MakeCVC, will allow , through the AUGMENTED REALITY technology, to view the videoCV in 3D to anybody who had downloaded the VIEWER (free) version of it.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

column1: 106,CREA106,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Serena Telesca,CROWDARTS,"via Paternese , 1A, 50014 Fiesole, Italy","ARTS, ENTERTAINMENT AND RECREATION",B2B,#N/A,#N/A,YES,IN,Serena Telesca,"CROWDARTS is the first crowdfunding platform dedicated to performing arts that incorporated the possibility to finance not only ideas (pre-production projects) but also more developed projects (post-production) with the objective to reduce the enormous gap between artists, partners, supporters and funding.

CROWDARTS main services will focus on two-core moment or stages of artistic creation: the ""Phase"" of the Pre-production and the one of Post-production. The Pre-production is the process of ideation and definition of all the elements involved in a play or other performance acts. The Post-production work is connected with a pre existing product and is dedicated to marketing strategies, communication and sales of a show. CROWDARTS, currently at the idea stage, will leverage on CreatiFI, in order to becomeÿ the first platform providing both Pre and Post-production services and is the first crowdfunding platform offering matchmaking services in the post-production Phase. With CROWDARTS all players will be able to sustain their ideas and will be able to better connect with partners and backers. CROWDARTS will also offer a dynamic environment to test and validate their ideas and to promote and market at low costs their new cultural products. CROWDARTS platform addresses three different primary target groups:
ÿ
ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿÿ- ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿ ÿArtists and Companies
-ÿÿ ÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿ Performing Centers, Festivals and professional stakeholders
-ÿÿ ÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿ Bakers, audience and Community
ÿ

CROWDARTS offers a cloud platform able to put ideas into motion and create a dynamic ecosystem of cultural actors that could generate new jobs and business opportunities for the ""creators"" and partners of shows. The service will allow artists to connect with partners and backers to accelerate their ideas through all its phases, going from the creation to the programming of the shows and thus promoting the professionalization of the artists internationally. In addition, through the platform, artists will get in touch with a network of partners active in the Performing Arts (spreading centers artistic, performing places, services for artists etc ....) at national and European level.

CROWDARTS, with its partners, will offer a new sustainable model for the sector allowing access to 'alternative' funding and ensuring, via the crowdfunding test, the quality of work and competences of both companies and structures in which they operate. With our platforms we can help mature businesses to transform enabling social and local development connected with artistic production.
ÿ

Our platform, leveraging on partnership and web marketing, will offer a unique crowdfounding reward-based online service, using state-of-the-art ICT technologies, aims to finance the creation ofÿ Pre-production and Post-production Campaigns. CROWDARTS has deep viral approach and will utilise proposers motivation to become very visible in the Performing Arts

During the first two years of life CROWDARTS expects to attract around 1500 crowdfounding campaigns with an average of 150 financed campaigns per year (see section Revenues). Our market will initially be Italy, France and Belgiumand UKand Northern European countries, and in a second place will be translated and spread to the other European countries.
ÿ

Our effort will be concentrated, initially, on theater sector, to broaden to others performing arts sectors. The strength of this project lays on the valuable connections that CROWDARTS has already with Artists, Companies, Performing Centers, Residency Program of Performing Arts at European level, in the project target countries. ÿThis competence will be very important to acquire the primary targets of CROWDARTS.",Service provider,,X,0,X,0,0,,Software,Team Collaborative Applications,Applications,Collaborative Applications,1,X,#N/A,Startup,50000,0

107,CREA107,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,GiPStech S.r.l.,GiPStech,"Via Quasimodo 8, c/o Studio Bonaro, 87036 Rende CS, Italy",Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),B2B,7,1,YES,IN,Matteo Faggin,"We bring precision to indoor localization without adding expensive infrastructure.
ÿ

Localization and navigation has become ubiquitous thanks to GPS and its fusion with the mobile technology. Unfortunately GPS does not work inside buildings, because the signal from satellites is shielded and its limited precision makes it irrelevant in a closed space. Increasingly, users are expecting to be able to use GPS-like services inside buildings for their convenience, and businesses are keen on adopting indoor localization to allow a new level of location-aware interaction with customers. GiPStech aims to delivering the technology platform that enables this location-awareness, in a very precise fashion without installing infrastructure.
ÿ

Our product therefore consists of a library for indoor localization to be implemented into applications for smart devices, from smartphones to industrial devices. The technology, currrently in Alpha tests, consists of proprietary localization algorithms that employ geomagnetic anomalies as ""natural signal"" for the precise (1m) localization, plus hybridization with other position estimantion methods based onÿradio-frequency (RF such as wifi and LEB beacons).",Tech provider,X,0,0,0,0,0,,Software,"Development Languages, Environments, and Tools",Application Development & Deployment,Application Development Software,1,X,www.gipstech.com,Startup,50000,gipstech.com

108,CREA108,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,LEM snc - Laboratorio Elettromeccanico,securiFI,"Via Santi Cosma e Damiano 64/5, 38121 Trento, Italy",Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Mario Rigotti,"Our idea is to analyze data from alarm systems and surveillance video streams in order to generate useful statistics for business purposes. The notion is that information available from modern Security Systems offer a consistent flow of information that currently only represent a ?cost? to businesses and individuals.
ÿ

There is big potential behind data that is not being exploited behind a basic home security system or the number of surveillance CCTV cameras that monitor a retail store. It is our mission to ?rethink? current security systems and use them as a resource not only a cost.
ÿ

Our service/platform, called securiFI, intends to provide cost effective allarm system and surveillance data analysis to better understand human behavior. Retail stores could be the first ones to benefit from this idea. Data statistics could: prevent loss, optimize personnel, promotion evaluation, marketing performance, understand client behavior, just name a few examples. The solution could even help repay the initial investment of the security system.
ÿ

SecuriFI represents a competitive offering that adds value by bridging the gap between traditional alarm/surveillance systems and advanced data analysis service.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

109,CREA109,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Edutech Srl,Skills Coach,"Via Solteri 38, 38121 Trento, Italy",Consumer health/wellness,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Edutech Srl,"Skills Coach is an innovative service framework built on, and enhancing potentials, of current LMS platforms. It features both a methodological structure and a series of especially designed digital tools for those customers (private and corporate) that need to perform/provide competence coaching. Respect to actual assisted-coaching systems, Skills Coach is capable to provide in one integrated application not only the support for the coaching action itself, with high-quality video materials and assessment tools, but also to handle and manage the overall process (from the choice of the coach, to the evaluation and change of individual lifelong learning plan) with high flexibility in choosing interaction modalities, space and times (accessibility from the cloud: PC, tablet, mobile devices, etc.). Moreover, respect to state-of-art coaching applications mostly targeted to academic use, it provides a high added value as tailored to corporate and single customers. With Skills Coach, the coaching is provided as given in the following diagram.
ÿ
ÿ
ÿ

The core activity is performed through an online platform where users that may require/be requested for coaching are presents with related video behaviors. Video materials can be produced in real time directly on the platform or uploaded from an external device after the activity. Each registered user features a reserved personal video archive: every video can be independently assigned to an external coach, or can be autonomously evaluated.

The user has to fill in personal records containing an updated CV together with training activities performed externally. This summary will report all coaching activities performed/in progress with possibility to review results and assessments.
The service allows to make the coaching process more effective and efficient. In fact:

the easy and ubiquitous availability of video materials of recorded behaviors provides a simple and powerful analysis tools both for the coach (to evaluate and correct the behavior of the coachee) and the coachee (to improve his self-awareness)
the related video-conference tool provides a way to perform flexible paths of vis-?-vis coaching (allowing synchronous feedback sessions between the coach and coachee)
the integration of the service in a LMS platform allows to adapt and personalize the coaching strategy to the specific user needs and overall lifelong learning project

the coaching methodology is designed both for customers having already a precisely defined coaching need/plan and others, that may be supported to define the need through integrated self-assessment tools
To summarize benefits, the service allows to reinforce the relationship coach-coachee and to get immediate feedback on the behaviors in order to understand errors and improve. Moreover, it helps to:
Develop competences
Improve interpersonal relationships
Facilitate the undertaking of new responsibilities
Opportunity of immediate feedback and finalization of the coaching action
Personalized contact modalities
Opportunity of creating ones? own ?Competence development plan? (bulding own video library of behaviors)
The end users are:
A. The single customer, i.e., a person willing to reach a higher level of performance / learning / satisfaction. Some categories:
Executive
Top manager
Middle manager
Consultants
Sales
Front office
Persons looking for professional requalification.
B. The companies that need to provide coaching to their collaborators or groups of collaborators. For instance:
Work groups

110,CREA110,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,idea-re di Paolo Franceschini,iCONIC - Cllaborative Co-desIgn Networks for creative industries and craft,"Via Timavo 200, 20099 Sesto San Giovanni, Italy","ARTS, ENTERTAINMENT AND RECREATION",0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Paolo Franceschini,"The objective of iCONIC project is to develop a white label open innovation and crowdfunding platform addressing the needs of local creative communities, composed by designers and craftsmen.

iCONIC will enable collaborative, self-organising networks for creative industry, where people can connect and build communities to interact with each other and gain from social interaction within their community.

iCONIC will be an open collaborative webspace to realize new products, by exploiting collaborative designÿ enhanced by innovation brought by up to date digital fabrication technologies (i.e. 3D printing) and traditional craftsmanship expertise. iCONIC will be based upon the architecture of WEREALIZE.IT, a crowdfunding/open innovation platform for design, already tested on the market with over 200 users.

The adoption of FIWARE technologies (i.e. the Applications/Services Ecosystems and Delivery Framework Wirecloud) will allow to enhance platform customisation according to specific needs of every single community.

This will allow the creation of ecosystems of creative people, that will maximizes the benefits for all participants: the ecosystem will foster open innovation, improving dialogue and cooperation amongÿ participants involved
iCONIC will offer following functionalities:
User profiling: iCONIC will allow designers and craftsmen to create their own (technical) profile, high lightening up to 3 technical skills.
Groups: iCONIC will allow users to create small communities to manage working group, created basing on technical skills of users.
Community/Digital supply chain: iCONIC will enable a network of craftmen that may support collaborate with designers to start small production of their projects.
Crowdsourcing-contest. Crowdsourcing functionalities will allow SMEs to start ideas or project contest, enabling open innovation processes among SMEs and craftmen/designer communities.
Crowdfunding: (implemented through original werealize.it framework), will allow designers and craftsmenÿ to start and manage crowdfunding campaign to raise money in support of their projects.

The adoption of FIWARE/ Wirecloud technology will allow users without programming skills to create community of users by selecting and integrate (through simple drag and drop? interaction) only the functionalities needed by every group of users.

The test phase will be carried out involving users from local creative communities. Over the first year of operational activities, the team of werealize.it worked in strict collaboration with all the actors of the addressed value chain (interests of the users community has been clearly stated in EOI official letters). The communities addressed by iCONIC will be

Designers. Over 260 users subscribed to werealize.it. 20% of them are active users and willing to start crowdfunding campaigns. A small panel of design firms will be involved for early validation of new functionalities.

Craftsmen will be the productive partners in iCONIC model. They will use the platform to start open innovation project with designers and Fablabs. iCONIC will involve a local trade association, Apa Confartigianato, the craftsmen trade association of North Milan area, enclosing members from design, fashion an handicraft. The association is accounting for over 650 companies.

FABlabs (digital fabrication laboratory) wil be the technological partners of designers and craftsmen . Activities aimed at involving Fablabs have been carried out. The Yatta Fablab (based in Milan) accounting for over 150 members is strongly interested in starting the advanced validation process of iCONIC framework

111,CREA111,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Custom Elm srls,AH-ARTISTIC HELMETS,"via Zamboni,3, appartment, 40126 bologna, Italy",BUSINESS SERVICES,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,custom elm  srl,"ArtisticÿHelmetsÿ(AH)ÿisÿaÿwebÿplatformÿwhereÿartistsÿandÿgraphicÿdesignersÿcanÿpaintÿonÿ3Dÿhelmetsÿandÿsellÿtheirÿcreations.ÿ

112,CREA112,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,OC LAB srl,CLMS - PROJECT OF A NEW CMS/LMS WITH DRIVERS FOR WEARABLE DEVICES AND UHD IMAGING,"via Zeni 8, 38068 Rovereto, Italy",MANUFACTURING,B2B,6,1,YES,IN,Roberto del Mastro,"It is currently lacking in the business markets, a content management system that combines the training field to the marketing one. At the same time the globalized market and the arrival of web marketers have created the need and demand for such tools. What it is needed is a CMLS that takes into consideration the new devices and content standards such as the wearable devices and UltraHD content. This increases a lot the creative possibilities in publishing contents.
ÿ

The subject of the project is a construction of a CMS / LMS (Content / Learning Management System Software) capable of interfacing with wearable devices that are now on the market, with the use of Ultra HD video projections combined with low budget holographic projection.
ÿ
The project of the drivers for wearable devices must provide the creation of image recognition routines, for this is expected in the business plan the presence of an experienced programmer.
ÿ

By analyzing what happens in the market, while on the one hand the management and content production is having preponderance towards the development of the hardware, and the concepts of information, training and promotion intersect with the use of new media, the development of the LMS softwares remained related of the university/academic approach, dedicated to the satisfaction of administrative needs (classrooms and user management, exams and so on), or facilitated authoring for teachers, that are not interested in acquiring multimedia instruction design skills, so often flatten the content of the online training in textual collections, or PDF file to download.
ÿ

It is surprising that even the newest EDX platform, despite the large universities inside as member of the EDX Committee (MIT, Stanford, etc.), seems decidedly not innovative. In our opinion, the real EDX orientation is to impose a standard of worldwide distribution of content (known as MOOC), to impose a standard training, such as YouTube for general purpose videos.

This surprisingly slow approach still applies even for corporate academies. Quite rarelyÿ companies are aware of the importance of training to better sell their products or services, and invest seriously in content production.
ÿ
The trend however is slowly evolving, driven by the arrival of new personal devices.

Our project has the goal to create something differenciated of what is on the market at the moment, interfacing wearable devices of various kinds with a CMS / LMS that provides, finally, tools for their use.

Obviously, the development of a custom module cannot be exclusive (it is difficult to think of replacing all existing CMS/LMS), and therefore should again be open towards various sources and display instruments, such as:
- proprietary and open source LMS of international relevance
- Wearables devices from different vendors
- UHD screens from different vendors
- Low budget Holographic projection etc.

Therefore the investment in development is not only in the direction of central code but also of plugins and drivers for various devices.",Tech provider,,0,0,0,0,0,,Software,Content Management,Applications,Content Applications,1,X,www.oclab.it,Startup,50000,oclab.it

113,CREA113,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Smarfle s.r.l.s.,Smarfle,"Viale Volga c/o Fiera del Levante, c/o Hub Bari, 70123 Bari, Italy",Consumer leisure/gaming,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Massimo Michetti,"Music is very important in everyday life, both for personal and business aspects. With millions of songs always available thanks to streaming services, the real challenge is finding an effortless way to create a perfect music selection that satisfies listeners needs.
In this scenario, Smarfle aims at radically innovate the way music listening is experienced by any individual during his daily activities.
ÿ

Our proprietary technology represents a unique mix of smart music recommendation and social playlisting service. It was conceived at first to serve as a personal music concierge to users. The evolution of our product goes now towards the idea of IoT, where smartness is placed in devices, disseminated in our cities, that can seamlessly interact with our smartphones and wearable devices to enable new forms of user experience.
Music will effortlessly accompany us in our daily activities, guaranteeing the perfect atmosphere to go shopping or hanging out with our friends.
We address both consumer and business markets, as there are several ways to deliver our value proposition.

The main concept is that a MusicSpot can be created in places where people listen to background music. Exactly like in a WiFi hotspot the internet bandwidth is shared among user, in a MusicSpot people share their music taste and the music selection can be tailored on their music taste profiles.

For what concerns the consumer market, we?re creating for our users the best solution to enjoy music in a new smart and social way, giving them the possibility to use their favourite streaming service. The strength of our product is that it can be used in a very wide variety of scenarios, from single users who wants to listen to their music in mobility while discovering new artists, to home parties and social events where playlist can be hard to create manually in order to satisfy all people gathering the event.
ÿ
Thanks to the integration of indoor positioning technology we?re going to offer to business owners the most advanced tool to enhance their customers? in-store experience.

Business owners today know that music is very important for them to influence buying behaviour and fidelize customers and members. They will find in our services the most revolutionary automatic tool to tune the music selection on their customers? taste, creating the perfect atmosphere and increasing sales, without paying high rates for a human curated in-store playlisting service.
ÿ
Our Business Model is based on a two main client segments.

B2C customers are all technology passionates that love listening to music, either alone or with friends, but don?t have time to create playlists or discover new songs and artists they could like. We call them ?lazy listeners?. Most of the value proposition will be delivered through mobile/web apps, thus enabling fast scalability, but also dedicated HW solutions will be marketed so to target niches willing to early adopting innovative technologies. Our B2B clients are shops, restaurants and all those commercial activities where music selection is fundamental in terms of social and business opportunity, that are open to new technologies and don?t want to spend too much for human curated music services.

Towards business clients, we?re moving in two directions: direct selling and partnerships (with wifi providers, digital fidelity programs, proximity marketing or contactless payments services). This second option could represent a great opportunity to reduce customers acquisition costs especially in the first period.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

114,CREA114,CREA,CREAtiFi,Switzerland,ReactiFI,ReactiFI,"Bulevar Kneza Milosa 4, 26, 21000 Novi Sad, Serbia. Switzerland","ARTS, ENTERTAINMENT AND RECREATION, BUSINESS SERVICES, Consumer DIY/design",B2B/B2C,5,1,YES,IN,Miroslav Tadic,"1.ÿProduct or service that we will offer.

?In simplest terms, ReactiFI is a mobile application. In reality, however, there is very little simple about it. The idea behind ReactiFI is to harness the potential of sensory data gathered from a variety of wearable devices, and use it to create a design that is unique to the user. The result of the design can be anything that we usually design, and it will be shown in real time Augmented Reality environment. A glass or a vase, a sculpture, a piece of furniture, an entire room, or even a whole building!
2.ÿCustomer problem.
We are not addressing an existing problem but rather looking to fill a gap in the market and create a new way to use already existing technologies.
3.ÿTarget market.
Design professionals.
Architects.
Businesses offering design services.
Artists.
Do-it-Yourself enthusiasts.
4.ÿSales and marketing strategy.
App store.
Official website.
Partnerships with Sensor manufacturing companies.
5.ÿRevenue streams.
Direct sales of the app from the app store.
Licensing to sensor manufacturing companies to sell our product with their proprietary product for a fee.
Royalty fees for businesses using the service.
Different subscription plans (personal, professional, corporate).
Marketplace for users to share their unique designs.
6.ÿCompetitors.

Competition exists, and it consists of companies offering AR applications that can be used for design creation or presentation. However, there is no real competition when it comes to responsive approach to linking the sensor technology and creation of content.
7.ÿChallenges and risks.

Entire concept is based on the idea of wearable device with an integrated sensor being a normal thing for every individual. On one hand, this could prove to be a pitfall of the project, since wearable tech is yet to be an integral part of our lives. On the other hand, according to numbers, it does look like a direction we are moving in. 20 years ago almost nobody had a mobile phone. Similarly, sensors and wearable tech is novelty now, but in 5-10 years it will be a regular thing. IHS Electronics &amp
column2: Media forecasts that the number of wearable devices on the market will rise from 50 million in 2014 to over 180 million by the end of 2017.

column1: 8. Competitive advantage.

115,CREA115,CREA,CREAtiFi,The Netherlands,3vell,3vell,"Nieuwe Fellenoord 6, 5612KC Eindhoven, Netherlands",Consumer leisure/gaming,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Boris Nikolov,"Nowadays, information is all over the place. Travelers are confused, frustrated and often do not get a chance of experiencing the destination they chose to the fullest. Effort of going through the booking all the necessities is a job of its own (taking care of transportation, accommodation, transits). In addition to that, people have to plan their budgets carefully and then to plan the stay as well. Which walking tour to take? Which museum to visit? Which restaurant serves good local dishes? These all are the questions travelers ask and answers they search for. Getting the best and most updated answers takes time, time they could spend in a better way. That is where 3vell is doing all the work for them, providing them with little bit of extra to the ordinary travel websites, blogs and agencies.

The unique value proposition of 3vell consists of combining few services together in a single platform with a help of a community. We collect big data and process it from open portals like travel news, blogs and social networks, in order to recognize hotspots and pick-up trends. This is going to be the main addition to 3vell's future community. Our algorithms will match people with similar traveling interests, recognize sentiment based patterns, and based on this, propose relevant suggestions (destinations to start with, events and local sights) tailored to each individual. 3vell will offer a possibility to track travel plans, search and discover trends, meet people with similar ideas in terms of destinations desired, preferred type of transportation, time of visiting and budget scope.

We want to make people aware of their time, incent them to travel more often and connect them with like-minded community by reducing all the effort of planning a trip, suiting their own personal preferences, all with the use of clever engineering.

Machine-learning algorithms acquiring current information of trends, popular places and events through big data analysis of open media, will make sure that all the information is always accurate and up-to-date. Sentiment based analysis will provide us with matching personal needs and desires in accordance to our deals. Additionally, open community input is going be one of the key strengths of our business.

For pure technicalities of website development we plan to use Go language with Neo4j graph database while Bootstrapping design for initially optimizing it for mobile devices, until we create a cross-platform native mobile app.

In a nutshell, 3vell combines all the steps connected with making a journey happen in a single platform, offering the best deals while precisely matching each individual's taste.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

column1: V-ENGAGE is a platform that enable to deliver to a global audience (players) virtual coupons. The coupons are delivered as object geo-localized in the augmented reality (AR). Each coupon might be captured by a player trough a ?tap? on the smartphone screen.
ÿ
TARGETED MARKET/CUSTOMERS
V-Engage services are targeted for medium-large size Brands operating in the B2C Market. Typical customers are large scale distributors and retailer like Shopping center or Supermarket chain.
ÿ
CUSTOMER PROBLEM
Engage new potential customers
Increase the in-store flow
Leverage the new media to ?viralize? the brand
Create a brand sensible community
Migrate customers? contacts from the leaflet distribution to the digital media, reducing the costs for maintaining and contacting customer base
ÿ
USE CASE

A leading technology supermarket chain integrate the V-ENGAGE in the supermarket APP looking to target the householders in the moment just after they drop the children at school. Trough an advertising campaign communicate to the audience a couponing campaign:
By using the APP in geo-location close to the schools you can get virtual coupon and discount to redeem in our store?.
The virtual coupons are delivered everywhere a user is using the APP close to a school at a specific time.
ÿ
PLATFORM MODULE

V-ENGAGE SDK ? is an SDK component for iOS, Android and WindowsPhone that can be integrated in the Brand?s app to deliver the service to the users. V-ENGAGE SERVER ? is the backend infrastructure that:
Delivers the virtual coupon in the AR basing on rules like: number of coupon, frequency, geo-localization
Register the coupon capturing action and deliver to the player an SMS with the number to redeem the coupon in the Brand store
Monitor the global coupon distribution
ÿ

119,CREA119,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Julio Enrique Preciado Barboza,My-Food-Habits,"Via San Bernardino 38, 10141 Turin, Italy",Consumer health/wellness,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Julio Enrique Preciado Barboza,"Conceptually the project will develop a two-sided platform about nutrition: one side is a multiplatform app &amp
column2: web site for digital citizens (users) interested on recognize and improve their own nutrition habits
column3: second side another web site &amp
column4: app for nutrition professionals. Individually it is an useful instrument to help follow a diet or to monitor any kind of food or habits on time people are interested on.

column1: ÿ
Essentially it is a personal nutrition assistant/adviser through a smartphone app and website and a bridge . This application collects food habits information graphicallyÿ from users
column2: then it recognize basic food habits analysing historic data, and finallyÿ give suggestions considering the most general nutrition suggestions of OMS and other international nutrition authorities. In order to learn simple good eating habits, the app will propose real time tips day by day in order to obtain results gradually.ÿ

column1: ÿ

User interface will be simple, useful and attractive. initially asking users their own food habits in a graphical way, with a personalized detail level that depends on the individual needs, objectives and involvement. Considering the data collected, nutrition algorithm will elaborate identifying some basic nutrition habits like:
- How many times a day/week I eat, I have eaten vegetables and fruit or milk or beans (low detail basic level)
- Approximately, how much grams of animal proteins I have ate this week? (high level of detail)
ÿ

Then nutrition algorithm will ask user which of the habits will like to change (for example eat 5/6 times/day or eat few candies) and the level of interaction user want (few, lot of questions, level detail desidered basic or advanced). PA will give suggestions and continue asking user his eating habits and then present the achievement of objectives with the desired frequency. User can show his eating habits to a professional nutritionist, helping them to understand patient food habits, and advertising this application. A game interface will permit or deny permission to take dessert based on awareness and discipline. Social function will permit to share experiences between users with similar profile or problems.
ÿ

Particularly important: the application will suggest to visit a professional to obtain a personalized diet for complicated cases or to receive an initial brief feedback from a Nutritionist. User then can decide to contact a nutritionist certifiedÿ (there will be a process for this verification) located near the actual geographic position. Nutritionist can visualize and follow nutrition habits from their patients through app or website
column2: then nutritionists can provide a diet through the application. Patients can receive direct assistance from his own nutrition specialist, and help to follow a diet. Nutritionist can also modify diet based on results, patient feedbacks and specific changing needs. Patients will receive a better service from nutritionist through this solution and nutritionist can retain and increase number of patients.

column1: ÿ

Another module of the solution will elaborate, anonymize and aggregate information, and then share this information using open data formats. In this way, food habits of digital citizens will become available for scientific community and health ministry of countries as additional useful reference for nutrition programs.Other developers will be able to use this information in the future to create new applications, to correlate data for example to make big data processing to understand better relationships between health and nutrition.
ÿ
The summary of this information will be available through app&amp
column2: web for all citizens, permitting to compare nutrition habits between societies.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A

121,CREA121,CREA,CREAtiFi,Bulgaria,MixedSign,Harmony,"15, Opalchenska Str, fl.2, 9002 Varna, Bulgaria",Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Miroslav Rumenov Todorov,"I would like to present you my idea , which is still in a stage of concept . It is about smart device, which has a touch phone size or tablet`s , but simply unfolding as a sheet of paper and increases three times it size! That is the way it will be able to work as a great fully functional tablet or desktop system. This device aims the satisfaction of maximum users which will lead to be used for a long-term planning. Because of the uniqueness of its functions could not be replaced by another device in the near future.
Form

Maximum simplicity of the shape of that device is for easier hold in a hand. Therefore the width of the screen in the folded position coincides with outside dimension of the device. Thus easy to grip even with 7-inch diagonal single screen but when unfolded there is no distance between screens and practically becomes a device with three times larger screen.
Impact

The device that combines the capabilities of Smart phone and functionality of PC. Daily use of computers is unarguably. Also we need for continuous telephone and internet connection. This device combines all these functions in one body. When folded it is just a mobile phone / tablet. Unfolded allows use as a PC- bigger screen and more precise work with applications for Office, web, vector and raster design, 3D, CAD and etc.
Context

Benefits of design is for all-from students to people with different occupations. You do not need to carry cell phones, tablets, notebooks. This compact device will be more convenient for the growing number of people on motion. So all the information you need at any time will always be available.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,0,#N/A
122,CREA122,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Professional,SmileMum,"Strada dei laghi di Lamar 21, Building, 38070 Terlago, Trento, Italy",Consumer other,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Mattia Depaoli,"1 Customer problem
Young Business woman, an important business meeting out of town that will affect her future career. She is worried about her young children, elderly parents, for the new Baby Sitter.
She is anxious, not able to focus on Business, she doesn?t sleep quietly. She is compromising the opportunity of her life.
DON?T SPOIL IT ALL!
The woman must focus on her professional activities with serenity, she has to know to have the family situation under control and she can quickly decide what to do.
1.1 Women requirements
The Life Cycle and the factors of the role of women today are:
On work:
ÿ* Overload and role conflict.
In the family:
ÿ* Child care.
ÿ* Elderly care.
ÿ* Maternity.
The women areÿrepresentedÿas kind of multifunctional AVATAR, which must get everywhere, subjected to an high anxiety and emotional charge.
2 Product or service
An high added value service that allows the ?avatar? woman to control the family situation and to devote themselves quietly to her work activities.
2.1 Scope
The scope of development is Internet of Things: A system product that supports interaction withÿwearable Indoor / Outdoor items, using tracking readers and GPS locators.
The System products are provided into different ways:
Web Portal platform.
APP.
B2C platform to supply hardware.
Call Center for On-demand Services.
2.1 Master functionality
Child and elderly parents monitoring.
Fast and centered monitoring of Vulnerable subjects.
Baby Sitter monitoring.
Community and Social network functionality.
Opinions sharing and service evaluation.
3 Master target market
Business women with: young children, good economic status. They need to control the family situation, at the same time they don't want to have problem at work.
They would like to focus on the career without damaging the welfare of their babies. The woman want to be quickly present in difficult circumstances.
4 Sales strategy
The sale channel is B2C, through an eCommerce portal.
Call Center Assistance and a Logistics Operations Centre.
Sales processes:
Service SmileMum registration.
Service evaluation using a Demo component for a period of thirty days.
Software download and purchase.
Hardware purchase.
On Demand Services subscription.
5 Marketing strategy
The Marketing Strategy is based on these channels:
Web Site.
Social Networks.
YouTube Media.
Mailing to potential clients or doctors such as GPs and pediatricians.
Agreements with the major operators in national and international telephony and technologies applied to mobility.
No advertising campaigns using mass media, magazines, etc. in the start up phase.
6 Competitors
Some competitors of this specific service are the following:
Telephone Companies.
Work Force and fleet Management.
Technological and Mobility tools Suppliers.
Other specific companies.
7 Competitive advantage
Our project is different because it is designed to help young women, many of whom work and have few spare time, to manage everyday problems with family
column2: they are also advanced user of innovative technological tools.

column1: 8 Challenges
The challenge is to create a vertical Social Network and Community, blending social functions with a monitoring service only for young business women with children.
SmileMum is a Social Service to create the best use of organization models, new mobile technologies, tracking equipment.

123,CREA123,CREA,CREAtiFi,Italy,Proofy,Proofy - your ideas everywhere,"via Plinio 70, 20129 Milano, Italy","ARTS, ENTERTAINMENT AND RECREATION, BUSINESS SERVICES, TELECOM AND MEDIA",B2B,5,0,YES,IN,Valentina Panizza,"The service

Proofy is a cloud-based web application that allowsÿusers to get a certificate of the date of creation of their copyrightable work. Target users are artists, creative people and software developers who want to protect their original works.
Users have to upload files containing their copyrightable work and receive a certificate with a proof of the existence and integrity of such files to a certain date and time.

Data and time of registration are guaranteed by mean of the application of a certified timestamp, and integrity proof of of the uploaded file is implemented by mean of an ad hoc technology, which constitutes the added value of the service we provide.
In fact, thanks to the implementation of authenticated data structures, Proofy can verify if a file/certificate has been cracked
column2: the verification system is integrated in Proofy, and offers security levels that are consistently higher than the ones offered byÿcompetitors since it has been developedÿon the basisÿofÿan innovative technology that is still a field of academic research.

column1: Timestamps are certified by a Certification Authority legally recognised at European level.
ÿ
How it works

The user is clearly identified during the sign-up process. Since Proofy cannot verify neither legally certifyÿif the uploader is the author of the file he uploads,ÿwe ask the userÿfor aÿstatement of authorship which is considered as simple reinforced proof of the authorship. It will be possible to add co-authors or, for B2B customers, to register on behalf of someone else.

Each file shall be eitherÿkept private or published in a web space of the Proofy websiteÿnamed ""Gallery"", and/or in other web-platforms such as social networks or personal websites, which will show the viewer to a link to the certificate,ÿin order to prevent plagiarism. Our service is compatible with Creative Commons Licences.

During the trial period the service willÿprovide the user withÿ5 free uploads. In order to keep using the service,ÿeachÿcustomerÿwill have to choose one of the subscription plans, which will allow him to accessÿto further contents and benefits (e.g. access to additional information materials, discounts on services of selected partners etc.).
Besides, Proofy offers a secure back-up system for files and certificates stored in its Archives.
ÿ
Proofy's technology
Proofy is currently based on windows Azure cloud computing service at IAAS level (Infrastructure As A Service).
On that basis, six componentsÿare beingÿimplemented:
-ÿÿÿÿÿÿ java based web application, that is, the user's interface side
-ÿÿÿÿÿÿ component used to communicate with the Certification Authority, used by Proofy toÿtimestamp files
-ÿÿÿÿÿÿ the new java based data integrity system that offers high security levels
-ÿÿÿÿÿÿ communication infrastructure between components based on non-syncronized messaging ,in order to guarantee the service even in the case that one component is not available in a certain moment
-ÿÿÿÿÿÿ a graph database for managing digital certificates
- ÿ ÿ ÿ object database to manage media files
-ÿÿÿÿÿÿ a traditional database for managing users and payment plans (both spot and recurring).

A possible future development for the serviceÿmay beÿthe authomatic research of plagiarism cases of uploaded files.",Tech provider,,X,0,0,0,0,,Software,Authoring and Publishing Software,Applications,Content Applications,1,0,www.proofy.co,Startup,50000,proofy.co
