The business consists of selling products and value added services such as mediation. The products are objects of furniture and decoration, building materials and technological systems and automation utility, fulfilling a project from scratch or remodeling of a physical space, commercial or urban housing. The business offers a unique and comprehensive diversification in Exchange for commissions, for sectors with high demand but low supply virtual. Created to be performed anywhere in the world through a multiplatform virtual store. We indicate to the consumer what he needs to buy, he configures the products in several optional components of color and material as their expectation, and the order is processed by the data and the payment. As the offer that we want to create is too varied and in large quantities, it would mean a huge expense in storage, logistics and transport double. So the stock will remain at the origin, i.e. from the supplier. Each supplier processes the sending of orders to make agreement. All payments to suppliers and business partners will be processed by electronic means international, autentificados and automatically. Create a sales system that can happen at any time, at the same time, without limits and in any part of the world. A virtual space availableÿ24ÿhours a day, 365 days a week. Adapt the system to this design concept, capable of in the future adapting it to other market sectors, with the advantage of being able to enjoy the same traction. This business promises to change the way creative professionals do things, promising better results of scalable and sustained manner, through a system of affiliation advanced and dedicated to each professional who intends to offer more than 50,000 innovative products and extreme quality, extra income, a high technological component closeness to reality and new customers, in Exchange for supplying loyalty.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

326,CREA326,CREA,CREAtiFi,Spain,Startup,Qurede (Qualitative Research Design),"Ribot i Serra 216, 08208 Sabadell, Spain",Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,Isidor Fernandez,"Software application for Qualitative Research Design addressed to companies, universities, public administrations and non-profit organizations, now named users, to design new ideas and strategies for the development and monitoring of products, services and decision-making in public policies. Complemented with two online communities. A community consultants that brings together researchers and professionals who can be hired by the users, and a second community of users that can use the services of consultants, or others hired themselves.The version to public administrations and non-profit organizations allows them to open their community and access to project to the public.
User Community: Skills and location of companies, universities and government.
Community Consultants: Skills, location and availability of researchers and professionals.
ÿ

The operating principle is crossed by the data input of the user, the open data obtained from public catalogs and shared data generated by the user and consultancy communities. This type of software is included in the group called CAQDAS (Computer Assisted Qualitative Data Analysis Software).
User Data
Open Data.
Shared data community.
ÿ

The software structure is based on the use of qualitative research techniques based on three types of data. The system uses a matrix that encodes the information of the user to filter the data and cross on a building semantic concepts related behaviors, habits, beliefs, motivations, values and conduct obtained from the data that the user can bring through surveys and the shared data provided by the communities. Open data included in the analysis of the matrix, are interpreted as social relations. The functionality of the array based on the epistemological assumptions of social constructivism, where knowledge is not to people as individual beings, but in the social relations between them, so the data are treated as open data social interactions multiple beyond people because test data also legal entity. Therefore, the system applies a qualitative analysis based on social relations that provides current information on social context for activity, trends and geographical.
ÿ

The most complex part of the project is to develop the algorithm of the matrix, it is based on the principle of taxonomic relationships on a context formulated a hypothesis created from the objective of the project, the activities of the elements involved, the social and economic and geographic location. The matrix encodes the data and relationships, creating a design of qualitative research project to work and needs in a report. The contribution to the system of three types of data grows in size increasing users and consultants.
ÿ

The report contains an analysis of the social and economic indicators on which to act. What are the resources available to the user, the chances of success of the project and estimate the rate of return on investment. The report also indicates the need for hiring consultants and the type of tasks to be performed, in order to perform a qualitative analysis customized by user type and scope. If human resources are not sufficient to carry out the project, the report is complemented by a range of professionals according to their skills, location and availability.
ÿ

The application reaches its maximum functionality with a tool online for recruitment consultants that userÿ to need to carry out the project and bring it in practice, by monitoring the process. The practice of use and scalability of the application allows you to design a project of product or service, creating a market among the users.",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

327,CREA327,CREA,CREAtiFi,Spain,Startup,LOOP,"apdo 397, Algaida, 07210 Baleares, Spain",TELECOM AND MEDIA,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,dan norton,"LOOP is an interactive dance film played with a graphic user interface, operated on a Second Screen device.ÿ
ÿ

The prototype, LOOP is an artwork which incorporates the TV and second screen into a single interactive experience of storytelling and video play. It uses the second screen not to provide additional information for a video, but as an integrated part of the video storyline. The second screen is an interactive animation which is used to select and mix, video sequences of dance choreography. It is an animation, a game, and an unfolding visual story.
ÿ

LOOP the a prototype for a platform through which users can upload collections of video material, and develop personalized graphic interfaces for mixing video. Users will build and share their a graphics interface and video collection, for second screen interaction with Smart TV.
ÿ
LOOP is a tool for choreographers, directors, smart phone users, and researchers to analyze, compose, and play collections of video sequences in multiple new combinations.
ÿ

Technology, like the book, the film, and radio have all been used as sites of cultural production for years. Video games have built an arena for engaging in stories and in creativity. The medium of video interactivity has hardly been touched upon by non-gaming cultural producers, neither artistically or economically. LOOP will initially provide an interactive dance film. It will then become a platform for building and sharing interactive film, video collections with second screen graphic consoles. ÿThis is a ÿnew approach to video production and viewing through a personal graphic animated console.ÿ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

328,CREA328,CREA,CREAtiFi,Spain,Startup,Do it your City (DIYcity),"Calle Mayor de Sarria 72, 08034 Barcelona, Spain",Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,µngela M? Baeza µlvarez,"The idea of this project is to develop an app that helps people go around cities. There are two main components of this project, a mobile app and a wearable device. The user will be able to create a route with the mobile app, and then use the wearable device to get to their destination without having to look at the mobile phone. It's a new and refreshing way of going around cities of the world.

The main users of this app will be tourists, people that want a new way of going around a city that they might not know that well, and possibly people that want new experiences in their own city. Using the wearable device it will be much easier to go around the city by bike or motorcycle.ÿ
ÿ
It is a new and easier way of going around cities.
ÿ
Here is a list of features that we want to implement in this project:
ÿ
Project Features
ÿ
1 - The user will be able to create routes using the mobile app.
2 - The routes will be displayed using the wearable device.
3 - The wearable device will guide the user to their destination using a user interface that can be customized in the mobile app.
4 - There will be an option, in which the route is displayed in the mobile app, using augmented reality.

5 - The augmented reality feature can be customized. The user can select the information that wants to be displayed. For example, the user might want to know the pharmacies that are around him/her as he/she walks through the route.
6 - There are different feature packs that can be purchased using the profile of the user in the web page. The augmented reality feature is an example of that.
7 - There will also be custom designs of the UI of the wearable that will be available in the web page to be purchased.
8 - When the user buys the app and device, a profile will be created in the web page in order for the user to manage his/her account.
9 - In the section of custom designs, the user will be able to review and give feedback of them.

10 - There will be an option for the user to create a route based on the recommendations of the application. These recommendations will be based on the preferences and past routes of the user or the friends of the user.

11 - The user will have the option to connect the social media profiles with this application to share the routes in social media and to be suggested similar routes or routes that were created by their facebook friends.
12 - Another premium feature will be for the device to inform the user that one of his/her friends is in the area, performing another route.
13 - The wearable device, when purchased, can be customized via the web page.
14 - In the web page, there will be several different routes that can be purchased. Typical routes would be for example tours between the main monuments of a city.
ÿ
ÿ
ÿ

330,CREA330,CREA,CREAtiFi,Spain,Unique Visitors,Unique Visitors ? Unique experiences for museum visitors,"Pla‡a de la Torre 7, 4, 3, 08006 Barcelona, Spain","ARTS, ENTERTAINMENT AND RECREATION, Consumer leisure/gaming",B2B/B2C,6,2,YES,IN,Ana Luisa Basso,"Context
ÿ

Museums are going through a major transformation. With the reduction of public funding, they are challenged to behave like companies. To remain sustainable, they now need to monitor performance and boost attendance. Like other businesses, they need more reliable KPIs and extensive audience data (demographics, recurrence, motivation, satisfaction).
ÿ
Market
ÿ
There are 18.886 museums in Europe. 43% of museums offer a mobile experience and 23% plan to offer it in the next year. The average expenditure in digital tools is 30.000 ?/year.
ÿ
The most popular goal of mobile projects is visitors? engagement, followed by providing additional content (2) and interactive experience (3). The least popular goal is revenue.
ÿ
Problem
ÿ
Challenges museums face to deliver a mobile experience:
Acquire mobile users
Create content and keep it updated
Technical maintenance
Evaluate ROI
ÿ
Museums are frustrated with the low ROI of mobile projects. They are open to try innovative solutions.
ÿ
Solution
ÿ

One of the most effective strategies to increase visits is to generate engagement. The WSJ recently published an article about crowdsourcing in museums: Sta Cruz Museum achieved twice more visitors, 4 times more donations and a whooping 20 times more grants by adopting a more participative approach in the last 3 years.
ÿ

Unique Visitors (UV) is a digital platform to manage and promote visitors? participation, creating engagement. Our concept is to crowdsource museum tours. We will make it extremely easy and intuitive for anyone to create and share their recommendations inside a museum.
ÿ

Visitors will become prosumers, creating a recommendation database that will help future visitors to have better and personalized experiences. Prosumers become ambassadors, inviting friends to visit the museum. In this virtuous cycle we generate engagement and create UGC.
ÿ
Value proposition
ÿ
Boost visits
Improve visitors? experience
Increase recurrence
Participation/engagement
Synergies with other museum, sharing audiences
Improve CRM and personalized communication
Empower visitors to recruit new audiences
Create UGC and increase online impact
Structure recommendations in a repository that will be useful for other visitors
Facilitate sharing of compelling content on social networks
New ways of seeing the same collection
Get metrics
Track user interaction on dashboard
Segmented data: Demographics (age, gender, origin), habits (schedules, preferences, recurrence), motivation (search), interest (heat map) and satisfaction (ratings, comments)
Reduce costs of mobile user acquisition
ÿ
Business Model
ÿ

Instead of creating isolated digital projects, museums can subscribe to UV. Pricing will vary from 2.000? to 10.000? annually (rev. model and pricing were contrasted with managers of top Barcelona museums).
ÿ
It is a scalable B2B business model. When we acquire a solid user base, UV can pivot or expand to other models (B2C).
ÿ
Competitive advantage
ÿ

We developed a throwaway prototype (proof of concept) where we tested demand and interest of museums and visitors. We also tested usability and UX. We have 225 users and 418 newsletter subscribers (50% of which are museum professionals).
ÿ
UV is endorsed by Museu Nacional d?Art de Catalunya and Fundaci¢ T?pies (see letters of recommendation). Both agreed to be the first pilots.
ÿ
Anticipated demand
ÿ
We are developing a limited UV version for Barcelona City Hall (Barcelona Activa) and were requested quotes for 2 other custom versions.
ÿ
Early recognitions
ÿ
Awards: Most innovative concept and Best App at Apps&amp
column2: Cultura contest promoted by Barcelona City Hall

column1: ÿ
Congress presentation: MuseumNext, Europe largest conference of Museum Innovation, side-by-side with projects from Tate, MoMA, Van Gogh and British Museum
ÿ
ÿ",Tech provider,,0,0,X,0,0,,Software,Marketing,Applications,Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Applications,1,0,0,Startup,50000,uniquevisitors.me

Such a system can be specifically deployed for high stakes elections or could be used as software as a service in more routine and less sensitive voting processes. The platform is flexible to accommodate different electoral process needs, as in for example, different authentication, user interface, or tallying requirements. Additionally, the system is compatible with on-site, non remote voting via deployment on tablets or PCs at voting booths.",Tech Provider,X,0,0,0,0,0,,Software,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,3,0,0,SME,0,agoravoting.com

column1: 874,IMpa542,IMpa,IMpaCT,Spain,Wave Technologies S.L.,MeteorDesk,0,Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),B2B,0,0,YES,IN,Lavin Luis,"Customers hate calling customer service and spend most of their time on IM apps. However, businesses are unable to provide scalable customer service on these apps as they weren't designed for B2C communication.  MeteorDesk is a cloud platform and API that offers businesses a multi-user ticketing system so they can provide scalable customer service on mobile instant messaging applications.  Business Model:  1. API: mainly for large companies that need to integrate WhatsApp on software they already use. Moreover, the API allows you to create automated systems of any kind. In this case, the customer is charged a fixed price per message sent to the final consumer.  2. Cloud Platform: aimed at SMEs. Companies must pay a monthly or annual fee for each employee who has access to MeteorDesk's  cloud software. This business model is the industry standard and is used by other customer service software companies like ZenDesk, Desk HelpScout and other players.",Service provider,0,0,0,X,0,0,,Software,0,#N/A,#N/A,3,0,0,SME,0,meteordesk.com

Sitting down very comfortably, we wait for the movie to start, and then we push a sync button in our smartphone, allowing MultiDub to, almost instantly, start providing us with our selected dubbing, which we can enjoy with our earphones in total synchronization with the video on the screen. In MultiDub we provide a totally flexible service, allowing the user to download the dubbing and synchronize it offline once in the theater, or do it online by means of streaming. 884,FIAd4,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Spain,findalocalteacher.com,FALT , ,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Piotr Zietara ,"Findalocalteacher is a platform that changes the way people learn new things and become better. On the one hand the platform allows you to find an expert who can teach you things you always wanted to learn. On the other hand Findalocalteacher is a tool for everyone who wants to share his or her knowledge and earn money for it. The platform addressed needs of the private tutoring market, with its estimated value at $102.8 billion at 2018. By using the FI-Ware technologies a set of tools designed by professional private tutors will be integrated in the Findalocalteacher platform. This comprehensive platform will not only make it easy to manage your private classes but also provides transparency for students who want to hire an expert. The platform will also facilitate private classes in small groups, lowering costs of a class and encouraging the team work.

column1: 885,FIAd5,FIAd,FI-Adopt,The Netherlands,OpenDoc Society ,OF-FI-SHOTS ,"Guardini-Nes 2, 1862 AJ Bergen ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Michiel Leenaars ,"The project intends to tackle one of the achilles heels of the cocreation movement in education ƒ?? the fact that we all work with different tools and users have little power to exert or demand interoperability. Especially when creating education material across organisations, or work both from home and from the office with different tools (office software can be very expensive), they run into significant issues. There is an enormous waste of human effort in trying to fix things that don't work across applications. Also the emerging need to use structured or Linked Data has so far suffered immensely from erreonous handling by some applications.

OF-FI-SHOTS is the FIWARE based follow up to the Officeshots.org project. It will be an independent, distributed test platform for interoperability and regression testing between office applications, educational software, translation software etcetera. We will build a distributed infrastructure which will allow to see how different versions of different applications work (or rather don't work) together in processing content such as educational materials. We intend to offering this service commercially as a shared service to companies, while offering it for free to open source developers working on interoperability issues. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

886,FIAd6,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Italy,Teamdev s.r.l ,MELTINGPOT APP ,Via Tiberina 70 -06050 Collepepe di Collazzone Perugia  ,0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,Andrea Cruciani ,"Over the past decades, most EU Member States have experienced increasing migration. Migrants from third countries represent around four percent of the total EU population. The composition of EU's population is thus changing, and European societies are faced with increasing diversity.   Demographic trends vary from region to region and need to be addressed through tailor made solutions. If the full benefits from migration are to be realised, Europe needs to find a way to better cope with its diverse and multicultural societies through more effective integration of migrants.

Melting pot App is inspired from the European Union motto ƒ??United in diversityƒ?  deals with the development of a digital ecosystem that facilitate the social and cultural integration of immigrants by developing tailor-made services adopting a one stop shop approach.
The project will use FIREWARE technologies and exploit its potential in order to develop tailored made services targeting immigrant promoting social networking and cultural and social integration.

887,FIAd7,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Greece,WINGS ICT Solutions Ltd. ,myMigraineAid ,"9, Drakontos Street, 16121 Athens ",Consumer health/wellness,B2C,8,#N/A,YES,IN,Kostas/Tsagkaris ,"Currently, there has been an increasing need for developing technology that may realize new disruptive business models reducing healthcare delivery cost, opening up the access to (self-)care and driving a healthier lifestyle adoption. Migraine is a neurological disorder that causes both medical costs and loss of productivity, while it also has significant negative societal impacts. To that respect, this project will deliver a novel mobile application that will increase awareness with respect to migraines and provide personalized information on the causes and first aid in terms of (self-)treatment. The associated cloud platform will exploit 3 heterogeneous kinds of information: a) rich data coming from social media or existing mobile applications, so as to aggregate the past experience of the individuals and build knowledge on causes and treatment
column2: (b) personal information such as the individualƒ??s sex, age, habits and other known medical/environmental/working conditions and c) information from wearable devices that makes health monitoring be pervasive and seamless. The platform will be built and validated using the FI-PPP technologies and enablers, such as for the development of knowledge building mechanisms, while a sustainability plan will be provided elaborating on how the project intends to reach its market potential. column1: 888,FIAd8,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,PoM,PoM , ,0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,Michael Castle ,"The project aims to use technology to help the elderly live independently in the following ways:
1. Well-Being:  Maintain a healthy lifestyle including taking regular exercise via fun oriented gamification.

2. Live at home longer: The inclusion of another family member (often a sibling) gives a more personal approach to health assistance, with the benefit that elderly people are able to stay out of care and in their home for longer.
3. Alerting:  For both emergency situations and also as an early warning system that alerts to health decline.
4. Data & Algorithms: For health gains and cost savings. We will utilise user pattern data, with the option of including external data sets from government and third party health providers.

5. Open Interface: Develop a commercially orientated open interface. Our system will allow and encourage external organisations to connect their home health devices and reporting systems (blood sugar, pulse, heart monitoring etc.) to interface with our system via an API. 890,FIAd10,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Greece,Athens Technology Center S.A. ,HealthBail ,"Rizariou, 10, 15233, Halandri, Athens ",HUMAN HEALTH AND SOCIAL WORK ACTIVITIES,B2B,5,23,YES,IN,Vasilios Tountopoulos ,"The continuous research and innovation in the ICT domain can stand an important counterbalance for the going degradation of the health care services, as a result of the recent recession in most of the business sectors in Europe. The establishment of a healthy behaviour arises as a modern turn for advancing both social and personal welfare and improving the quality of life. Towards this direction, the HealthBail project will deliver an online deliberation platform, which allows the professionals in the health care community, such as medical experts and doctors, build unanimity on defending against emerging symptoms and any kind of medical situations, according to evidence-based recommendations and best practices. Furthermore, the platform aims to relax the barriers for the general public in order to better access the professionalsƒ?? knowledge about shaping and maintaining a healthy stance in all phases of their life, by sharing their symptoms and health related problems with these professionals and developing an early response attitude against such symptoms and medical issues. The outcome of the project stands beyond the replacement of the physical contact with the professionals to handle all types of health care issues, but offers services to virtually connect professionals with each other and with the general public. 893,FIAd13,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Italy,COMMPLA srl ,TRIAGE+ ,"via Nino Bixio 25, 56125 Pisa ",0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,Michele Nannipieri ,"TRIAGE+ aims to deliver an innovative, sustainable solution to facilitate medical triage procedures in Europe being conducted according to the highest medical information standards and in a multilingual context. The solution is enabled by future internet technologies and it allows to take to a superior quality level treatment of foreign patients with language barriers: This is of particular social relevance for migrants, but in general to abate all language barriers in the healthcare system across the European Union and globally.

TRIAGE+ is a unique solution, owing to its technological concept based on 4 Future Internet Generic Enablers, and it strongly contributes to improving the state of the art in the healthcare services delivery value chain, which has great (and growing!) social value. TRIAGE+ will be field-tested in 3 medical presides at the ƒ??natural frontierƒ?? of the EU, i.e. Italy(viz., 1 hospital in Lucca, 1 hospital in Pisa, and 1 pharmacy in Pisa). The end-users will be engaged from project inception & will provide relevant feedback both in the design and in the implementation phases.

The business model of TRIAGE+ will be dual, with one component coming from donations (non-for-profit) and one with SaaS model in selected medical clinics, pharmacies and large touristic facilities (e.g. resorts, cruise ships, etc) ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

This application is a web application which can be seen as a social network providing specific features for the main user, the informal helper, but also for all the actors who play a role at home for the benefit of elderly or disabled persons. AfterHours aims to fill a lack in the coordination of all actors and information exchange between them.

The architecture of AfterHours application will be based on key components of FI-WARE and FI-STAR for security, privacy, context, eventing, patient profile and questionnaires. The result will be a win-win gain whereby AfterHours will benefit from the wealth of FI enablers, and FIWARE will be deployed in the French Market (before to be promoted through European regions). The business approach will be both B2C (direct sale to informal caregivers) and B2B2C (promotion and sale through insurance company which are communicating a lot towards the helpers)

895,FIAd15,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Italy,ManyDesigns srl ,Care4balance ,"Via G.D'Annunzio, 2/51, 16121, Genova ",0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,Angelo Lupo ,"Today 26 millions of European aged persons suffer for cognitive impairment and related comorbidities. They represent about 27% of the actual aged population and their costs for care affect 1,24% of the EU28 GDP. In the mid-long term perspective these costs are not anymore sustainable for the European health care system and innovative care management process and ICT tools are needed. To this end we propose the development of Care4Balance, an unique adaptable and scalable patient-centric solution stimulating health related behavioural changes and self-care management of the patients and enhancing collaboration and coordination of the patients themselves with their familiars, non-professional carers, and health professionals in charge their care. When completed it will also support more proactive monitoring of the evolving conditions (cognitive decline and related comorbidities) of the patients and more personalized decisions on therapies and pharmacological treatments based on a more comprehensive set of patientsƒ?? data. Thanks to Care4Balance, contribution to the aged population QoL improvement and distress the their families and non-professional caregivers are expected together with significant reduction of hospitalization and saving for the health care systems. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

896,FIAd16,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Slovakia,Opinyour s.r.o. ,FI-Mirror ,"?ÿ. Moysesa 443/70, ??iar nad Hronom, 965 01 ",HUMAN HEALTH AND SOCIAL WORK ACTIVITIES,B2B,4,1,YES,IN,Veronika Gilanova ,"The main objective of the FI-Mirror project is to exploit the FI-Adopt accelerator programme by harvesting specific technology from the FIWARE catalogue to develop a web-application and as a consequence facilitate wide deployment and commercialization of its core technology.

Over the last three years, Opinyour has been developing cutting-edge technology for accurate visualization of Augmented Reality spaces targeting training and learning in medical and eHealth applications related to the visualization of facial surgery outcomes. Opinyourƒ??s developments are instantiated as a computational mirror, Opinyour eMirror, acting similarly as real mirrors being able to augment reality by synthesizing imaginary views and features according to the desired application. Current Opinyourƒ??s developments are still limited to a stand-alone application running on a conventional local PC-webcam-display. As a consequence the progress in commercialization and wide adoption has been severely hampered by the lack of an easily accessible web-based service providing the same functionality to any hospital-, medical school- or local surgery-PC over the Internet. An initial market analysis and preliminary trials with specialist surgeons in Slovakia, the UKand Brazil, shows that wide commercialization and adoption of the technology can be only achieved by the provision of a web-based service easily accessible over the internet.
",Tech provider,,0,0,0,0,0,,Software,"Content Analytics, Discovery, and Cognitive Software",Applications,Content Applications,1,X,www.opinyour.com,Startup,139500,opinyour.com

900,FIAd20,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,Intrapreneur ,Intrapreneur Software Solution , ,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Sarah Buxton ,"We are looking to FiWare to support our proposal to build a corporate intrapeneur training program. Allowing corporations to empower their employees by embracing their ideas and supporting them through online resources to bring their proposals to life. Fostering an intrapreneurial culture through collaboration and engagement. And enhancing skills and satisfaction through support, interaction and endorsement.

The intrapreneur training program is a training tool which takes participants through a series of modules and steps which allow them to validate an idea and build the necessary support and resource around it. The user journey is built on a robust methodology which allows users to scope, refine, test and present their innovative ideas to both peers and senior management.

As the individual (and latterly team) works through the 10-step program they are immersed in all the aspects you would expect to encounter and address when working within a startup. The program highlights the areas where they need support - resource, skills and a team is identified.

Once live, using a KickStarter project-support approach, peers and colleagues can vote-up what they perceive to be the best ideas - leaving the team critical feedback to build their own intrapreneur profile.

Fi-ware has an impressive backend framework on which we can build our web application - it's features and infrastructure will allow us to scale in line with the demands of users logging on from large corporations. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

901,FIAd21,FIAd,FI-Adopt,The Netherlands,CoffeeStrap ,CS ,"182 Herengracht, 1016BR, Amsterdam ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Mahesh Casiraghi ,"Online Language Education is a $70B market, with a 22% CAGR, partitioned in 3 areas. Exercises (grammar), Lessons (syntax), and Conversational Skills (fluency). We target the latter: In 2014, 1b smartphone owners can speak at least one language other than their primary, because of online or offline education, professional training, relationships, or life experiences. Conversational skills on mobile is a $15B a year market, that is now opening up, as costs of mobile band and computation decrease. CoffeeStrap is building significant technology internally, and in cooperation with accademia. We rely on the WebRTC protocol for p2p communication, and are among the first to implement it on native mobile. We built a performant API that implements principles we developed for real time DNA sequencing protocol automation, which makes us the only current consumer EdTech tool that can match people for skill exchange purposes on the basis of both profile maps and conversational context aware indices. We are PhD scientists in human and machine learning, with significant IP in both fields [e.g., http://bit.ly/casiraghi2013 / http://bit.ly/maccagnan13]. We know that education is broken [e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eLdU7uts4ws], and that there is a huge demand for Conversational Skills [e.g., http://youtu.be/6HZbBLl4FA0]. It is a pain we experienced in first person, and we know how to solve. We applied knowledge we matured in our academic careers to accurate matching/skill trading. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

905,FIAd25,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Italy,WellBeGram Team,WellBeGram , ,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,ivan paduano ,"Today, 40% work related illness is due to stress, causing 10.4 Million working days lost per year. When stress becomes chronic it leads to burnout, which negatively affects individuals as professionals, family members and citizens. WellBeGram is the first web and mobile platform supporting burnout prevention by using a minigame-based approach for wellbeing tracking and mental resilience improvement. It automatically tracks relevant stress factors affecting the wellbeing status of the user by using dedicated minigames and smartphone-embedded sensors. It also delivers personalized interventions to support mental resilience, which are engaging for the user to adopt. WellBeGram makes wellbeing monitoring more objective and the learning of coping skills compliant with Cognitive-Behavioural Therapy. A validation of WellBeGram to assess its usability, effectiveness and level of engagement will be conducted at the University of Rome LaSapienza and the University of Trento involving at least 100 lecturers and students for three months of usage. WellBeGram revenues come from freemium subscriptions to users and licensing to occupational psychologists, clinics and companies. The WellBeGramƒ??s team is made of experts in game design, occupational psychology and biomedical technologies. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

P??rez ,"Platform for Health ServIces Context-aware (PHySIC) will develop a context aware mHealth 2.0 health and wellness monitoring framework. This framework will monitor usersƒ?? context in real time, and use it to take decisions about the most appropriate actions that have to be conducted by all the actors implied (patients, carers, doctors, health and wellness professionals) in order to optimize the health and wellness of the user. To do this, the platform will employ personalized Health Monitoring Models, knowledge models that will be built by health professionals using a graphical tool included in the platform specifying the different stages of a condition, the parameters that govern stage progression, and the actions to take at any given moment. This Models will be easy to build using graphical abstractions, and therefore could be tailored to the specific needs of a given wellness aspect (nutrition, exercise, etc.), disease, condition, or even a patient. Therefore, a cardiology clinic can use the platform to optimize anti-coagulant dosages so as to avoid the need for physically visiting the doctor
column2: a therapist can build a personalized physical therapy model tailored to each patientƒ??s, to recommend the most appropriate exercise set according to the progress made

Its objective is to cover the full range of needs for the whole customer segment it is addressing, ranging from the amateur, occasional cyclists or families doing a bicycle getaway in a weekend to the professional cyclist and people interested in serious training. 911,FIAd31,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,QPIC,QPIC , ,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Anandana Bakshi ,"QPIC (Questions using Pictures) is a mobile application that aims to take users through a unique, fun and empowering journey.
The APP will allow users to anonymously ask questions with the aid of pictures to a global and/or local (GLOCAL) but customized user base, based on age, gender and location.

There are two key players within the APP, users who ask questions with pictures and users whom answer. Both players are able to receive real time percentile feedback on the questions they ask as well as those that are being answered.
The aim is to receive un-biased and objective opinions on everyday decision making challenges, ranging from what tie or bag to wear to work, to what to eat for breakfast, or where to go on holiday.
The APP will have several key features including an ability to favourite certain questions.
The APP hopes to boost individual confidence, eliminate fear of judgment and encourage social integration GLOCALLY. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

912,FIAd32,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Italy,Trapanese SRL ,KEI ,"Via Romea sud, 175, 48015, Cervia (RA) ",0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,Thomas Trapanese ,"People are willing to give their contribution - the widespread use of forums, communities, blogs is the proof - and to express their opinion in the fields that they like the most. We believe that the next step in the evolution of studying, teaching, learning and sharing knowledge is to combine the instant mobile capabilities of the modern smartphones to the old-fashioned study groups, work groups and domain specific mailing-lists.

KEI, Know Everything Instantly, will help users to ask, answer and review questions only in the previously selected area of interest. They will receive notifications based on the desired frequency and times, so that everybody will contribute as they want to the chosen topics without harassment. Users will access a free service to get faster and more reliable answers, thanks to a new visual approach to Q&A by facilitating answer with no more than two gestures.

Profit and not for profit organizations willing to create private groups and ask questions only to specific categories of users will enjoy the advanced capabilities offered by a premium service: it will grant them the access to reports and customizable advanced statistics coming from profile, statistics and different data from users, for example to realize market analytics, data mining, etc. to boost the impact of their actions. Meath, Ireland ",Consumer leisure/gaming,B2C,2,#N/A,YES,IN,Dr. Ricky Jacob ,"Co-founders of Odikyo, Peter Mooney and Ricky Jacob met at an Irish Research lab (NUIM Maynooth, Ireland) where Ricky had just started his PhD and Peter was a Post Doctoral Researcher. Peter used to participate in various race events. During one conversation over coffee, Peter was emphasising the need for a mobile app for runners which can have multiple functionalities like ƒ?? runner tracking, location updates and performance analysis in real-time and providing health tips and training plans. Thus, an initial prototype was built to test the real-time runner tracking feature and got a few runners to test the product and received feedback. The responses have been positive and the aim now is to integrate core features which will also be required to ensure continuous user engagement.

Ricky received a feasibility study grant of ƒ?ª15,000 from Enterprise Ireland followed by being selected for the Irish National Entrepreneurship Program, New Frontiers where he received a scholarship of ƒ?ª15,000 to work on Odikyo. Both the founders have experience working on data analytics, mobile app development and geospatial technologies. Thus, the technical feasibility of the product is very high. 918,FIAd38,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,500 More Ltd ,WS ,"Colston Office Centre, Colston Street, Bristol, BS1 4TR ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Greg Smart ,"Our project is to develop a mobile app game which you have to walk to play.  Games provide a unique way to engage patients in their care, providing both motivation and empowerment.  Our game, called Walking Safari, uses the design principals of casual and social gaming to create a compelling experience which encourages players to walk.  Players will complete personalised challenges which increase in difficulty.  They can collect animals and share their experiences via Social Media.  For the FI-ADOPT project we aim to implement Walking Safari in a clinical setting where it can be used to encourage patients to walk, both before and after surgery.

As well as the game, which will run on Smartphones, we will exploit the FI-WARE platform to realise a backend infrastructure for data management, a clinicians portal which will provide actionable information, and an adaptive algorithm which will ensure that patients are set challenges that are appropriate for them, in line with their care plan. SAPIN collects and monitors, in real time, data about the physical effort made by each user to perform any physical activity (heart rate, oxygen consumption, body temperature, etc.) as well as environmental data and conditions where the activity occurs (ambient temperature, relative humidity, CO2 level, traffic, GPS position, time ...) in order to analyse and provide statistics about the physical condition of each user, as well as their sporting habits. This analysis will allow the creation of user profiles based on their fitness and their preferences when doing a certain sport, the formation of a large database that will allow to offer a range of services such as search for similar sporting profiles to promote collective and collaborative sports activities, the design of custom tailored exercise programs for each user based on his/her shape and on the conditions of the surrounding environment, the promotion of sporting events based on user preferences, the generation of risk or motivation warnings depending on certain conditions surrounding the user or the creation of alerts / public and private entitiesƒ?? advertisement only with the user's consent. 920,FIAd40,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Spain,AnswareTech s.l. ,PRIME ,"calle Fabricas 8, 2¶? - 28923 Alcorc??n ",0,0,3,1,NO,0,Diego Exp??sito ,"Organizations have their own protocol (tools, plans, procedures, ƒ??) for Emergency Management and there is no standard at European level that ensures optimal and concerted use of available and evolving technologies for the benefit of civil European security. Incidents derived from emergency situations (earthquakes, fire, flood, etc) generally have negative impact that drastically affect the day-to-day operations of the pillars of any Society: in all sectors but special in the industrial sector. No one can escape from this kind of incidents and the resulting consequences might be catastrophic if the necessary measures are not taken on time: Loss of lives, definitive closure of industrial plants, unrecoverable damages of Cultural Heritage, etc. Answare has developed a decision support system specifically designed for crisis management called OPTIMIZER (OPTIMIZation of Resources and Logistics for Emergency and Recovery First Operations). This proposal intends to integrate FI-WARE technologies and cities open data with OPTIMIZER in order to develop a new tool called PRIME. PRIME will focus on supporting local authorities and EU cities to adequately and efficiently react to any incident occurring in their surroundings by enhancing citizensƒ?? preparedness before the crisis and decisions taken during and after it. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,2,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

It enables players to compete against others in their proximity. This can be done in their neighborhood or around points of interest (POI) like touristic landmarks. The Scoreground app applies a virtual grid and heatmap visualization to the world map, and allows players to submit high scores of their favorite games to that grid. Based on their score, the player will be able to conquer territory, achieve a ranking and compete with others on a local, regional or global scale.

By integrating the Scoreground plugin to their games, game developers and publishers will be able to attract more players that will play longer, enabling them to increase their revenue. Scoreground is a dramatic and significant improvement over the often outdated use of high score and rankings functionality in most of today¶ïs games. Key components of this innovative and technical challenge will be met by utilizing the FIWARE infrastructure.

Games and play are able to unite. Scoreground, with its social features, will be the first platform to bridge mass medium entertainment gaming with local social interaction and cultural integration.  ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

935,FIAd55,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,What A Data Limited ,SMALPrint ,"The Dylan Thomas Centre, Somerset Place, Swansea, SA1 1RR ",0,0,3,#N/A,NO,0,Muddasir / Lakhani ,"Over 285 million people worldwide have sight-loss, and 100 people lose their sight everyday in the UKalone. With the world's population ageing rapidly - the number of people with a print disability, through sight loss, dyslexia and learning disabilities is constantly rising. How do we ensure that this growing population gets access to vital printed information found on inaccessible print media? Using QR codes, NFC and RFID, together with a secure and user friendly interface, we propose to design labels that will allow easy, fast and reliable information across various scenarios that leverage on the power of the already in-built accessibility features in smart phones, such as Android and iOS devices.  Additionally the scalable and open source project can be linked with third party calendar, task management and health analytics apps to provide cost effective information in a more amenable and timely way for everyone to suit their own personal needs.  Join us to make the world a more accessible, inclusive place one SMALPrint label at a time. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

937,FIAd57,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,Lexicum Ltd. ,L ,"Office 36, 88-90 Hatton Garden, EC1N 8PN, London ",0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,Stefan Kiryazov ,"Lexicum has a bold goal ƒ?? to revolutionize the way the world learns vocabulary.

At the heart of the Lexicum approach is Spaced Repetition ƒ?? an algorithm that has been backed by solid research spanning as far back as the 30s and has the potential to greatly improve vocabulary acquisition. In order to store words in the long-term memory one needs to review them periodically, at progressively growing intervals. Until recently this approach was limited to theoretical research and awkward practical applications involving jars, piles of flashcards and solid discipline
column2: now, with technology, a practical application of spaced repetition is not only possible but can be delivered as an engaging application that brings with it a lot of other benefits. Ubiquitous, inexpensive devices, fast internet connection and the FI-WARE platform have set the stage for a revolution in the way we memorize foreign words.

column1: The team has already created a prototype used by thousands of beta users which has won the 1st prize at the Language Technology Innovate summit in Brussels and was 2nd at the FIWARE hackathon in Berlin. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

939,FIAd59,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Serbia,"Inovacioni centar Elektrotehnickog fakulteta u Beogradu d.o.o. (Innovation Centre, School of Electrical Engineering, University of Belgrade) ",ClassyGaitPD ,"Bulevar kralja Aleksandra 73, 11000 Belgrade, Serbia ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Milica Djuric-Jovicic ,"Freezing of gait (FOG) is a common cause of falls and consequent injuries of patients with Parkinson's disease (PD), affecting mobility and quality of life. The majority of FOG episodes occur at turns, narrow doorways, and complex pathways. Due to their small size and low power consumption, inertial sensors can be used for objective assessment at home, i.e., as holter monitors. We propose a novel system combining holter concept with an expert system for real-time stride classification based on signals collected from inertial sensors. The system would provide warnings for severe FOG episodes and near-fall situations to patients, but also contact their family or clinicians in emergency cases. Acquired data will be also post-processed and stored for further monitoring by the clinicians. This system will enable clinicians to monitor response to therapy, progress of the disease and to promptly alter the therapy, if needed. 946,FIAd66,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Austria,Waltzing Atoms,WAS , ,0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,Philipp Wissgott ,"By enhancing chemistry courses with multi-media interaction, the Waltzing Atoms software offers a revolutionary tool for modern day teaching.

Everybody remembers chemistry classes in school, where teachers try to explain complicated 3D molecules or the dynamics of chemical reactions with blackboard and books. Waltzing Atoms software changes chemistry courses once and for all: Teachers can broadcast 3D visualizations of molecules, reactions and problems to the students devices. This instantaneous and flexible interaction between the students and the teacher (via PC, web and mobile applications) offers the opportunity to adapt the lecture on-the-fly.

But the scope of the software framework does not end in class: Teachers from all over the world are able to discuss and share chemistry problems on the Waltzing Atoms website. Hence, every teacher can individually pick her/his problems from a rich set of exercises to customize her/his actual curriculum.

The Waltzing Atoms project started 2 months ago. The team consists of Philipp Wissgott and Klemens Senn and started to work full time at the office in Vienna, Austria. Waltzing Atoms is not limited to education: We also develop software solutions for the semi-conducting industry and universities, especially in material science. ",ONMYWAY ,"Calle Cronos, n¶? 63, Planta 4¶?, Oficina 6, 28037, Madrid ",0,0,5,#N/A,NO,0,Agust?ğn Gonz??lez-Quel ,"Currently, society is deep involved in social integration of weak and disadvantaged groups as disable people or elderly. ONMYWAY is a mobile application oriented to help people with disabilities in their location.  The project has the aim to provide with a help-tool for people that get lost in a concrete moment when is alone and outside home. When that happens, the user starts the application and it guides him to a near known place, where he may recognize it and feel confident to continue with his route by himself. Those known places will be spots that user usually visits, can situate easily and are configured before starting using the application. In case that user does not reach any of these points, is completely lost, the application contact with a relative. The aim of ONMYWAY is to provide independence and social integration for any person needed and also a cognitive and memory training for anyone that wants to get used moving in a new city.

ASI, is a company which has developed several European projects, in concrete, working with topics as eHealth, Smart Cities, Social Inclusion, etc. The company has collaborated with many organizations in relation to these topics, e.g. Fundaci??n Prodis and Hospital Gregorio Mara??on, and has deployed an extensive experience working with many different collectives of people. That makes the company realize about the necessities of the users. ASI has extended these necessities to all citizens through ONMYWAY.

949,FIAd69,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,Digital Laundry Limited ,CARE-P ,"47 Hartland Road, London, NW6 6BG ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Susannah Bentley ,"SEE PDF

Care Personified is a commercially viable, scalable, sustainable proposition that directly counters the fundamental issues in social care planning and provision: an industry facing increased demand against a backdrop of austerity. This landscape results in problems meeting all but usersƒ?? basic needs. In turn, poor-quality care leads to unnecessary hospital admissions. With 87% of LAs arranging care for only those with substantial needs, a viable substitute is long overdue.

Care Personified is a new digital service that not only addresses the issues within social care, but also has the potential to improve wellbeing and agency (control over your life). It helps users to understand their wellbeing, reflect on strengths, create goals, and obtain personalised plans, featuring a shareable calendar, and aspiration-focused recommendations. It also offers direct access to support, and provides tools to manage care collaboratively with e.g. family and GPs.

It is grounded in evidence from behaviour change and positive psychology, including PERMA, character strengths, and personal projects. It also incorporates emerging themes such as ƒ??resilient ageing and ƒ??homophilyƒ?? by taking a strengths- and interest-based approach.

Building on the foundation of a successfully concluded R&D exercise, made possible with a grant Innovate UK, this project will focus on development of additional functionality to enhance the proposition, and launch of a ƒ??minimum viable productƒ?? into the market.
950,FIAd70,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Luxembourg,regify S.A. ,regibox health ,"regify S.A., route d'Esch 7, 1470 Luxembourg ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Kurt Kammerer ,"regibox - securely collaborate with a box for docs!
Purpose:
Share and organize important documents in a secure box in order to better collaborate with your business partners and co-workers
Problems:
A group of people works together and input and results of their work to solve: shall be shared securely and easily amongst them.
Resolve typical user problems:
1. several versions of the truth (keeping-up-to-date issues)
2. different file/document structures (search/find issues)
3. security (not all members can send and store securely)
Concept:

Apply the concepts of Dropbox (drop document to store) and Twitter (follower concept) to secure document sharing that keeps everybody in the loop ƒ?? automatically! All document updates are registered and trigger secure synchronization across the group. Any regibox activation uses the regify clearing service. Doc-oriented collaboration with automated security:
USPƒ??s:
+ Trusted, independent 3rd party (TITP) stores regibox encryption keys.  Tracking details from TITP about any regibox activation.
+ Companies can build their own regibox cloud solution (in their own responsibility, data center, inhouse), and leverage clearing
+ Superior access control through TITP  Example: If a device gets lost, access can be revoked. If the lost device goes online, any local regibox content is deleted automatically

958,FIAd78,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,Aerian Studios Ltd ,CSL ,"The Old Malthouse, Mill Lane, Box, Corsham, Wiltshire, SN13 8PN, UK",0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,Ian Spero ,"Digital technologies enable us to connect, create and share in a way that has never been possible before. For those suffering from chronic life-threatening conditions, which generally results in reduced mobility, technology can also provide a link to communities and conversations that would previously have been impossible.

Engagement in creativity is associated with improvements in sleep quality, stress, immune system, pain relief, emotional state and reduced hospital length of stay. However, the asserted link between creativity and health is still just a school of thought. Our project aims to establish an evidence base that validates the impact of digitally-applied creativity for palliative care: to demonstrate definitely, objectively and scientifically that creativity is beneficial for health and well-being, and to translate these findings into a scalable, economically viable commercial proposition that can improve quality of life for tens of thousands of people.

FiGlass splits these problems in three major categories to resolve them more efficiently:

962,FIAd82,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,Our Path Ltd ,OurPath ,"St. Marys Close, 40, OX33 1YP, Oxford ",0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,Michael Gibbs ,"Being diagnosed with diabetes is a scary thing. We want to help.

Within OurPath, we believe that technology can be used to positively influence peopleƒ??s lives and help motivate them live a healthier lifestyle. Our diabetes smartphone application is designed to be an all-encompassing coaching and self-management app, which will test the best methods to help motivate diabetics live a healthier lifestyle (i.e., improved diet, exercise, and medication compliance).

In addition, OurPath will securely gather and provide information to healthcare professionals to help them better understand the needs of their diabetes population. For example, data delivered to a patient's doctor or nurse can help them make more informed treatment decisions, while anonymised summary statistics on the whole diabetes population can be provided to the NHS to help them make high level decisions on optimal drug procurement.

969,FIAd89,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,XD Studios Ltd ,Mozaic ,"King Road,Unit 4 Technium 1, SA1 8PH, Swansea ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Martin McCarthy ,"MosaicHealth is a social, game based solution to the task of changing the personal attitudes and behaviors of populations towards their health, in order to help avoid the looming healthcare crisis posed by Diabetes. MosaicHealths aim is to help manage or prevent diabetes in innovative and disruptive ways, while tackling the fundamental issues of behavioral change and education of users towards the condition and healthy living. The growing trend in increased connectivity through smartphone distribution, wearable technology and the internet of things provides the perfect environment for this approach. The irony of the current crisis around Diabetes is that the condition itself (Type-2) is largely preventable, and the majority of costs, nearly 80%, comes from complications due, in general, to inaccurate management of the condition.3 This project aims to combat both of these issues, and as such the impact on society is potentially huge. There is currently no service aiming to cover what this project aims to cover and to our knowledge no service aiming to do it in the manner proposed. It is a fresh and innovative look at an ongoing and increasingly severe world problem and the outcome is designed to be as disruptive to current practices as possible in order to create the biggest change. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

982,FIAd102,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Poland,memo24.net,Memo24 , ,Consumer health/wellness,B2C,1,#N/A,YES,IN,Hichem Boudali ,"Memo24 is a voice reminder and alert system intended for medication intake compliance and adherence. The primary recipients for such reminders are elderly and visually impaired people for whom SMS notifications or carrying an extra electronic reminder device are not viable and practicable solutions. Memo24 is nonintrusive and web-based, accessible to anyone who has an online account. Memo24 allows you to automatically place a phone call with some text message you have defined to be played to a callee. In 2006, there were 26.6 million people worldwide with Alzheimerƒ??s disease (a form of dementia), and Alzheimer's is predicted to affect 1 in 85 people globally by 2050 . In Europe alone, there were 11 million dementia patients in 2013 and this number is estimated to rise to 21 million by 2050 . Given this fact, Memo24 is particularly suitable for elderly persons suffering from memory loss (such as Alzheimerƒ??s disease patients). In fact, many studies have proven already the effectiveness of voice reminders in reducing the risk of people not taking their medications and thus reducing the risks related to health complications (check for instance this article http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3422829 from the American National Centre for Biotechnology Information). The idea is to identify usersƒ?? location or to have users to identify their locations of interest, and then:
- calculate two bioclimatic indices in nearby areas
- present to users the real feeling of other people about the current environmental conditions in their vicinity via a crowdsourcing component.

Via ENVI4ALL any user will have access to information on health-related environmental conditions, whatever the locations of their interest are. For the indicesƒ?? calculation, ENVI4ALL will use weather information and air quality data acquired from the authorities which have the selected locations under their jurisdiction. But even in locations for which there is lack of data, users will have access to the ENVI4ALL crowdsourcing component and they will be informed about how other people in their vicinity feel regarding the environmental conditions. Thus, they will be able to adapt their activities and behaviour in order to avoid health impairments.

Our medical Algorithm was built by students and employees from the Universities of Harvard (US), Munich (GER), Gie??en (GER) and Wuerzburg (GER) as well as practitioners and chief physicians and contains more than 2000 individual medical questions.

990,FIAd110,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Greece,LIME Technology ,WeLiveActive ,"Dodonis 9, 45221, Ioannina ",0,0,3,#N/A,NO,0,Christos Bellos ,"Everyone exposed to 21st century lifestyle is vulnerable to the behavioural and environmental risk factors that contribute to health problems (i.e. unhealthy diet, physical inactivity, workplace stress). This serves to underpin the urgency of the need for a new health services paradigm.

WeLiveActive aims to engage people to participate in the self-management process of their health and wellbeing and change the focus from hospital to home and self-management, from patient to citizen and from disease management to prevention. In the scope of the WeLiveActive solution there will be addressed key health and wellbeing challenges by: (i) delivering an interoperable and scalable Data Collection Middleware in order to facilitate secure data access by Connected Devices, (ii) establishing a sustainable and scalable ecosystem, where multi-stakeholders could have access, acting as a supportive environment for citizens towards their health management process in a holistic multi-factorial approach, (iii) fusing several factors (i.e. nutrition, lifestyle, social, behavioural, emotional, clinical, environmental) towards big data analysis and behavioural modelling research activities into the care process and (iv) delivering a Smart Health and Wellness solution by incorporating health education information and innovative motivational tools (i.e. gamification) to engage users into the self-management process of their health and wellbeing. ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

991,FIAd111,FIAd,FI-Adopt,The Netherlands,Konnektid BV ,KAPP ,"Haarlemmerweg 10C, 1014 BE Amsterdam  ",0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,Michel Visser ,"Konnektid a website for peer to peer education. We believe you learn anything from people within your own neighbourhood. By sharing your skills you can help yourself and others to develop and let our neighbourhood become our own University.

On the 10th of april we launched Konnektid in the Netherlands. By now we have a community of 2400+ skillsharers. We created a system which radically lowers the amount of people you need for a liquid market place. A lot of market places which are listings based get low amount or no transactions at all. For example: 50 people who list their skills gives a maximum of avg. 150 skills nearby. Konnektid turns it around by asking your neighbours if they have a certain skill. This way we tap into all knowledge available. Right now 60 - 70% of all requests get at least one offer within a day!

We apply for a FI-Adopt fund to be able to accelerate our growth in The Netherlandsand Europe. FI-ware enables us to integrate services like geolocation, data handling and sharing open data, which really helps us to create better matches and services for our members and most important help more people to connect and learn from each other.

992,FIAd112,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Romania,Babele create together Srl ,Babele ,"Str Dorneasca, nr 11, bloc P79, sc 2, ap 59, sector 5, Bucuresti ",0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,Ruxandra Creosteanu ,"Babele is an open innovation platform that aims to support the development of social businesses through crowd-sourcing. It provides the learning tools and the collaborative environment for social entrepreneurs to easily structure their idea into a business model and crowd-validate their strategy using their network of beneficiaries, mentors and stakeholders.

The crowd can give feedback, provide answers, post documents, share statistics and help social entrepreneurs learn how to improve their ideas into viable business models and add value from conception to implementation.
Social entrepreneurs and NGOs are key beneficiaries of our social business and they can use the platform for free.
Organizations with mentoring and crowdsourcing programs for projects are paying customers.

They can create private innovation communities where to invite managers, employees, partners and advisors into a secure environment for collaborative project development. Here they can conceive, validate and implement smarter business solutions, together.

993,FIAd113,FIAd,FI-Adopt,UK,Concepts and Creations Limited,WHITEboard,0,"Consumer education/culture, EDUCATION",B2B/B2C,4,2,YES,IN,Saverio Blasi,"ELearning is dramatically impacting education world-wide. The most challenging issue for eLearning technology to become widely used is that the volume of media transmission needed to achieve substantial benefits is still very limited. WHITEboard aims at tackling this problem by building on cutting-edge technology in the field of multimedia content compression, exchange and delivery, to allow for a rich remote learning experience while exploiting the increasing ubiquity of devices such as smartphones and tablets. The main output of the project consists of a wireless application designed to create, share and display high-quality video lectures while providing real-time feedback and interaction among teachers and learners. The fundamental assumption and concept of this project revolves around the fact that external data, captured by small portable devices, along with the video signal can be manipulated and processed to assist a video encoding scheme able to support a superior eLearning system. The resulting ?eLearning tailored? video encoder makes use of that external data to drastically improve the performance over state-of-the-art encoders by reducing computational complexity while increasing compression efficiency. Exploiting effective FIWARE assets to considerably accelerate the development of the proposed technology this project will deliver a market-ready eLearning application that overcomes the limitations of available architectures and systems. ",Service Provider,0,0,0,X,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,2,X,0,Startup,149.750.00?,cncuk.co

TrainStorm enables knowledge transfer through social collaboration between the trainer and the trainee, among the trainees belonging to the same or different companies through the TrainStorm Training Hub.

BrainStorm will develop this novel corporate training platform primarily to improve the training services it offers to its customers and resellers, considering that fast and efficient training on new products is mandatory for the market penetration. We propose to develop an innovative platform that utilizes smart, networked sensors and monitors to transform elder?s homes into a smart assisted living environment, making elders more independent and letting doctors, professional caretakers and relatives keep tabs from afar. Fernandez Gonzalez,"A citizen science innovative project for fighting forest pests and diseases in ope, helping specialists in the field work, for new actions and investigations. Forest 112 is an alert and monitoring citizen system for pests and forest diseases, which lead to suppose the basis for researchers in phytosanitary issues. The objective of the project is to establish a scientific volunteers citizen network, using new technologies to learn, and supply and visualize pests and forest diseases in ope data.

column1: Thus, with this project, a task traditionally taken only by technical public administration services, will be shared and performed by citizenship. Training contents will enhance volunteers to perform these tasks properly.

Citizen science may be performed by individuals, teams, or networks of volunteers. Citizen scientists often partner with professional scientists to achieve common goals. Large volunteer networks often allow scientists to accomplish tasks that would be too expensive or time consuming to accomplish through other means.

This project allows scientific teams to monitorize and supervise task performed by volunteers, to assure the scientific validity of the results obtained with this tool.",Tech Provider,0,0,0,0,0,0,,Software,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,2,X,0,SME,150000,Irdetec.com

column1: 1004,FIAd124,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Cyprus,A.G.C STUDENT LIFE LTD,PitchPoint,0,0,0,6,0,YES,0,0,"""StudentLife is the leading multi-service platform that serves students in Cyprus. StudentLife has identified a real need of its community which includes close to 30,000 members: mostly after they have graduated but also during their studies, students and graduates are looking for job positions that match their skills. Usually, this mandates the development of additional skills (e.g. relevant to presentation or entreprenship).
Within PitchPoint, the StudentLife team will develop a new service called ?PitchPoint?, which includes

-an arena for students to pitch their skills to find job positions. This arena can be considered as a marketplace where students pitch their skills and potential employers can select the most appropriate candidate and ?meet? him/her through the platform video-conferencing tools.

-a marketplace for training material and tutoring services. Training suppliers (either students or professionals) declare their offerings - targeted skill/course, type of material and activity, pricing scheme (free or not and charge rate). Interested students and graduates select the training resource that matches their interest and once they try it, they rate it to enable quality ranking. The training services can be offered on charge, free of charge or can be traded based on platform-specific points encouraging exchange of knowledge among students.

The PitchPoint platform will support material upload both for students pitching and for training material and social networking functionality to facilitate communication among the involved stakeholders.""",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,3,0,0,SME,149500,studentlife.com.cy
1005,FIAd125,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Belgium,0,Speaky,0,0,0,N/A,0,YES,0,0,"""Speaky is social network to learn languages by meeting and practicing with native speakers.

Every single person on earth has this pretty awesome quality of being a native speaker in a language. At Speaky, we connect those native speakers to create language partners ? or what we call language buddies ? so that they can learn by practicing together.

What is so unique and different about Speaky is that we build the essential tools and the environment for language learners to practice online by giving every native speaker the opportunity to learn from others while sharing his knowledge.
This includes:
? A powerful matchmaking algorithm to find the perfect language partner(s).
? An integrated chat and video chat service directly available from the browser and mobile devices.
? A ?language feed? enabling content sharing and social interactions.

? Integrated language oriented tools such as an integrated translator, message correction system and multi-language keyboards.""",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,3,0,0,Group of Entrepreneurs,86000,360.eai.eu

1009,FIAd129,FIAd,FI-Adopt,Israel,NoviQR,0,0,0,0,N/A,0,YES,IN,Alex Pasternak,"Today, chronic diseases are a huge problem in ope, with 1 out of 3 adults suffering and soon becoming 1 out of 2, costing Billions to the health system and the economy and hurting the lives of millions. Moreover, most current treatments are based on recommendations by a GP or local specialist, whereas the actual best solutions are integrative: combining traditional medicine, alternative treatments and lifestyle changes. So why are so many people not receiving this treatment? Because they have no access to these options in an easy, reliable and comprehensive way. The amount of information online is overwhelming, making it virtually impossible to find reliable and trustworthy new solutions. Even when one is found, it is very difficult to find a doctor or therapist who uses it for a consultation. noviQr is an online platform destined to change all of that. It is the first comprehensive eHealth platform providing personalized, integrative lifestyle-changing solutions to people that suffer from Chronic diseases, enabling them to immediately engage and try new solutions with top professionals, and then supporting them in an ongoing fashion, all in one place. In this project, noviQr will be focusing on IBD1 patients where the combination of Alternative solutions, with traditional and nutritional changes has proved to vastly improve the condition of people, and where noviQr has the best specialists to work with. noviQr will pilot the solution in Israel and the Netherlands. noviQr's team is made up of very experienced entreprens and experts in start-ups, Web and health products, with strong connections in the target market.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,3,0,0,Group of Entrepreneurs,147000,0

1013,FICO4,FICO,FICO,France,Hostabee,Hostabee,"101 rue du G‚n‚ral Leclerc, Faubourg Num‚rique, 02100 SAINT-QUENTIN, France","AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY AND FISHING",B2B,3,0,YES,IN,Vincent Demortier,"Bee API is a connected beehive with associated services to remotely manage the apiaries life cycles in cities. Thanks to IoT technology, Bee API aims to foster the implementation and exploitation of beehives in smart territories. Indeed, urban beekeeping is on a dynamic trend (especially in big cities like London, Johannesburg, Hong-Kong,...) but it is not yet well integrated in cities life and the two ?traditional? business models still operate: on one hand, apiaries managed by professional beekeepers who sell honey, on the other hand, passionate individuals or non-profit associations producing honey for their own consumption.
ÿ

Bee API introduces a new urban business model for an ancestral and rural activity allowing a larger deployment of apiculture in urban areas: Any citizen, company, or city having appropriate locations to do so, can rent and host beehives to locally produce honey. The hives are managed by experienced beekeepers, operating as services providers who can anticipate and plan their operations thanks to to the remote control of the Bee API hives : embedded sensors and actuators provide the capability to manage the status of a hive from web services and apps. The harvested honey is shared by the host and the beekeeper.
ÿ
Then,ÿBee API leverages FIWARE technology in order to:
ease bees and cities inhabitants cohabitationÿ
optimize urban beekeepers logistics
implement agile and ultra-short distribution channels
publish open data sets about urban apiaries (namely for scientific analysis)
ÿ

Finally, as they are in great danger at the countryside,ÿBee APIÿcontributes to preserve bees, keeping in mind the famous Einstein's statement: ""If bee disappears from the surface of the earth, man would have no more than four years to live"".
ÿ
ÿ",Tech provider,X,X,0,0,X,X,,Hardware,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,1,X,http://www.hostabee.com/,SME,137000,hostabee.com

1022,FICO13,FICO,FICO,Spain,AnySolution S.L.,SmartLock an IOT connected intelligent door lock,"Cam¡ de Ca Na Gallura, 7, 07010 Palma de Mallorca , Spain",0,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Door locks have existed for over 2000 years. Modern mechanical locks are effective and difficult to pick
column2: but do have serious limitations and security issues:

column1: To allow access to third parties, extra keys must be issued or hidden for later recovery resulting in security issues.
Often, keys are not returned and locks must be changed.
When keys are returned it is not known if duplicate keys have been cut.
Administrators have no warning or time record of forced entry or the use of illegaly held keys
If keys are lost a locksmith or forced entry is required
Administrative chaos can result from the accumulation of keys when dealing with multiple properties
ÿ
SL (SmartLock) offers greater security, convenience and, data acquisition and storage for the user:
Administrators can give access to secure areas on a limited basis without issuing physical keys. For example a plumber can be given access to the kitchen only
SL can communicate with internal devices, other SLs and security systemsÿ to control area access.
A complete user record is generated and stored via the IoT cloud.
Key privileges can be terminated at any time
There is no risk of additional keys being cut

Inbuilt accelerometers can detect attempted forced entry. SL can then notifying an administrator immediately, recording the date and time of the event and can turn on lights and issue verbal warnings to intruders
SL will be operated with a mobile application
If a mobile device is lost or forgotten or, SL can be operated via the IoT cloud using another device or laptop
SL credentials can be reset via the IoT cloud if a control device is stolen or lost
An installed peep hole camera can identify who is requesting entry and access given or denied remotely
An inbuilt microphone and speaker provides communication between an administrator and a third partyÿ",0,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A
