Zaragoza 18, 1? of. 2, 26006 Logro?o, Spain","Consumer health/wellness, HUMAN HEALTH AND SOCIAL WORK ACTIVITIES",B2B/B2C,0,0,YES,IN,Sara Madariaga,"Approximately 50 million people worldwide have epilepsy, an illness characterized by recurrent seizures. The estimated
proportion of the general population with active epilepsy is between 4 and 10 per 1000 people. Globally, an estimated 2.4 million
people are diagnosed with epilepsy each year.
When patients suffer generalized convulsions there is a risk for them of being injured or having a cardiac arrest. Caregivers
(usually patients? relatives) reduce this risk by being alert and applying techniques such as holding the patients, putting them in
a certain stance or providing them with the prescribed drugs. The problem worsens when seizures occur at night-time.
Caregivers usually sleep in the same bedroom as patients and cannot rest due to the constant concern, leading to
inconveniences such as loss of privacy, bad resting and higher risk for patients. This project aims to improve the lives of people
affected by epilepsy, both patients and caregivers, providing them with an effective and unobtrusive device to monitor patients
and alert caregivers during night-time seizures.
This project consists on a patient-auto adaptive system to detect, video-record and alert caregivers of night-time seizures, linked
to private cloud platform for medical tracking of patients and big data exploitation. The main innovative characteristics of
SEIZSAFE are:
? Patient-auto-adaptive and self-learning algorithm for seizure detection.
? Camera and cloud platform for doctors.
? Reduced-cost technology.
? Medical validation.

1255,FICO246,FICO,FICO,Israel,Project Ray Ltd.,BT (Blind Touch),13 Atnufa ST, 20692 Yokneam, Israel",Consumer health/wellness,B2C,0,0,YES,IN,Boaz Zilberman,"Project RAY (RAY) goal is to provide blind and visually impaired people with operative solutions that will dramatically improve
their day-to-day independence, addressing the barriers that prevent blind people from using today's most popular device: The
smartphone.
Blind Touch (BT) objectives for this call are to upscale RAY?s current range of solutions for the blind and visually impaired,
available for customers in Israel, and to localize it to two European countries.
Smartphones are a huge part of our day-to-day lives. Needless to list all the advantages it entails, but suffice to say it greatly
improves our ability to connect, feel safe, independent, provide useful information, knowledge, convenience and all at arm's
length. However, blind people encounter obvious difficulties and cannot benefit from all the advantages they entail.
Ray provides a solution based on technology especially designed to facilitate the operation of smartphones by blind and visually
impaired people and allow them to actively use smartphones as part of their day-to-day life. Ray technology is operated by
touch, sounds, and hepatic feedback allowing - users to use only two senses while operating their smartphone. RAY features a
simple, homogenous user interface across all system functions and applications, using three interaction entities. BT brings the
benefits of smartphone technologies, into the hands of blind, providing many advanced services such as: voice calls,
messaging, calendar, navigation, voice recording, emergency services, integration to audio libraries, colour identification,
pictures transcript, and banknote recognition.
BT also provides cloud-based, remote assistance features enabling caregivers and family members of the blind to provide an
immediate, interactive remote support if needed.

blood sugar measurements, calories intake, insulin and medication doses, blood pressure, physical activity, mealtime. One of
the paramount problems of these people is the emergency note incidents.
Given that diabetes is the fourth most common cause of death in Europe, it is very important to underpin and facilitate patients?
daily routine and help them have control of their life. The proposed mobile application targets at the daily self- as well as
automated data feed. The application will initially calculate nutrition values and will generate logs to print or sync with an online
database and share all these data with doctors. Additionally, in case of patient?s emergency it will act as an alarm so as to save
his life. What is more, the app will allow access to the patient?s authorized doctor enabling him to provide patients with optimum
care by accessing real time data, logging on prescriptions and comments.
One of the strong points of the proposed application is its automated function of acquiring data from different devices-
applications such as: a) blood glucose laser or invasive meter devices that export digital data, b) GPS
application that calculates the running and walking exercise of the patients and c) heart rate measuring devices that detect

will be ready by the time you arrive home.

1264,Fini1,Fini,Finish,The Netherlands,People 4 Earth,AgriPlace - Compliance Made Easy for Flower Growers,"Oostenburgermiddenstraat 206 Amsterdam, Netherlands",0,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,#N/A,"Lack of standardization in farm data collection and sharingÿÿ

Demands for transparency are increasing. Transparency is no longer confined to traceability and food safety, but includes ethical, environmental and governance issues. Retail today demands more accurate and faster information, requesting real-time data before trade transactions even take place. This shift from trust-based to proof-based chain relationships is notable in all aspects of trade and requires digitalization and data management on farm.

Farms are faced with these information requirements from different importers, using a great variety in forms and formats. Although these forms and formats cover similar issues and ask for the same pieces of evidence, standardisation in data gathering is limited. Farm level data is often entered multiple times. Collected data resides with consultants, auditors, importers or traders and data re-use is minimal. Limited data standardization and poor data management on farms result in high transaction costs for farmers, auditors, importers, retail and the consumer.
ÿ
A cooperative platform where farmers collect, own, use and re-use data for sustainable production

Different transparency requirements of consumers, standard-setting organizations and buyers need further standardization, thereby facilitating more effective farm data collection and management. AgriPlace offers a solution. AgriPlace is a service for farmers to collect, improve and share data to respond to broader transparency demands, including all aspects of sustainable production. Agri and food companies, retailers, importers and others will use AgriPlace to get direct access to reliable and accurate farm data, with permission of the farmer. AgriPlace makes data entry easy for farmers with a clear and simple user interface. It identifies data overlap between information requirements and facilitates re-use. By working with auditors and standard setting bodies, the platform improves harmonization of sustainability data and existing verification processes. Farmers will get more control over their own business data. Compliance will become easier and more cost-effective across the value chain. Administrative burdens will be reduced and chain transparency will increase for buyers and consumers.
ÿ

This proposal aims to develop a farm data collection and sharing platform that makes compliance easy for flower growers globally, establishing proof of principle with Dutch growers first. Such platform enhances a value-based, information rich flower supply chain.ÿÿ",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1286,Fini23,Fini,Finish,The Netherlands,LimeTri BV,Demand Forecast Management App,"Zuiderdiep 222, 9571 BM 2e Exlo‰rmond, Netherlands",0,0,#N/A,#N/A,NO,0,#N/A,"ÿDemand Forecast Management App aims to be the key tool use by manager responsible to control, monitor and maintain a store of perishable products. The key difference between Demand Forecast Management App and other tools is the global analysis of the Demand against the Capacity of the products from the global business supply chain point of view. Therefore, analysis is not only focus on one specific participant rather than a global analysis of the Demand from the creation of the product to the final customer delivery.

Benefits of the analysis can be extended across the supply chain business participants with the goal to align demand vs capacity reducing the variability. column3: REPAIR OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND MOTORCYCLES",B2B,10,17,YES,IN,"Nitesh Bharosa (n.bharosa@thauris.nl, +31642751870)","The multi-sided platform visualizes the level of quality control in a meat supply chain for companies and supervisory bodies. One of the applications is food safety control: both the quality control department of a company and the supervisory body can access reliable and timely data on meat quality (e.g., salmonella, e-coli levels) provided by a certified laboratory. While the platform has already been tested with and adopted by one of the largest abattoirs in Europe, the Netherlands Food and Consumer Product Safety Authority promotes the research and development of a solution for data-integrity assurance. This proposal seeks the means to develop a fully automated triangulation service for data-integrity assurance in meat supply chains. The purpose of the triangulation service is to automatically compare food safety data provided by the abattoir with source data at the certified laboratory. The realization of such a triangulation service ? within the broader set of controls of the multi-sided platform ? should result in infallible quality control system for the entire meat industry in Europe.",Service provider,0,0,0,0,X,0,,0,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,2,0,0,SME,"? 148,998.00",thauris.nl

column1: 1317,Fini54,Fini,Finish,Greece,Upcom Ltd,FerTility,"Souliou 2, 17342 Athens, Greece","AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY AND FISHING",B2B,16,8,YES,IN,"Filitsa Chasapi (fchasapi@upcom.eu, +306972416043)","The project to be developed stands for the ?Fish Direct Purchase & Traceability?, acknowledged as ?FerTility?. Fish Direct Purchase will enable users to by-pass traditional distribution channels and purchase fish and seafood directly from the producers, giving priority to local ones. Fish traceability will enable the monitoring of the fish temperature from the time it is packed until it is delivered to the end-user/client. 1328,CEED11,CEED,CEED Tech,Czech Republic,elaVox,elaVox,null,0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,0,"elaVox is a service that brings teachers, learners, tutors, learning materials and learning tools together, allowing learners to have an effective, high-intensity learning experience with high focus on easy to use factor. We use a reference (rating) system to allow learners to find the right teacher for them in terms of time preferences, teacher specialization and, of course, budgetary limitations. By having a vast number of teachers registered, and by carefully assessing student needs by means of electronic testing and prior learning assessments, we will offer students all over the world the opportunity to join groups, or study privately, 24/7. Learning intensity will be enhanced using our own blended learning (B-learning) model and mobile learning (M-learning) applications.

The B-learning model combines the following eight course components: 1) Live, online language instruction at the student's exact level and addressing their exact current needs while course respecting lesson continuity and by following a standardized curriculum
column2: 2) Tutoring with native speaking tutors (conversational language) to supplement lessons and course materials
column3: 3) E-learning materials reinforcing material taught
column4: 4) Online language lab lessons to provide extra speaking and listening practice
column5: 5) Self checks and progress testing
column6: 6) Recorded lessons to be viewed for revision
column7: 7) Learner-to-learner networking and forums for peer teaching and learning
column8: 8) Mobile learning apps (e.g. personal dictionary and vocabulary games).

column1: These blended (B-learning) media will be accessed either through desktop computers or with hand-held devices (M-learning) on easy-to-use mobile apps. Learners will connect with the teacher of their choice at the time of their choice, who will know the learners needs prior to the lesson by means of referencing our unique individual-student progress tracking system.

Thus, by combining learners with common needs in real time lessons and tutorials, and by providing them with electronic self study and peer teaching, we can reduce per-hour costs to the student while enhancing attention to individual needs regardless of the student's location.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1338,CEED21,CEED,CEED Tech,Hungary,Pay-by-Phone  Parking,ELTE-Soft Non-profit Ltd.,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Describe your product/service
The application development aims two user modes:
1.	solution developed only for SmartPhone (SMS-based),
2.	solution for SmartPhone-server connection (3G, 4G data distribution)

1 The standalone application for SmartPhones is working on mobile devices uploaded and provided with the up-to-date data of the cities? parking zones and parking meters. Having the disadvantage that only one city/zone/country data are applicable. Data actualization is possible only with live internet connection. The app is capable for use without an uploaded database
column2: in this case user shall drive to the parking meter (for the first ID scanning, in every zone) ? and this is even much more convenient than traditional SMS-based solutions.

column1: 2 On a higher level, we use mobile phones for measure and data collection, all other functions are provided by a central server. As a server operation, we can make a choice between several functions. In a most complex case, the driver defines the address (or vicinity) where he/she intends to park. The centre evaluates the vehicle position and possible parking places, then makes and sends a suggestion to the driver. In case of multi-users, the system is capable of forecasting fullness
column2: showing closest parking place with most free places. In large events, we can redirect cars to the closest parking places.

column1: Mobile app can be started at the moment of parking. Mobile device reads GPS coordinates, then sends this information to a server, where coordinates will be validated by the mobile towers. Server sends the information about the parking zone where we stopped.

Huge advantage of the server solution is that we are capable of sending actual traffic information to the car driver (if access is provided to those data), so we can inform drivers about temporary parking bans, closed roads or evacuations, etc.
If the vehicle is parking in a controlled (fee) parking zone, the following pre-defined data can be modified on the mobile phone:
?	registration number
?	defined fix parking time, or prolonged paying until stop sign
?	automatic prolongation after fix time ? or no prolongation.
The app sends the answers to the server, where the data file for pay start is assembled and communicated to the parking company?s system.
The confirmatory SMS is verified by the app:
?	In normal case, affirms the pay start.
?	In case of a disabled (faulty) parking system, alerts the driver.

In case of a fix or maximized parking time, if no automatic prolongation is defined, the app alerts driver before time expiration. The driver has the possibility to leave or to restart payment request.
If driver defines continued parking, and in interruption, the driver shall select the applicable function on his SmartPhone. In this case, the confirmation is also processed:
?	In lowered SMS-mode, if no stop-confirmation was sent, alerts the car driver.
?	Parking fees are collected in a separate database, and this database is queried at a later time.
In both modes, and in free parking zones a useful function is applicable: support for finding parking car: based on coordinates registered at stop, the app marks the location of car on the map.
Advantages of Pay-by-Phone Parking system:
?	useful for the parking company: cheap maintenance (less parking meter needed)

?	useful for the car drivers: no more risk of time expiration, shorter time  to pay as for a parking meter. The parking zones borders are more easily defined by GPS and a database, than the public places do (with painted marks and signposts). Disadvantage: transactional fees for drivers. In solutions based on data traffic, the SMS charges are saved.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1355,CEED38,CEED,CEED Tech,Estonia,MotionChart,MotionChart,null,0,0,3,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Step 1

We have created a platform and data transmission capabilities from different vendor's consumer fitness/wellness devices to capture, store, analyze and visualize personal activity and main vital signs (Blood pressure, Pulse oximetry, Glucose level, Sleep / Activity, Body analyzer)
Sensor data is transmitted securely and automatically to our database (currently hosted in cloud, in the future also inhouse installation will be supported).

We have currently built an elementary module for data analytics which aggregates feeds from multiple sensors to single user-friendly interface enabling potential applications for doctors and therapists to analyze patients? activities and changes in their conditions and trends. Future plans include automatic alerts and recommendations based on thresholds and trend variations.

End users (medical professionals, caregivers and patients) can access the health information using internet enabled devices like smartphones, tablets, computers through our web interface. In the future we are planning to connect and leverage Estonian NHR system (which is interconnected to our customers HIS) to reach bigger customer base. We also have the capabilities to interface with customer's HIS (through an API).
Step 2

Access to health trends information makes it easier for the medical professional to assess different diagnosis. The interface will be designed with fields and tools relevant to tracking the specific diagnosis and helping the medical professionals to manage and provision different diagnosis easier.

To improve the service, automatic health data monitoring solutions, workflow optimization and information management between different actors is needed. Therefore we have focused on platform -centric approach connecting diagnostics, assessment, treatments and monitoring. So we see the need for specialized aggregating service with a focused approach connecting with domain specific assessment and treatment plans.

1368,CEED51,CEED,CEED Tech,UK,Screen Zero,ScreenZero,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"The ScreenZero solution provides a consolidated cloud based service for managing multiple signage end points and dynamically managing the content and services hosted by this signage.

b) public space/interactive device: these typically can be found in shopping malls, museums, high street installations. They can be interacted with by public and provide useful interactive services

c) private space/passive device: such as meeting room indications. These can help with the dynamic allocation of real estate assets: meeting rooms consulting rooms etc. This helps councils optimise their use of resources

- centrally, and securely, using a policy framework that allows for rich delegation and segmentation of administrative functions
- cheaply, using commodotised hardware and interoperable protocol layers",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1373,CEED56,CEED,CEED Tech,Sweden,LuminGo,Lumingo,Sweden,"ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING SUPPLY",0,5,0,NO,0,Peik Stenlund,"The system architecture for our Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition system will include:

- A network of Smart Batteries. Every battery is located at consumers premises and will be charged during off- peak periods. The batteries will provide electricity to the end-consumer during peak hours and during power outages.
- A telemetry System based on individual meters and control systems sending and receiving information via GSM network to a firewall.
- A Grid Management Software gives to the grid operator new possibilities to manage the grid by monitoring the state of the batteries and controlling the power supply of individual consumers.

By connecting individual back-up systems at the end-user level, the grid operator can manage a network of back- up units to control the demand and optimise the use of back up power to enable peak shaving. At a system level, the integration of back-up units in the grid management will reduce the frequency of power outages. The electricity consumer will be given financial incentive to allow the individual back up system to be used for this purpose, while still being guaranteed continuous access to power.",Tech provider,X,0,0,0,0,0,,0,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1380,CEED63,CEED,CEED Tech,Italy,SaveNRG,Rigel Engineering S.r.l.,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"A low-cost, not invasive, easy-to-install and to easy-to-use solution for monitoring, analysing and controlling the electrical power consumption in buildings. Unlike similar products and previous approaches proposed in the market, we try to reduce as much as possible the use of measurement devices. Instead, we focus on developing methods and algorithms to extract a large quantity of data from aggregate measures. Aggregate measures are already typically available in buildings since, recently, electricity suppliers have replaced the old electricity meters with novel smart meters, which can provide instantaneous aggregate measures. Thus, we are developing techniques that allow us to avoid using a measurement unit (sensor) per each electrical appliance. The key is to find the right trade-off between the accuracy in estimating the real power consumption of any specific electrical appliance and the cost of the infrastructure.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1391,CEED74,CEED,CEED Tech,UK,1-2-many,1-2-many,null,0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,0,"12many is a social matching app that puts all local activities and events in the palm of the user?s hand. Think Tinder meets meetup.com

1419,CEED102,CEED,CEED Tech,Slovakia,Invento (temporary),Invento,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"We are going to give them this game. The sci-fi theme has been very successful in the past and still is, on platforms other than mobile. Cartoonish graphics are a marketing innovation which exploded with mobile devices and is connected to casual playing for all ages. But market research shows that not all players are casual. And most players are above 35 years old. While keeping the mechanics simple to appeal to the masses, a slightly more targeted and mature product can yield millions of loyal players also on tablets. To reduce the risk (and avoid reinventing the wheel), we are basing the game monetisation logic and most of the game mechanics on the very best existing titles ? notably Supercell?s Boom Beach (a game grossing several hundred thousand dollars...per day). But the improvements even over this top titles will be substantial (also to make up for the lower marketing budget at our disposal, vis-a-vis the larger gaming software houses). Most gaming software houses produce tens of mediocre, simple games in the attempt to spread the net as wide as possible and catch many users with ""low risk"". Soon, they are forced to produce new games and pump up marketing budgets as players rapidly abandon their games. The best gaming software houses produce very few games, but work to deliver top quality and create a loyal, self-sustaining community. We believe the latter is the better approach.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1424,CEED107,CEED,CEED Tech,Belgium,MarLobs,MarLobs,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Our approach is to be the platform for mobile (micro) location based marketing and promotion of local businesses.
Platform is:
- the solution (technology): mobile + application
- the network: GPS positioning, mobile location, regions, nested regions, ibeacons on POI.
- the community: consumers, ugc, sharing
We want to enable the market and work together.
We offer white label versions of the mobile app, for large stores, retail chains, shopping malls, city centers,...
Our platform is based on the concept of POI, everything can be a POI, we focus on local businesses and bricks & mortar stores.
POI search (web + app)
-All local businesses will be available in search: claim your business (POI), manage info + logo + business page
-Free subscription for every local business
-Free for consumers, they will be rewarded.
Up-to-date POI data is available from multiple external data sources.
Proximity
- Regions: areas that have a meaning, for example shopping mall, city center, city,...
GPS location is used for regions
Regions can be nested, one region is part of another region
- Micro regions: small outlet based regions, indoor and outdoor in meters (< 100 meter normally)
ibeacons are used for micro region
- Multiple ibecaons can extend the same micro region: 2 entrances in the same building
- Multiple micro regions in one store, consisting of multiple ibeacons
Each ibeacon has a unique ID (UUid) or multiple ibeacons share the same.
We connect one or more ibeacon UUID with local business.
ibeacon
We take care of the ibeacons, it's part of the service. (small subscription fee per ibeacon, full service).
We configure ibeacon, connect with local business and send ibeacon.
This part well be outsourced with partnership.
Local business just places ibeacon on entrance and in the store when needed
(we use estimote ibeacons)
Consumer - Marlobs App
Search
- Search local business: current location | spatial | category | review score
- Social: review, comment, share, friends (invite + send to)
- Recommendations: based on search or local business, reviews + sponsored
Proximity | Region: enter | exit trigger, sub regions
Vicinity:
- While walking receive great offers (city centers, shopping malls,...): outdoor marketing, max 100 meters
- On enter | exit store (indoor): great welcome message, get great offer/discount/freemium just by entering
- Regions within store (indoor): per department
Proximity marketing
- only when this premium feature is enabled a small cost based subscription fee, no investment nor setup cost
- ibeacons are a service, we take care of everything, even monitoring and replacement: ? 10/month/ibeacon, everything
included
Business Model is based upon:
- number of foot traffic and conversions (sales) we bring, not on the amount of the sales
clicks (enter store)
+ conversions( use of vouchers, discounts,...)
ads: region, micro region, search,...
- recommendations (sponsored)
- Brands/Campaigns
- White label solutions for cities, areas and shopping malls",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

Hitchhiker users can get rides realtime submitting their destination, while their current position is already pinpointed by GPS. When we find matches with drivers we offer our hitchhiker users to send notification to the driver they want to travel with. Our ride credits are earned by giving lifts, inviting friends with personal invitation link or getting good ratings. If somebody doesn?t have a car to give lifts or doesn?t want to promote us on his social media platform, our ad-free premium service will be suitable for them which means unlimited rides for a fixed monthly fee.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1439,CEED122,CEED,CEED Tech,France,APITIC,APITIC,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Currently, APITIC provide software that allow sellers to manage the sales in the shop (Web-Caisse), and manage relationship with their customers (Fid-Elite).

Web-Caisse is a Saas Point of Sales (POS). This software is the first SaaS system in France which obtained a certification by the LNE (Laboratoire National de m‚trolodie et d?Essais) for its connected balances.

Web-Caisse manage products by category, providers, sales with statistics, stocks, inventories, orders etc and above all to monitor his activity anytime and anywhere. Web-Caisse is adaptable and customizable according to the activity.
It is designed to convenience stores, to gain time during the cashing in order to according more time to the customer and improve the customer relationship.

Fid?Elite is complementary to Web-Caisse. Fid?Elite offers to convenience stores the possibility to build a customer database and to exploit it with relevance. The seller can manage commercial actions, to segment clients, to communicate with customers via emailing or SMS etc.
The idea is to complete these software?s with ApiBroker.
Phase 1
The ApiBroker is an application designed for convenience stores, which are using our software Web-Caisse, and/or Fid?Elite in order to dynamize and optimize sales between shops and their customers.

Firstly, the aim is to connect sellers with buyers. The seller can communicate special offers or place bids on products with a validity period to stimulate impulse buying. The customer, receive a notification and can buy the product if it is a special offer or propose a bid price. The highest bidder will get the product. These actions will incite customers to visit the store to see the product and to buy. It?ll permits to the seller to increase the frequenting in his store and maybe the customer will buy other products.

The aim is to connect shops? offers for their products with prices? offers of customers. In this way, the seller will obtain the better selling price and the customer will obtain the better purchase price. Through this application, sellers will be able to attract new customers.
Phase 2

In a second time, the application?ll presents two platforms. The backoffice for sellers and the frontoffice for buyers. Sellers will define their terms, for example minimum sale price, maximum quantities etc. On the other side, the customers will inquire several criteria for example his preference, contact information etc. His criteria will?nt be visible to the seller but nevertheless he can use them, that will allows the seller to target customers.
In this phase, ApiBroker put in competition several shops.

From the backoffice, the seller can see auctions? customers but can?t see others sellers. The customer is connected to the frontoffice and can see several sellers to choose the best offer. ApiBroker permits to the seller to broaden the spectrum of its customers, his catchman area. The seller can use several means such as the geolocalization, a smartphone application etc. Actions are done in real time, that encourages interactions. The customer has more choices, more offers and can inquire several cretaria to receive notifications.
http://wanaplay2.com/Graph_ApiBroker.png
PHASE 1:
1st delivery (31/03/2015) : (salers / products)
*ApiBroker - Backoffice
Development of an application (Website and tablet / mobile application) to manage commercial products.

?Private? selected products are sent from the Web-Caisse to a ?public? management module. This module offers the ability from an interface to configure the products which be used in sales of auctions, occasional or periodic promotions. The products have different features: quantity, price and location to be filtered.

A subscription and management merchants module will also be integrated into this interface in order to sellers can register on the application and manage their products. These sellers will initially users of products developed by Apitic: Web-Caisse and / or Fid'Elite.
ApiBroker - Frontoffice

Development of an client application (Website and tablet / mobile application) to look for products made available by the merchant backoffice in the Context Broker. The application uses the same filters as those setting up in the backoffice and the Context Broker. Products will be initially searched for no authenticated customers.
2nd delivery (30/06/2015) : (Buyers)
*ApiBroker - Backoffice

Deepening the development of the backoffice to classify, to index and to filter products more precisely to facilitate customer research from frontoffice. The products will bring the quality characteristics by the notion of reviews, and rating. The ApiAccount accounts will monitor the consumption of people to guide advertising solicitations.
*ApiBroker - Frontoffice
The added product filters will be available in the front office for the experience of use. Merchants and guests will be assessed and evaluated on their sales and purchases.
*ApiAccount - Frontoffice
Improve the frontoffice by integrating registration and management of user profile who has a Fid'Elite account.
3rd delivery (31/09/2015) : (account)
*ApiAccount - Backoffice
After products management integration we add the management of people, people can create a unique account based on Identity Manager.
*ApiAccount - FrontOffice
Development of user access for owners of a single account ApiAccount.

This access allows users to combine their applications frontoffice / backoffice within a single module which use the Identity Manager. Through the management of rights and roles, applications will be available or not. This module will also integrate a billing management tool.
*ApiAccount - Web-Caisse et Fid?Elite
Integration of Identity Manager in already existing projects Web-Caisse and Fid'Elite.
PHASE 2 Delivery (31/12/2015) *ApiBroker - Frontoffice

The objective of this second phase is to create competition between sellers by providing access to one or more clients to the whole of all sellers selling the same type of product with a products comparator.
An API will be developed in order to make the Context Broker accessible to other sellers to integrate and update customers and products.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

1473,CEED156,CEED,CEED Tech,Italy,SunnyRev - The Solar Rooftop Revolution,SunnyRev,null,0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,0,"SunnyRev will be the first Reverse Auction Marketplace for Solar Rooftops. It will eliminate the transaction inefficiencies in the traditional trade process of Solar Power Purchase Agreements (SPPA) and Solar Leases (SL), enabling a win-win condition both for Solar Services Providers and for Rooftop Owners.

SPPA and SL are contracts between a ?Solar Services Provider? who owns, utilizes, and maintains the photovoltaic project, and a ?Rooftop Owner? who delivers a designated location for the solar installation such as an unutilized rooftop.

In a SPPA, the Rooftop Owner agrees to purchase the energy output from the developer at a fixed price for a prearranged time period. In a Solar Lease, instead, the Rooftop Owner rents the solar equipment against a monthly remittance. In either cases, the Rooftop Owner is able to slash down his energy expenses drastically and notice long-term savings as current grid-electricity prices continue to increase. The Solar Services Provider pays for all the installation costs and is held responsible for the operation and maintenance of the project.

This framework is referred to as the ""solar as a service"" model, and enable the host customer to avoid many of the traditional barriers to adoption for organizations looking to install solar systems: high up-front capital costs
column2: system performance risk
column3: and complex design and permitting processes. In addition, these arrangements can be cash flow positive for the host customer from the day the system is commissioned.

column1: With SunnyRev, Rooftop Owners will be able to minimize the solar rate and maximize their savings by putting Producers in competition for their rooftops with a reverse auction mechanism. Bidding performed in real-time via the Internet will result in a dynamic, competitive process. This will help achieve rapid downward price pressure (energy price or lease remittance, depending of the case)  that is not normally attainable using traditional static paper-based bidding processes. At the same time, Producers will reduce costs and timing for acquiring new clients.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1488,CEED171,CEED,CEED Tech,Estonia,EstateGuru Oš,EstateGuru Oš,Estonia,Consumer other,B2C,5,1,YES,IN,Marek P„rtel,"Borrower
?	Borrower has to register in our webpage.
?	In order to get financing they need to create a project and apply for funding.
?	Provide details of mortgage and complete the funding application.
?	Specify the target amount, desired interest rate and other key terms.
?	The application will be examined by our team members, if necessary further information will asked.
?	At the same time, team will perform in-depth analysis on borrowers? creditworthiness and ability to pay back the loan.
?	Valuation of the mortgage is ordered from respected valuator.
?	The  information is provided by borrower and acquired from different external sources.
?	If project is approved and we agree on financing terms then project is made available to public.
?	The financing round can normally be open up to 2 months.
?	Investors can make contribution into loans until the target amount is reached.
?	If the project fails to attract sufficient funding, the loan commitments already in place are refunded to investors.
?	In case of successful funding, the funds are released to the borrower as soon as the borrower has granted security and satisfied all other relevant drawdown conditions.
?	Baltic leading law firm ?Varul? holds the security is hold a separate entity ?EstateGuru tagatisagent? on behalf of lenders.
?	Borrower is expected to make principal and interest payment in accordance with the agreed terms.
?	Both borrowers and Investors can monitor all repayments and interest accruals on their portfolio page.
?	In case of default, all the necessary work, including sale of the mortgage, will be done by EstateGuru in cooperation with our legal partner ?Varul?.
Investor
?	In order to invest into property loan people need to register as investor, place funds on EstateGuru virtual user account.
?	Before investing we require identification from investors, as soon this is done people can start investing from 50?.
?	Investors are provided with all information about the project and security to help and choose the right project where to invest.
?	As soon as the project is successfully funded and the pledge is created, the loan is transferred to borrower.
?	Investors will receive repayments and interest accordance agreed terms.
?	All received repayments and interest can be reinvested into new projects.
?	If projects? syndication process fails the money will be returned to investors.

See the how it works scheme here: https://estateguru.eu/how/works",Service provider,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,Financial Applications,Applications,Enterprise Resource Management (ERM) Applications,1,0,0,Startup,0,estateguru.ee

1504,CEED187,CEED,CEED Tech,Slovakia,Essele RECORDS,Essele RECORDS,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"S. The explanation of technology is not that simple, because it is very complex and extensively scalable. 1508,CEED191,CEED,CEED Tech,Germany,WorldMixedZones,World Mixed Zones,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"WorldMixedZones is a social utility Android based application that provides the following features:

1-Tracking Apps Usage: Track the actual time user spends on different apps on his device against his real expected time. In addition user will be able to check average time that worldwide users spend on each app over different date ranges (e.g. daily basis vs the past month).

2-Tracking Daily Life Activities: Track the actual time user spends doing daily life activities (e.g. Work, Study, Sport, Caring with others ..etc) against his real expected time. In addition user will be able to check average time that worldwide users spend on each daily life activity over different date ranges.

3-Categorization: Based on each user's attitude, this user could be categorized in the ?Life Well Lived? category, or ?Life Well Wasted? category. Categorization could be done on different level, for example worldwide level (all users of the application around the world), specific zone (e.g. Berlin, Germany), per specific gender, age, university, or even the contact list level.
4-Ranking: Provide the user with a worldwide rank and title amongst his category?s population.

5-LWL and LWW Averages: Check average time people in ?Life Well Lived? category or ?Life Well Wasted? category spend on apps usage or daily life activities. This could help you to manage your time better and achieve better life balance based on other people?s attitude.
6-Tips and Advices: Enjoy a large set of advices for living a better life. These tips and advices provided by top ranked users based on their life experience.

We called it WorldMixedZones, because  in each zone of the world (e.g. Berlin, Germany), there are two kind of people. First type represents people who are able to make the balance between the time they are spending on technology usage and their daily life activities. The other type couldn't make this balance. So each zone is a mix between different categories of people. Zone could represent a university, smartphone's contact list, region ..etc.

In the future, we plan to add more features related to time management, and remote tracking services (e.g. Father and child, or Manager and employees), and to generalize the idea to other platforms other than Android.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1514,CEED197,CEED,CEED Tech,Macedonia,MarkO,MarkO - Your Smart Task Buddy that ROCKS,null,0,0,5,#N/A,NO,0,0,"MarkO is your smart task buddy that helps you to be more productive and finish all your tasks easily and effectively.

It does it in a way that reminds you about them near the location where you can complete them. All you need to do is define the type of place (category) or choose specific place where you can complete your task. After that, when you are near that places, MarkO sends you a personal notification to remind you to complete your tasks.

MarkO solves the problem of always forgetting certain tasks by reminding you to do it next time you are near a place where it can be done. He also enables you to share your tasks with your friends and track their progress together. Also, with his smart suggestions you can complete all your tasks in one place.

MarkO solves vendors problem in a way that when the customer wants to buy a certain product (complete a task), the vendor(s) will be recommended by the app in the right place and at the right time. Vendors can make use of our geo-analytics and location based campaign reports. Whilst location based advertising can be a little more expensive than regular banner ads the learnings can be invaluable. Vendors can get info which locations performed best and why. For example knowing why a certain store got more footfalls on a Friday may help shape the Outdoor or TV advertising schedules i.e the feedback/the data can be passed onto the vendor's marketing team.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1517,CEED200,CEED,CEED Tech,Ukraine,SyncUI,SyncUI Team,Estonia,Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),B2B,3,0,YES,IN,Andrii  Bakirov,"Our solution is an interactive synced cross-browser testing tool. SyncUI provides live synced testing in multiple browsers and devices at once.

SyncUI simply synchronizes all opened clients into one stack. Any action or event from one client is duplicated to all others. So while testing in one browser you perform parallel testing at once across all supported stack of browsers.
It is important that we are a SaaS solution.
We are satisfying such customer need like performance, cost, risks & time reduction.

1521,CEED204,CEED,CEED Tech,India,Typeset,Typeset.,null,0,0,3,#N/A,NO,0,0,"We are offering a cloud - based solution that helps create journal - ready submissions quickly. The time taken to create a research paper is reduced to few seconds. Layout, margins, typography, tables, images etc are automatically determined by the product based on the desired format guidelines of the journal.

Within the solution, a researcher needs to write content on the interactive editor, drag-and-drop images and can use formula generation as-you-type to create a research paper. Generally, each journal has unique complex guidelines, so reformatting is tedious. In Typeset, once the user has the content in the GUI, Typeset automatically re-formats it to the corresponding journal format through a single click.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1541,CEED224,CEED,CEED Tech,The Netherlands,GIG Diving B.V.,Gigdiving B.V.,The Netherlands,Consumer leisure/gaming,B2C,4,1,YES,IN,Weining Hung,"Summay:

Gigdiving helps solve the problem of the ?disconnect? between artists, promoters and fans by flipping the live event industry around. By using crowdsourcing method, Gigdiving removes the risk factor from the live performance industry and empowers fans throughout the process. Gigdiving will not only be a ticket-presale platform, but will also serve as an innovative music fan club for and by music aficionados. It creates a social and engaging experience for music fans to interact and share insights and ideas, while helping their favourite artists? realize a tour.

On Gigdiving, fans can pledge to buy tickets to see their favourite artist in their city of choice. When a fan pledges to buy a ticket, this means that he/she is genuinely interested in seeing the artist and will show up at the gig. This will provide the artists and promoters with valuable real time information about where to go and how many people will come. It also means artists get guaranteed funding before the tour.
Product/service introduction:
If an artist with a GigDiving profile has opened a campaign, Fans may offer to purchase a number of tickets for this performance at a ticket price set by you (?Pledging?).
After the artist sets the ticket price your pledged tickets will be automatically purchased if:
-	Fan's set ticket price is higher than the ticket price set by the artist, fan will pay the ticket price as set by the artist
-	Fan's set ticket price is equal to the ticket price set by the artist
-	Fan's set ticket price is higher than the ticket price set by the artist, but fan has chosen to be a ?Superfan?: you will pay the higher ticket price.
The pledged tickets will not be purchased automatically if your set ticket price is lower than the ticket price set by the artist.

GigDiving is taking a fan-driven approach to the music and concert industry. It also gives artists the flexibility and freedom to manage their own tour. This approach puts all the power in the hands of artists and their fans, keeping the Indie music industry truly independent. With the help of sharing/on-demand services like AirBnB, CouchSurfing and Uber, travel costs are kept to a minimum and tour arrangement will be hassle-free. And through established, professional services and tools like ReverbNation, musicians can find promoters and venues for themselves.

GigDiving gives musicians and their fans the opportunity to use whichever technology is available to truly stay independent and still travel to perform. With Tourje and an open mind, performing in any corner of the world will no longer be a dream.",Service provider,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,Marketing,Applications,Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Applications,1,0,0,Startup,0,gigdiving.com

1543,CEED226,CEED,CEED Tech,Italy,IungoSUPPLIER,Iungo,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"IungoSUPPLIER automates the documents exchange with customers and internal users. IungoSUPPLIER can handle documents received by the customers (for example request for quotations, purchase orders, changes to item quantity or delivery date), as well as keep up to dated documents created by the company's ERP system (for example order confirmations, despatch advise, delivery notes, invoices). IungoSUPPLIER supports the scheduling by priority of the delivery of goods and the related production orders.

IungoSUPPLIER prototype is already validated in operational environment, but it was installed in a dedicated web server of the IT infrastructure of each supplier. The real business idea is to deploy IungoSUPPLIER as a web based service centre adopting FI-WARE infrastructure and related technologies.
In particular IungoSUPPLIER can:
- send documents to external / internal partners through various communication channels, according to the partner preferences (for example IUNGOmail, EDI, Web-portal, pdf, fax, ...)
- control the document life cycle according to a pre-defined workflow
- monitor the status of active documents highlighting any changes or anomalies
- support users? work to solve critical situations
- log all the occurred events and all the exchanged documents.
The basic elements in IungoSUPPLIER are:
- documents: elements (text or image) containing information at multiple levels (head of the order, order line, scheduling - delivery locations)
- workflow: set of states that can assume each document
- users: person and/or customised plug-in that, according to permissions, can generate actions or change information related to any document according to a defined workflow
- company: logical container of documents.
In general:
- each type of document is associated to a workflow, which describes its life cycle
- the same workflow can be used by different types of documents
- each user is associated to one or more ?roles? (a coherent set of permissions) for each company
-  each user can access different companies, also with different ""roles"".",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1549,CEED232,CEED,CEED Tech,Czech Republic,Gaim,gaim,null,0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Gaim is an application for android that comes with a pair of workout bracelets, one that you put on your arm and one on your leg. The bracelets track your motion. They count the number of repetitions of exercise that you make. You can create your own training plans or get them from other people or professionals.

Because of the counting of reps, we can make sure that the user really makes all the exercises that he decided to do in his training plan. This is very important to see real progress. We will be collecting a lot of data about people's movement and we can provide interesting insight into their practice. The intensity of exercising, if they are neglecting some of their muscles, how they are developing over time and so on.
From this basic idea come a lot of other features we want to implement over time:
Gamification:
- exercises have certain difficulty, you can gain points when you do them
- you can challenge friends
- you can workout out together the same routines just by touching bracelets and gaining more points
- group workouts - the whole group is doing the same workout routine
Tracking of workout
- suggesting exercises if you have ignored some muscle groups
Progress
- detailed overview about the intensity of the workout and progress in the exercises that the you make (data mining)",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1563,CEED246,CEED,CEED Tech,Estonia,TaxiBus Texo,Texo,null,0,0,5,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Texo offers a convenient, modern and more dynamic solution for public transportation system than it is used today.

Initially the system will be used on specialised/retargeted public transportation vehicles that use help from our system. In the longer run, this system can be extended to use any suitably capable vehicles.

The product/service is essentially a software package that runs on computers, smartphones and tablets of the private people and bus drivers, and the server-side software that does the information exchange, optimal route planning, demand forecasting, and bookkeeping.
Texo differs from current two main traditional approaches to the transportation of people, which are:
a) Transportation on fixed routes by public line transportation, and
b) Transportation from door to door individually by taxis

Texo competes by considering the wishes of multiple/many travellers and by generating dynamic routes for the transportation vehicles. Texo collects peoples? wishes for commuting, combines the routes and finds the most optimal solution for transportation (better price than taxi and faster than bus).

The client enters the commute wish into the system and gets offered a solution that considers which Texo could fulfill the need most optimally - considering also the movements of other clients. People can enter their wishes into the system using internet: using a smartphone, a computer, or even with a SMS. They enter the commute need in the map or as an address pair, and add the desired commute start or end time.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1569,CEED252,CEED,CEED Tech,Spain,INNPRO,PLANET MEDIA,null,0,0,9,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Smart Mall is a system that provides an integrated shopping experience combining virtual and physical shopping experiences in the customers? smartphone.
The system has three main functionalities:
-	Advanced search engine of products in the shopping center. The app allows searching for products in the stores located at the mall, know its prices, availability and location of the store.

-	Access to personalized promotions and campaigns, both geo-located in the shopping center. The mall can be signposted so well located spots can recognized the presence of users and target customized promotions and discounts using the APP installed in the user?s devices.
-	Buying and paying using the mobile phone and picking up the delivery in the stores, saving queues and time.

In fact, the system is a centralized search engine of products available in the different shops in the shopping centers that combines the searching with personalized promotions and advertisement according the customer profile. The personalization will be achieved by means of traditional loyalty campaigns where the mobile app becomes a loyalty card and the system can access to the historical shopping list. The personalization can be increased if customer enables the use of their public Facebook profile.

This functionality is supported by means of an indoor localization system. The system locates smartphones in a local area through the installation of cheap wireless signs. This enables the push notification of personalized promotions of the nearest shops directly in the customer smartphone. In addition to this personalized advertisement, the customer will be able to directly buy and pay with his smartphone, and decides if he goes to the shop to pick up his order or the buy is sent to his home.

The system offers a backend with two profiles. A super user for the shopping center administrators, that control the credentials of the other users (shops administrators), loyalty programs, locations, etc and the privilege users (shopping administrators) that controls the update of their products lists and can controls their particular promotions.

On the other side, the final customer has a mobile app with all the functionalities integrated from searching facilities, updated profile, loyalty advantages and payments and delivery facilities.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1599,CEED282,CEED,CEED Tech,Hungary,PsychAsk.com,PsychAsk,Hungary,Consumer health/wellness,B2C,2,0,YES,IN,Wenyi Wu,"Our solution:
We build an Online Live Video Chat platform, where millions of customers talk with thousands of Psychological Professionals face-to-face for mental health care, from the comfort & privacy of home!
How it works:

o      A Psychological Professional sits in front of the webcam at home or office, talking to multiple Customers at the same time for FREE in the PUBLIC chat room. Customers can see and hear the Professionals in real time. Customers can also see the Professionals? profiles, such as years of experience, qualification, specialty, language skills, self introduction, price, etc.

o	Customers arrive at PsychAsk.com by clicking on our ad campaigns on Google Ads / Facebook / Twitter. On arrival, they can immediately start interacting with the Professional they choose, asking about their emotional problems in relationship, career, health, family, sex, etc. Because Customers can see and hear the Professional in real, they can evaluate if they feel emotionally connected with the particular Professional or not. Customers can also find out if the Professional is qualified enough to help with their emotional problems.

o	In the PUBLIC chat room, a Professional can?t pay exclusive attention to one single Customer. So if a Customer decides to talk with a Professional in PRIVATE exclusively about his personal problems, because nobody wants to share their privacy in front the public, he can immediately go into a PAID 1-on-1 session with the Professional by clicking one button. The price is pre-set by the Professional.

o	PsychAsk.com takes a 30% commission from the PAID private session, and doesn?t charge Professionals or Customers anything else.",Service provider,0,0,X,0,0,0,,0,Conferencing Applications,Applications,Collaborative Applications,1,0,0,Startup,0,PsychAsk.com

1623,CEED306,CEED,CEED Tech,Germany,betterspace,betterspace,null,0,0,2,#N/A,NO,0,0,"Betterspace develops energy efficiency (EE) solutions for non-residential buildings (e.g. offices and hotels).

Our products is a low-cost and standard-conform energy efficiency solution based on open source hardware and software platform. It consists of a smart control box (so called platform), different sensors and actors, and numerous control algorithms (so called apps) for non-residential buildings.

In the platform, the open source operating system will be run on open source hardware, which acts like a base infrastructure. For this operating system, betterspace decided to work on OGEMA (Open Gateway Energy Management Alliance) platform, which have been developed by Fraunhofer IWES under German e-Energy project. Afterwards, different actors and sensors will be sold together with its corresponding apps one after another to solve a specific problem. For instance: A customer has already a platform in his room. Then he can book firstly a room-temperature control app together with a thermostat actor. Afterwards, he would like to control the light and computer of employee, he could also book absence-control app together with dimmer-actor and occupancy sensor. In order to detect the maintenance routine of heater, he could only book an automatic maintenance app and directly install on platform without any additional actors and sensors. These are one of our customer relaship elements.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1652,CEED335,CEED,CEED Tech,Czech Republic,StayTracked,StayTracked,null,0,0,3,#N/A,NO,0,0,"StayTracked - Online platform is delivering live position tracking (using GPS, Galileo and other GNSS technologies) which is affordable and easy-to-use for any user (citizens, businesses, public authorities, families etc.).
Please see the high-level scheme at https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxHjGtn_VbjBUnFjXzd6a0ZjaFU/view?usp=sharing (also uploaded under Q22)

StayTracked will offer an end-to-end live position tracking solution to all potential clients. The StayTracked solution is open-to-use, easy-to-use, and allows multiple users/objects to be tracked simultaneously, via a single front-end user interface with a map as a background. No business model as such is on the market yet. The StayTracked solution takes advantage of smartphones' integrated geo-location modules and ubiquitous mobile network data connection to deliver a highly innovative end-to-end cloud-based solution accessible for all users.

StayTracked offers live tracking via a smartphone position-tracking app or via lightweight position tracking devices, which may be either purchased or rented. StayTracked is designed as a cloud service and rely on a secured database to process, store, and analyse large amounts of real-time geo-referenced sensor data.

Facilitating ease of use is core for StayTracked, therefore the front-end interface is designed to make it intuitive for any user to set up his or her own event, invite others to join this event and track event participants or objects like vehicles online. One can share the live event tracking over social media, cheer and support the participants or embedded the map with tracking in a website. Live position tracking will be available online via a responsive HTML5 user interface, allowing users to display the full event history and replay past events from a user profile. Furthermore, users will be provided with simple-to-use analytical and visualisation tools enabling subsequent position and sensor data analysis.
Major Features:
A. Brief Description
- Online platform delivering the live position tracking (using GPS, Galileo and other GNSS technologies)
- Free and easy-to-use for any user (citizens, businesses, public authorities, families etc.)
- Affordable end-to-end live tracking solution of people and objects for professional users
- Cloud solution, secure database for storage of large amounts of sensor geo-referenced data
- Live tracking via smartphone tracking app or via lightweight position tracking device (can be purchased or rented as an alternative to the smartphone app)
- Easy for any user to
- set up event
- invite other users to join event
- join using Android/iPhone app via unique event code and get tracked
- track the event participants/objects/vehicles online
- share the live event tracking over social media
- share event for replay afterwards
- live tracking available online via responsive HTML5 user interface
- full event history & event replay on the user profile
- subsequent data analysis on the platform using visualisation tools
B. Initial User Requirements
- User can set up a basic tracking event without login
- Unique url for event (includes event name/code), used also to join event from the smartphone tracking app
- Multiple users and/or objects can be tracked simultaneously on the map
- Extra features for logged-in users
- modify user interface colours
- upload own branding and sponsors
- upload and calibration of own background map (calibrate your own background map using GPS track or Google/OSM map - for simple calibration tools, see e.g. Quickroute or 3Drerun)
- embed map to user's website etc.

- Extra data: allow user to connect various sensors (heart rate monitors, steps counters, running footpods and oscillation sensors, cycling power meters and cadence sensors, etc.) to the smartphone / tracking unit using ANT+ or Bluetooth technologies. This data is streamed in real time together with the position data.
- User profile with ?My Events? listing, replay and analysis of events, sharing and ?embed to your website? tools
sharing of event live tracking over social media + live communication and ?cheering? of the tracked person
- Event replay including mass start simulation and multiple data analysis tools (see 3Drerun, e.g here), including social media sharing
- Private and public events (public events displayed on the map, open for joining by other users)
- Background maps selection (Google maps, Google Earth, OSM, Here.com-Nokia, upload my own map)
elevation profiles & other data analysis (heart rate, speed, altitude etc.)
- Extras during the live tracking: Send a text or audio message to participants, send a song, ?Cheering?, applause etc.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1660,CEED343,CEED,CEED Tech,UK,"Broadcastrack, www.broadcastrack.com",Veda-Astra LTD,null,0,0,1,#N/A,NO,0,0,"BroadcasTrack the New Audience Measurement Technologies to Collect Complete Usage Data

Unlike conventional ratings reports, new audience measurement technologies enable network operators, programmers and advertisers to calculate and report real-time viewing metrics based on actual pay TV usage.  Instead of relying on small panels or samples of TV viewers, the new methods allow operators to collect and aggregate comprehensive usage viewing data from all viewers by leveraging digital set-top boxes in new and improved ways. Specifically, these software technologies collect real-time, second-by-second click streams from three basic sources -- real-time viewing (linear broadcast and switched digital video, or SDV), on-demand viewing (VOD and DVRs) and interactive engagements (interactive TV programming, tru2way applications and Embedded TV Binary Interchange Format, or EBIF, features). For instance, an SDV manager can collect the linear broadcast and switched digital tuning data while an EBIF/application server gathers the critical set-top box data and a VOD server would collect all on-demand purchases. With tools to collect real-time click stream data, network operators can send all the information to data warehouses for storage, reports and analytics. They can send transactional data, such as VOD purchases, to their billing systems for processing, as well as collect and store ad placement data from the ad servers in the data warehouses for reporting and analytics, providing key visibility into the viewership of specific ads. Unlike traditional ratings reports, the new audience measurement techniques by Broacastrack will also track viewing well beyond the traditional TV environment. They can not only measure conventional, linear TV viewing, but also on-demand, streaming media, online and mobile video consumption These attributes make the new techniques a crucial element for the emerging three-screen video universe.",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

1713,CEED396,CEED,CEED Tech,Armenia,360STORIES,360STORIES,null,0,0,4,#N/A,NO,0,0,"It is simply Google Street View with facebook posts inside, with addition of special functional, called ""PlayBack"" which is a kind of guided tour from story to story. 360Stories is a touring platform allowing to share the unforgettable moments from your trip at the places you lived them in a new Virtual Touring Multimedia way.

For users we are focused to create platform for the next generation of exploring the space (inner and outer) and sharing that experience with everyone. The problem that our target user faces, is very few information on places they are going to. For most of the places there is only couple iPhone made photos from Foursquare or Tripadvisor. We are crazy about mixed media and possibility to implement it in virtual reality with usage of Oculus (or Google CardBoard currently) and Myo from Thalmic (https://www.thalmic.com/en/myo/).

For the business part, it is the solution for local businesses to allow them place Business Stories (notifications with Discounts/New Products or anything else) in near range of the business with iBeacons. It is the kind of every business joined, can select or place iBeacon next to the entrance to give Notification to people passing by, or to any corner in the range of 1km. 1725,SOUL1,SOUL,SOUL-FI,Spain,Ogma 9000 S.L.L.,PAPELclub ? The vertical platform for the literature ecosystem.,"Calle Torrecilla, 14bis, officinal D, 47003, Valladolid","Consumer education/culture, TELECOM AND MEDIA",B2B/B2C,4,5,YES,IN,Pedro Perez Grande,"PAPELclub is an entrepreneurial initiative of people who love books and want to make something great that put together Writers, Editors, Readers and obviously, Books.

Our team is composed of five persons that intent to cover most of the aspects required to turn an idea into a feasible solution. Therefore we encompass entrepreneurs and people with entrepreneurial spirit
column2: experience in web and technical development including FiWare
column3: experience in project execution, business development and commercial management
column4: experience in the book-editorial and logistic sector
column5: experience in marketing and communication
column6: and of course, with great love for literature.

column1: PAPELclub is as a gamified vertical platform focused on the literature ecosystem. It materializes in a web platform and mobile apps accessible for every person who love to read.

It will provide support to the kind of dynamics that occur in a readers-club like publication of events and news, groups and member management and attendance, get to know your local community of writers, recommendations and debates of authors and books, or an optimal sharing of books across members and friends.

We have built off-line prototypes and test most crucial aspects like monetization with several success cases. Now it is time to develop the technical solution, and for this venture we decide to build it within FiWare technology as our philosophy goes in accordance with open-data and smart-cities initiatives.
This is a cultural project, but is also an economic viable one. For our support we get revenues by optimizing existing activities and provide higher value to our users
column2: more optimal and higher visibility. For the community, we help empowering the local actors like writers, authors, event organizers and reading-clubs, and set them closer to their public: the book lovers: our users.

column1: >> SoulFI, would you help us to turn this idea into a reality?  <<
PAPELclub,
...where real literature lies within the people behind the words""",Service provider,X,0,X,0,0,0,,Software,Consumer Application,#N/A,#N/A,1 and 3,X,http://www.papelclub.com/,SME,85000,papelclub.com
1726,SOUL2,SOUL,SOUL-FI,Spain,Wellness Smart Cities,FI-WATER: FI-WARE based application for monitoring and control of water networks using microsensors,"Charles Darwin, 41092, Sevilla","WATER SUPPLY
column2: SEWERAGE, WASTE MANAGEMENT AND REMEDIATION ACTIVITIES",B2B,5,#N/A,YES,IN,Alejandro Ballesta,"In the last years the water sector has become a major user of ICT due to the importance of the value at stake, this demand is increasing exponentially as the water network grows, therefore there is a massive business opportunity on the provision of these technologies calculated as 3.500 M? only for Europe.

column1: FI-WATER aims at developing a FI-WARE-based water monitoring and decision support system (DSS) for city water utilities and authorities to allow the smart operation of water networks, ensure the quality of the water in near real time and enable remote leak detection. The DSS will make use of a very innovative sensoring device developed in the frame of FP7 project WIDESENS  (Sept 2013-Oct 2015) that allows water quality monitoring (pH, conductivity, redox potential and chlorine) and leak detection through pressure sensing. The WIDESENS sensors use a microelectronic technology superior to traditional water quality sensors that shows better features to be deployed in a widespread manner: low cost, low maintenance, easy installation, small size and ultra-low energy consumption.

FI-WATER aims at creating a product for ensuring the quality of the drinking water with clear future market potential both inside and outside Europe in line with the objective of the call and the aims of the Innovation Union. FI-WATER will allow water managers to improve water management processes like water chlorination, salinity adjustment, water leak detection, water quality management & assurance.
FI-WATER socio-economic impacts are expected on:
Users and citizens- People will enjoy of safer water at home with improved chemical and physical characteristics: odour and taste.
The environment- Less chlorine and improved water preservation through leak detection and associated alarms.

EU legislation- Legislation will have to adapt to include the new possibilities offered by the developed technology.",Tech provider,X,0,0,0,0,X,,Hardware,Services operations management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,1 and 3,0,es.linkedin.com/pub/antonio-chaparro/15/b96/986/es,SME,0,0

1727,SOUL3,SOUL,SOUL-FI,Spain,"Enog‚s Consultores, S.L.",xCityWears. eXtensible Content Manager for public services in Wearable Devices,"C/Valle de Ar n 9., 47010, Valladolid",PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION AND DEFENCE
column2: COMPULSORY SOCIAL SECURITY,B2B,6,8,YES,IN,David Rey de la Cruz,"SmartWearables and smart cities are going to be the next engine in technology products. A big number of studies accredit it, and also companies and global government are investing an important sum of money to offer nice and useful products to citizens and clients. Our market research offers good feelings on this market.In this way, Our company considers that, is an important moment to develop solutions mixing these technologies: smart wears and smart cities. We are going to include all smart city information into a smartwear device: Google Glass, SmartWatch, SmartPhone, iWatch and so on. In smartwearables devices world, we can find several architectures and manufacturers. This is an inconvenient for a developer company who wants to develop a product because one solution must be developed on each kind of smartwear specifications. So we are going to develop an intermediate engine that translates and integrates all smart city information into all kind of smartwear device. In this way, we will be able to offer all information about a smart city regardless of type of device.To develop this solution we will deploy a platform for local government, called xCityWears (eXtensible Content Manager for Public Services on Smart Devices) on which a technical user decides how to show and load information that is saved into FI-WARE Cloud. So, application structure will be saved on Fi-ware and data will be loaded from City Point of interest and open DataSets, saved on Fi-Ware. Next, we will develop an interpreter that traduces structure and data designed by technical user, into each smartwearable language. For instance, android devices understand Java technology, and Apple devices iOS Kit. We will be able to unify these wearables technologies into just one. So, a local government could offer all kind of information about a city regardless of device. Theres is only one way to do this: develop the solution with an open format specifications, like JSON, XML and Open Stack.",Tech provider,X,X,0,0,X,X,,Software,Data access infrastructure,#N/A,#N/A,1,X,www.applica2.com,SME,10000,applica2.com

column1: 1728,SOUL4,SOUL,SOUL-FI,Portugal,wexcedo,wxecedo-knx,"IPN Incubadora, Rua Pedro Nunes, 3030 - 199, Coimbra","Consumer energy & home automation, ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING SUPPLY",B2B/B2C,6,1,YES,IN,Jo?o Campos,"Many years ago cars did not have central locking, the doors had to be unlocked one by one, first the driver door, by putting the key in the lock, and then the others. Later emerged the central locking where the driver's door lock commanded all the others. More recently appeared the remote commands and with the rise of smartphones, applications that unlock the car.

The purpose of our project are not cars but buildings, not all the buildings only smart buildings. Like the cars that already had central locking but still had no remote control. We want to provide intelligent buildings that have KNX technology with a remote control. KNX is a global standard for buildings automation.

Our objective is to create a gateway that connects FI-WARE with KNX systems and allow remote control of those buildings through a web or smartphone app. Used in already installed systems or others those that will implemented KNX.
We would love to make smart houses even smarter.

We propose the development of an app, that not only gives remote controle to the building but also gives its owner the skills to add functionalities to do it. Dynamically changing their own apps to meet their needs/requests.",Tech provider,X,0,0,0,0,X,,Software,Other System Software,System Infrastructure Software,System Software,1,X,WEXCEDO

column1: 1729,SOUL5,SOUL,SOUL-FI,Italy,Effective Knowledge s.r.l.,City-e-SENSE: City ?enabler? for Smart sErvices in a citizeN-Sensors Environment,"Via Madonna del Piano n. 6, 50019, Sesto Fiorentino (FI)","ACCOMMODATION AND FOOD SERVICE ACTIVITIES, PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION AND DEFENCE
