3071,INCE65,INCE,INCENSe,Slovenia,Mentor EBS d.o.o.,The Universal PFC platform,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The quality of the PFC (price forward curve) for illiquid power and gas markets is often low, calculations are time consuming and they have to be done late in the evening when trading is finished. Therefore, customers seek good providers of the PFCs for such markets. On the other side, the PFCs are becoming more and more important as one of the inputs in the smart grids development. Various subjects optimize their production or consumption, based on the energy prices defined on hourly (15 minutes) bases. With the development of the intraday markets the need for the constantly updated PFCs increased. Customers want to have the latest information from the markets for adequate optimization and the same infrastructure for different markets. The universal PFC platform, built in a cloud, provides the PFCs for liquid and illiquid energy markets with high scalability. It is primary designed for power markets, but can be also used for various energy resources. It allows producers, consumers, traders or retailers to optimize their business based on the PFCs. The universality gives them the chance to expand to the new markets or just to change their PFC provider without changing their infrastructure. The PFC platform includes the universal API for accessing the PFCs, connectors to market prices and special interview platform, which allows traders to provide their estimations of market prices on illiquid markets. The PFC platform also allows that different providers of the PFCs prepare them for their customers. The calculations of the PFCs for liquid markets are based on market prices provided by exchanges and brokers, whereas the PFCs for illiquid markets use information from interviews and special algorithms.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3072,INCE66,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,LUX Italia srl,Remote Energy Management Portal,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Public domain, Lincese and Access FREE Internet portal for Remote Energy Management and Control. Today a number of different suppliers are offering remote access and control of their building/home automation systems for energy savings (climatization, illumination and other systems) through Internet. Unfortunatelly, none of them is compatible with the others, because up today there is no COMMON, STANDARD, SHARED and LICENSE FREE technical solution used by manufacturers of this kind of systems. The Remote Energy Management Project claims to create all necessary technical solutions, documents, applications and support to permit any manufacturer of energy saving and building automation systems to make their systems compatible with the STANDARD remote energy management platform. This will permit to any Final Customer and User of building automation and energy saving systems to access from the same user interface and to control, retrive data and supervise remotelly their installations. Through this common platform, users will be able to monitorize energy consumption and analyze and optimize usage of their automation systems. Using any pad, computer ot smartphone will be possible to control the home, office, factory, and any other site where building automation systems are installed. But, what is important, is that once User has learned to use COMMON platform, it will be able to use it to control the equipment of different suppliers. The project does not intend to substitute already existing or new app for remote system control, but to introduce a new COMMON standard for remote control protocol and data access.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3073,INCE67,INCE,INCENSe,Israel,siga data security (2014) LTD,Scada cyber security alert system,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"SI-GA is a cyber-security company aiming to supply a brand new protective layer for SCADA systems, resulting with a major breakthrough in the level of protection of critical systems without radical infrastructural changes. Our solution is an advanced overlay over any given system, supplying nearly impenetrable alert line, transparent to the source and nature of the attack. Being located on top of a given setup, it can be applied integrally with any set of existing hardware, allowing its deployment without the need for infrastructural changes.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3074,INCE68,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,Solenica di Diva Tommei,Lucy,0,Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),B2B,#N/A,-,YES,OUT,Diva Tommei,"Solenica aims to break existing paradigms in the natural lighting space. We have identified a strong unsatisfied interest in natural lighting solutions for the home that are not invasive and can be installed out-of-the-box. We are planning to fill that market gap by making designer natural illumination solutions affordable for the residential market. Our bot Lucy is equipped with an optical eye connected to a motorised mirror that tracks the sun from sunrise to sunset and sends sunlight in a user-defined direction assigned by the user through a simple gesture. We are planning to sell Lucy in an online B2C strategy first, with the possibility of purchasing packages that include additional supports. Then by partnering with public institutions we will increase awareness and start selling to consumers through B2B retail distributors like John Lewis. We will then release the smart home package with the Solenica Hub for smart home integration through consumer electronics distributors.",Tech provider,,0,0,0,0,0,,Hardware,Other System Software,System Infrastructure Software,System Software,1,0,0,0,0,#N/A

3075,INCE69,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Comworks Technologies S.L.,Road2Cloud,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"European citizen vehicles are one of the most used transportation options, having a great impact in our habits, economy and health. European normative 98/69/EC established in 2001 the requirement to car manufacturers to install a standardized system for pollution tracking and on-board checks, the EOBD standard (European on Board Diagnostics) Road2Cloud is aimed at public institutions or companies with one or more cars in their fleet for monitoring and diagnosing them. The benefit in this type of organizations is the knowledge of the status of your vehicles in real time and linked directly to the staff of the company responsible for managing the fleet. Through this system, the organization may know the location of their vehicles and thus can communicate effectively in order to improve service management. Real-time monitoring that provides Road2Cloud will allow optimal use for decision making about the vehicles. This is useful for both detect mechanical problems and improve fleet management. The EOBD sensor will capture data from the vehicle concerning to public standard codes for all kind of engines (gasoline / diesel / hybrid / electric, ...). Future releases may expand the product to include custom codes used by some vehicle manufacturers providing a more specific and accurate information on certain features of that particular manufacturer.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3076,INCE70,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,NOVATEC Ingenieros Asesores S.L.,IoTGesCity,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"There is a big amount of energy losses in streetlight, especially in low traffic areas. This is caused by streetlights being turned on even if there are no vehicles around. There is also an inconvenient use of traffic lights, taking in account that sometimes vehicles have to stop even though there is nobody waiting. The solution we are providing is, by the use of presence sensors both in traffic lights and lamppost, being in control of all the vehicles using the road. With this information our system will be able to switch ON/OFF and GREEN/RED whenever it is needed to reduce consumption and waiting times to its minimum. This control can save up to 85% of energy consumption. Since this solution encourages eMobility and SmartEconomy, reduces pollution, improves traffic flow and so on, it is in harmony with the concept of SmartCities and CleanTech. This project aims to be sold to city councils and town councils as much as local, regional and national organizations.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3077,INCE71,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,-,Plug on the cloud,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"The Plug on the cloud is an Internet-of-Things device which allows users to connect to an energy providers power grid anywhere the device is installed (e.g. restaurants, airports, train stations, etc.), recharge the electric batteries of any device (e.g. smartphones, tablets, laptops, bycicles, cars, etc.) while easily controlling the whole process (plug booking, account authentication, expenditure control, billing and payment) via multiple digital channels (mobile app, web site, sms) and choosing among several payment methods (e.s. credit card, prepaid coupons, charge on the household electric bill, etc.). From the energy providers side, the plug on the cloud is a powerful tool to: reach the customers through additional channels, generate customer engagement, propose new products and promotions (e.g. loyalty programs), increase the customers perceived value of the providers services, acquire useful information about the users habits to be used for cross-selling strategies.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3078,INCE72,INCE,INCENSe,Germany,SEnerCon GmbH,pPub,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"private Public House - A social meeting point around energy efficiency, implemented with FI-WARE GEs (identity management and cloud services). A campfire for digital Tribes. Services, organisers and multiplicators have the need to communicate with a group of people (tribes). Due to social changes in society it is often difficult to set up a good communication channel to provide information and gain feedback. Classical places of local information exchange like public houses, churches, pubs, schools etc. have partly been replaced by social networks. But those are not usable for everyone, because of their complexity and distrust in the privacy of provided information. Tribes come in many colourful flavours, such as: inhabitants of a village, residents of a community, churches, sports clubs, philatelist societies, political parties, school or kinder garden parents, gay communities, travel groups and so on and so onƒ?? Typically a tribe contains around 100, up to 200 members. Our difference is Simplification! We propose a closed system with moderated tribes, primary based on emails. Sounds old fashioned and boring, but there is demand! Housing services in Germanyhave a demand for social platforms, which combines blogging/communication with energy prosumption monitoring. We will offer it and charge 10 EUR per tribe per month for commercial users (scalability: high). Primarily target group: housing services and quarter management no of apartment buildings in Germany. If we acquired 1% of apartment buildings for tribal communication, only in Germany, wed be looking at a yearly TO of 1,35 mio EUR",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3079,INCE73,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,VOLTAIDE SRL,"VOLTAIDE: EFFICIENCY THROUGH ENERGY MONITORING, STORAGE AND ELECTRIC VEHICLES",0,Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),B2B,#N/A,-,YES,OUT,Alessandro Scorcioni,"Voltaide is an innovative start-up founded in 2012 which has Energy as core of its activity. The long-lasting experience of its founders in electric vehicles, batteries and renewable energies allowed the development of 3 projects: Energy monitoring, Energy storage, and Zero-emission Vehicles. Sentry Energy Profiler is our universal monitoring system developed for the remote monitoring of electricity, gas and water consumptions, and of exchanges with the grid in production systems (e.g. PV or wind systems). Its aim is to make users aware of their energetic behaviors in order to optimize their utilities. Sentry is also designed to cooperate with Frame Energy Storage, Voltaides domestic storage system conceived in 3, 6 or 9 kWh. The cooperation with Sentry will enable the optimization of its yeld, through peak-shaving and leveling techniques. Last but not least, the design and production of electric vehicles with medium-large batteries such as buses or minibuses from 6.5 to 15 tons.",Tech provider,,0,0,0,0,0,,Hardware,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,1,0,0,0,0,#N/A

3081,INCE75,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,-,SIGA Smarter Roads for SmartCities,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"SIGA SmartRoads is an Autonomous Generation Inertial System to install on guardrails, to generate energy for use in intelligent lighting, extending the use of SmartCities also at its periphery, connection between cities, can also obtain data from the state of the road with a GIS (Geographic Integration system) + IoT (Internet of Things) so that each municipality can control / activate all available information provided by the system, since such temperature on the road, accident control in dangerous sections, jams, etc. Safety and lighthing on XXI Century roads.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3082,INCE76,INCE,INCENSe,Poland,Ecoisme sp. z o.o.,Ecoisme,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"We will provide a B2B2C service which solves problems of both householders and utility providers. For householders the service allows to reduce bills for electricity up to 30%. For utility providers Ecoisme helps to reduce power peaks and offer utility providers customers a value added service. The service provides easy, low-cost and effective solution for monitoring and saving energy at customers homes. All they need to do is to attach Ecoisme sensor to their main power line and connect it to Ecoisme cloud. The sensor measures total energy consumption and sends data to Ecoisme cloud-based system. Then the system singles out every device, plugged-it to the electrical grid to show how efficient they are. Based on this information, Ecoisme will recommend customers easy-to-follow advices to save energy. Moreover, for customers with smart meters the company will offer limited functionality of the service even without installing any additional hardware. To identify home appliances, Ecoisme uses a comprehensive technology, which combines power and spectral analysis. Therefore with the help of a single low-cost hardware device at customers homes, Ecoisme allows them to identify all home appliances and all electrical devices even with power consumption that varies. Also Ecoisme will know if customers forgot to switch off an iron or other home appliances and advise them to do so.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3083,INCE77,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,TEA Sistemi SpA,STARTHUB: Simulation Through Adaptive Representation of Thermal and Energy Urban Balance,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The scope is to provide administrators and energy utilities with a knowledge-based tool to increase urban energy usage efficiency, both for social and economic aspects, through the solution of the following issues: separate evaluation of different energy usage pathway (regulations, population behaviour, building quality)
column2: identification and optimization of actions to improve energy efficiency
column3: population education on energy saving behaviours. The solution of the above issues will be an ICT suite to integrate: (1) a real-time/online monitoring system
column4: (2) a physical model to perform thermal distribution predictions at local scale (building) and overall predictions on urban zone
column5: (3) an adaptive model for population behaviour emerging from single inhabitant rule set
column6: (4) a cloud-based structure for data mining and 3D GIS representation of energy related parameters
column7: (5) a web-based interface application (for desktop and mobile devices) for product interaction and data dissemination.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3084,INCE78,INCE,INCENSe,Israel,Ecoppia,Ecoppia E4,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Israel-based Ecoppia is operating in the solar PV industry, improving the financial payback of utility-scale installations by cost-effectively tackling a significant performance challenge. Utility-scale systems are often located in arid desert environments, leaving them prone to frequent dust storms with minimal rain to wash it away. The impact is substantialƒ??up to 35 percent lower output each year. However, traditional panel washing methods require manual labor and considerable water waste, limiting the economic feasibility of frequent cleanings. Ecoppias unique, patented technology removes 99 percent of solar panel dust daily to help system owners achieve optimal production levels year-round without any use of water. The robotic units are self-charging, self-cleaning and can be remotely managed and controlled. A video of Ecoppias technology in the field can be found here: http://youtu.be/ej0TcLi7smw Although the company is less than two years old, its product is already commercially deployed and bankable, passing rigorous stress and degradation tests and earning full certification. Earlier this year, Ecoppia enabled the worlds first automatically cleaned solar park and is now deploying its technology across five additional plants in the Middle East. By Q1 2015, Ecoppia will clean 5M panels every month. With a low-CAPEX, low-OPEX business model, Ecoppia offers an outstanding ROI of just 12-30 months, for projects with lifetimes of 20-25 years.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3086,INCE80,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,NRG.it s.r.l.,I2E - Integration To Energy,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"I2E aims at reduce environmental impact by focusing on cellular network energy consumption. A radio network operator (RNO) manages a huge number of radio base stations deployed in a national area (in Italyaround 15.000) and under different operating conditions. Using a sensors network and an advanced statistical models for time series analysis, I2Es solution is able detect an inefficiency that could become a fault and so introduce a higher energy absorption. Such analysis will be implemented in an integrated platform comprising radio network data with energy consumption time series and our energy model. It is an instrument at the service of the operating structures dedicated to the management of energy issues through the integration of all company energy information. I2E will be the first advanced solution for an energy efficient cellular network management and will be the basis for future analysis to use in distributed BS network as balancing system for a smart-grid.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3087,INCE81,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,-,Scrapycle,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"Scrapycle is the place where creative people can find inspirations, waste materials and money. Enterprises can find ideas. People can virtually discuss and work together to create and realize their projects about new energies forms and reusing materials. Mariasole, co-founder of Scrapycle, is an upcycler. She wakes up in the deep night with strange ideas about jewels made with scrap. She has an obsession: ƒ??Find materials and create in a sustainable wayƒ?. There are many people like Mariasole with huge and groundbreaking ideas, lacking of resources to realize them. Scrapycle is also for enterprises and public administration: they dont have time or creative resources, but money to invest in sustainable projects. A lot of scraps to be reinvented, a lot of new renewable energies needed ! If you are in this situation, you need our platform: Scrapycle! How to join? Collaborate with our community to create new sustainable projects, recycling and upcycling waste and old materials. We believe in a better and smart world, where people can make easily, only with a click (or maybe three).",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3089,INCE83,INCE,INCENSe,Greece,DRAXIS Environmental S.A.,Efficiency in energy consumption and prediction of demand - REDEEM,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Facilitating change in consumers energy behaviour is a decisive factor in achieving energy efficiency. However, consumers are unable to understand the impact of their actions in energy savings. On the other hand, electricity distribution companies need to understand market demands and reduce their cost. REDEEM will be an app providing companies with consumption data ƒ??collected either automatically through smart meters or manually from users- to help them understand consumers behaviour and assist both parties to contribute to energy efficiency. It will promote energy savings by motivating consumers to share their consumption figures with companies and other users, and by suggesting efficient ways to improve their energy consumption. REDEEM will build on FI-PPP technology and will integrate on the results of the CASSANDRA FP7 project, in which a consumer behaviour modelling and a measurement disaggregation methodology have been developed, and are available under an open source license.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3090,INCE84,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,-,Merinocold Ecological Refrigeration.,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"The device in question is an air conditioning / heat pump 100% free of HFCs (greenhouse effect gases). Unlike the current conditioning devices, this one totally ignores the outdoor unit, which substantially facilitates the installation and avoids neighbourhood problems and community authorizations, and does not alter the aesthetics of the buildings. Because it does not use any gas compression systems, noise is practically inaudible and thus reduces the manufacturing cost, making it more economical than any current system. This product is thermal and energy efficient, which means it consumes less power and has more cooling capacity than current existing systems, providing cooling effect more quickly. This device consumes 50% less energy than a conventional device. Another fact that differentiates it from traditional devices is the elimination of waste. This device does not need any type of waste to remove water condensation, which means easy, simplicity and economy of installation. The renewal of the air is another improvement over current systems. These facility cools the air in a closed circuit, while continually renewing room air temperature without any loss.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3091,INCE85,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Whitewall Energy and Renewable Solutions SL,Whitewall Ivy,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The product we will develop in the course of this project is Whitewall Ivy, an IoT Smart Meter device and Cloud Service for Energy Storage on Batteries. Off-grid photovoltaic system users experience a lack of understandable information about their installation performance and use, on accessible information in real-time and on alerts based on important events. Whitewall Ivy Smart Meter device monitors the photovoltaic installation performance and sends the relevant data to Ivy Cloud. Ivy Cloud offers understable information right at the users own device (smartphone, tablet, pc). 3094,INCE88,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,-,Yhiwo,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"We are developing a new wearable device (Smart Watch or Smart Wristband) who is be able to capture our micro- gestures of our hands fingers, then we analyse and compile all that information and we can use it to control different electronic device like home automation or our old TV, where you can switch the channel or sound or even, you can write with your fingers on the air and solve interface problems between user and your TV. Are you thinking about the new possibilities? All Right, then you think about the possibilities that our device will have in other sector like Health. If you had problems in some fingers or in your complete hand, it will not be amazing that you can move a bionic- Hand just using our wearable device? Just by micro-gestures. We know that your mind will not stop think about the possibilities. The idea came up about four years ago, when a well-known brand produced the Kinect system. From that moment on, a new future opened in front of us. We started thinking on the huge possibilities that this new system could offer in the future. The problem rose up in the moment we researched more about it and realized how limited it was. That is when we started considering about the possibility of developing that system and how to improve it or otherwise how to develop new and more efficient and accurate systems of gesture reception. From that moment different markets and enormous possibilities opened up for our product. The main and first aim of the project is to get the highest possible number of people wearing our smart bracelets permanently, provided that they offer different services depending on where the user may be ( in or outside home, on the car, etc.). This is why we would like our product to have an usage similar to that of the mobile phone nowadays, which is in our pocket all the ]me. The main aim is to control different electronic appliances, either at home (windows, light switchers, TV, airwrimng for different devices...) and outside home (helping us loca]ng ourselves, finding places without watching to any screen, using devices inside our car which would help tourists when in foreign countries, etc.) Currently we are developing the new technology of micro-gesture recep]on to offer the possibility of gesture-writing. The same technology, in a near future, will serve to obtain the highest accuracy on clinical surgery and even allow single-handed people to control a biomechanical hand just using our smart bracelet. The above-mentioned, jointly with Fiware technology, makes our product a good ally to the user, who will be able to profit highly from the utilities and benefits that he/she will obtain from the array of tasks, func]ons and possibilities that our product enables to use. In order to obtain the final result the product must go through a highly technologically developed process, which would require a good amount of time. Nevertheless, as we have planned it, we are in disposition of developing a viable minimum, from which to increase the amount of functions, where each increase on functions would mean a ƒ??newƒ? product for a different market, coming to the end of the process with a macro and micro gestures capable of airwrimng. The basic idea is that during the process of creation of the product, depending on when it were picked from the chain, we have a device oriented to different markets without having to generate a new product for this specific aim. This way we are enabled to reach many different markets without the need of generating many products.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

During the development our team found out new ideas not included in the existing project that can built a significant competitive advantages. 3101,INCE95,INCE,INCENSe,Romania,SENSIDEV,eQuantification,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Utilities around the globe are heavily investing in upgrading the ageing infrastructure of the grid. The imperative for this is driven primarily by regulatory requirements and the high cost of inefficiently delivering energy. The infrastructure is continuously improving, as more and more smart meters are installed. However, utilities are struggling to extract value from such systems and are exploring new ways for optimizing the performance of their deployed assets. Meanwhile, advances in the ICT sector bring about new strategies for managing and operating the advanced metering infrastructure of the grid. Data-driven analytics are fundamental to enable an optimized distribution of energy by: ƒ?? Minimizing the need for costly peak capacity ƒ?? Reducing carbon emission ƒ?? Ensuring a swift balance of energy demand and supply The chief challenge is enabling consumers and businesses to be predictive and proactive in efficiency. That implies guiding consumer behavior by means of providing recommendations that are relevant and actionable. From a technical standpoint, operating in the realm of Big Data requires a system equipped with the following prerequisites: ƒ?? Advanced Predictive Analytics: perform complex forecasting on energy consumption ƒ?? Cloud Infrastructure: secure storage for large amounts of data ƒ?? Real-time Optimization: increased speed of data processing ƒ?? Web Services Mobile Devices: user interfaces with device interoperability ƒ?? Social Media Integration: accessibility to third-party platforms We are offering a highly scalable cloud-based analytics platform solution, capable of storing and interpreting data from consumers smart meters. By analyzing real-time streams of data, we determine consumption patterns, in order to generate useful statistics reports. With the deployment of new advanced meter infrastructure todays utilities are operating in a changing environment that poses a wide variety of challenges, but also opportunities for innovation. In the face of these challenges, emerging at the intersection of new regulatory requirements and state-of-the-art technology, we propose a highly scalable cloud-based analytics platform solution addressing utility cost, reliability, efficiency and operational requirements. Specifically, the smart grid analytics solution from eQuantification realizes benefits such as: ƒ?? Improved Customer Service: offering targeted energy consumption feedback and customized recommendations to consumers
column2: facilitates data-driven programs for lowering costs and emisions. ƒ?? Maximized operational efficiency: reducing peak demand and avoiding expensive, carbon-intensive production
column3: minimizing outages. ƒ?? Effectively balancing demand and supply: real-time, granular analytics on demand
column4: consumption forecasting. It is our mission to deliver tools that transform the existing distribution systems into flexible, agile and adaptive power delivery platforms.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3103,INCE97,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,AirQ Networks srl,A cloud infrastructure for Smart Homes and wireless sensors,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"AirQ Networks is a start-up that designs, produces and sells devices for smart home and wireless sensing. Our product line-up is composed of more than 25 devices, ranging from control boards (relays, inputs, DAC) to wireless sensors (temperature, humidity, pressure, moisture soil). Our solution is currently based on an intelligent control unit that interfaces sensors and control boards. This control unit has an integrated and advanced web server, which allows the user to interact with its devices. The control unit has many advanced capabilities. It allows to set-up automation rules as well scenes, it allows user to customize the user interface and system functionalities, and so on. Our solution, however, lacks of a cloud infrastructure. A cloud infrastructure could dramatically improve the user experience for several reasons. First of all, user without a public Internet connection can control their devices when they are out of their local area network using cloud. Moreover, a cloud infrastructure can allow us to collect data coming from all our customer and to do big data analysis. We are interested in explore how to integrate our existing solution into the FI-WARE technology, to provide a powerful and strong cloud infrastructure. We are interested in evaluate FI-WARE IDAS components, which seems suitable for our current architecture. Moreover, KEYROCK component could help us in add a more advanced security authentication mechanism. We are mainly focused on two markets: 1) smart homes (home automation)
column2: 2) cold-chain temperature monitoring (in ditribution of fresh or frozen foods, medicine)",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3104,INCE98,INCE,INCENSe,Switzerland,Device Gateway SA,Universal Device Gateway and Demand-Response as a Service (UDG-DRS),0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Universal Device Gateway (UDG) is an innovative multi-protocol control and monitoring technology encompassing over 40 communication protocols, enabling cross-systems integration and ƒ??demand-responseƒ? mechanisms acting on a large set of actuators and reducing consumption when energy cost and grid demand is high. It saves energy with automated contextual adaptation to human presence. It serves also as IPv6, CoAP and M2M proxy for legacy sensors/actuators. Provided as a highly scalable and reliable Software as a Service, it enables users to control and customize their environment, energy saving and demand-response policy. We enable energy and cost saving and energy demand peak shaving. It is easily portable. Market strategy priority: 1. OEM market and utility companies by licensing our technology
column2: 2. Public administrations (smart cities) and SMEs

3106,INCE100,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Union Tecnol??gica Noxium SL,Home Energy Advisor,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Background - There is a European regulatory trend whereby energy prices will be set hourly for end customers, based on energy production for pricing transparency. Also, IoT devices are proliferating in the market enabling automatic and remote control of home machines. This project aims at providing a set of rules which can be automatically or manually followed to optimise customers energy spend. The proposed solution consists of identifying an energy measuring point in residential homes where from total energy consumption can be measured and sent over to the Fi-Ware platform on real time, where it can be processed and stored. This consumption data will be correlated with generally available data such as current energy price, Energy price in the next hour, current temp, forecasted temp and other user behavioural data. This analysis will offer a number of alarms and recommendations for customer actions and IFTTT actions over home machines. The system will also offer a forcast for the energy bill.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

It allows companies to aggregate employees per unit/facility/office and engage them in playful competitions for the achievement of customizable efficiency targets, fostering the implementation of eco-solutions, pushing behaviour change and stimulating eco-innovation More info in attached presentation",Tech provider,,X,X,0,0,0,,Software,Enterprise Social Networks,Applications,Collaborative Applications,1,X,0,Startup,150000,greenapes.com

3109,INCE103,INCE,INCENSe,Belgium,EnergyPages sprl,EnergyHub,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Project EnergyHub is a key growth enabler for EnergyPages, the B2B Content Marketing platform for SMEs and start-ups in industrial energy efficiency market globally. 3110,INCE104,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,-,When Electromagnetic Fields Meet Stem Cells ...,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"Life on Earth is exposed to natural electromagnetic ?ªelds (EMFs), and it is generally accepted that EMFs may exert a variety of e?ª?ects on biological systems. Research on biological effects of EMFs has traditionally focused on health risks. Inspired by promising recent studies on useful biomedical interactions and applications of the extremely low-frequency EMFs (EL-EMFs), we will focus on the transformation of partially Stem Cells in fully pluripotent Stem Cells by using EL-EMFs without ectopic reprogramming factors, aiming for breakthrough result in regenerative medicine, and pharmaceutical screening, and innovative biomedical technologies. The project will provide a better understanding of underlying physical and biological interaction mechanisms, related to cell development and di?ª?erentiation applications, filling the gaps in the present state of knowledge. Ultimately, the project will aim to contribute to development and optimization of innovative EMF-based biomedical devices.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3111,INCE105,INCE,INCENSe,The Netherlands,0,A FIWARE-based Personalized Building Automation System,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"SustainableBuildings makes existing buildings save energy. The vision of SustainableBuildings as set by the founders is to develop technology to make buildings aware of people and their own energy usage with the goal of energy preservation and sustainability. The developed technology helps buildings become leaner and adapts their operation to optimize the energy usage while preserving user comfort and productivity. We call this ƒ??PBAS ƒ?? The Personalized Building Automation Systemƒ?. By using cutting-edge technologies, algorithms and advanced sensing technologies, we are optimizing the operations of building automation systems.Our solutions make energy usage transparent for our customers, and also enable them to optimize their energy with respect to building operations. SustainableBuildings sells its products to building owners who are always in need of increasing energy efficiency and satisfying occupants comfort. Customers do not have to invest any extra money on our solutions
column2: instead they buy our solutions with part of the money they save by using them. The investment will depend on the situation of each building, however, the results from our success story at Bernoulli building, Groningen, show that the average investment is around ƒ?ª8 per square meter, and the savings achieved annually is ƒ?ª2.2 per square meter
column3: this suggests that the payback time for the customers is 3.7 years. Currently, our solutions have been running in operational environment at the Bernoulli Building of the University of Groningen and generating savings without compromising user comfort for over a year. Furthermore, we foresee that when porting our system to other building the maintenance costs might be significant. In other words, system management is an issue that we need to deal with. We need to scale up without introducing extra costs
column4: therefore, FIWARE would ideally resolve the issue of scalability maintenance and management.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3112,INCE106,INCE,INCENSe,UK,FULLAPPS LTD,RECYCLE2TRADE,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"ƒ??Connecting waste material suppliers buyers for open and reliable tradingƒ?. This project follows the successful completion of a proof of market study conducted for the UKwaste sector sponsored by the UKDepartment for Business, Innovation, and Skills, through its innovation grants arm InnovateUK. Recycle2Trade plans to leverage its combined waste management and online experience by developing and launching a new materials trading platform which specifically addresses the difficulties experienced by those with low volume or low value resource streams. R2T is a one stop shop to grow reprocessing sector and help the public and private sector get a better deal for the recycled materials collected from local businesses and communities. It will connect suppliers and buyers of recyclable materials like metal, plastic, and paper, and help them assess the quality of the material, as well. This independent, cloud B2B platform will allow its users to connect with each other through both an online market place for waste trade and a database of potential suppliers and buyers, created through the scanning and categorisation work of a semantic web crawler. Available on smartphones and tablets, the platform will use their camera and flash to support a basic material quality assessment feature, which will help overcome reliability issues in waste trade.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3113,INCE107,INCE,INCENSe,Estonia,Smart Load Solutions,Smart Load Solutions,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"We provide optimization service to our clients, which shifts electricity load according to the market price, increasing electricity production revenue and decreasing electricity consumption bills up to 20%. In ever-growing competition the electricity consumers are compelled to decrease their electricity bills and electricity producers want to increase their revenue. Manufacturing enterprises consume electricity based on local technological needs and do not communicate with spot market nor do they take into account the electricity price fluctuations. Small Baltic electricity producers, like hydro power plants, behave similarly. Instead of producing on full power when the price is high and collecting water into the reservoir when the price is low, they produce with constant medium power and sell it with fixed price. We provide new cloud based service to our clients, which reduces electricity bills and increases electricity sells revenues by optimizing and shifting load according to the day-ahead prices. Basically, we install our low cost supervisory control and data acquisition device into clients production line. Every day the device will collect data, send it to our server, and our optimization motor will find the best load schedule for the client. That data is sent back to the device and it will automatically manage the production line accordingly. For our optimization service we ask a marginal fee, depending on how much the electricity cost has been reduced or vice versa, how much we can increase production revenue. In short term our customers are industrial enterprises operating energy intensive machines and also small energy producers like micro hydro power plants. On later stage we would like to offer our solution also to smart home providers and different heating systems. Together with Estonian Renewable Energy Association we plan to integrate our optimization platform to a Virtual Power Plant, so we could also provide regulation service to national grid.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3114,INCE108,INCE,INCENSe,Israel,"Gizra Internet Solutions, Ltd.",Negawatt,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Negawatt is a web based application that allows to manage energy, and later will manage other resources, in an organization, from a small business, through a chain of stores, to a municipality with hundreds of sites. The system will allow to identify problems, set benchmarks, and monitor efficient usage of resources. The applications target is to help the users to improve the efficiency of energy use thourgh constant monitoring and analysing of usage data. It will support management of renewable energy resources, and ultimately aims at micro-grid management. The current business focus is on energy efficiency market, and the income model is through service payment. We have several customers in Israel that are using the system for energy monitoring.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3115,INCE109,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,TESEO s.r.l.,SMART-AD,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Despite all of the advances in building/industrial design and technology, many common operational problems ƒ?? deteriorated equipment, improperly calibrated sensors, poor installations, and poor past maintenance practices ƒ?? go undetected. The drawback is that the unbiased plant lead to high energy use in whole-building/plant: demonstration programs predicted in a range of commercial and institutional facilities have shown an average reduction in overall energy use of 15 percent in plant maintained correctly. So technicians involved in advance diagnostics and maintenance typically must use many weighty and thick manuals to find out the necessary information and procedures during their work and must constantly look at alternatively their hands and the diagnostic tools. This way of working is very inefficient and it may lead to human errors, main cause of industrial accidents (several surveys have reported statistical data showing that more than 70 percent of current industrial accidents are caused by human errors). In order to reduce human errors and consequently reduce the accidents, a recent approach in safety field is based on the adoption of the so-called proactive approach which includes primarily policies and procedures. The disadvantage of the proactive approach is, again, that technicians still continue to adopt the inefficient method (many weighty and thick manuals) in order to find out the safety procedures Our scope is to implement an advanced diagnostics hands free tool, based on a server-centric distributed application framework (SMART-AD), which merges the functions provided by Augmented Reality glasses (AR) with safety and maintenance procedures, provided by our software TESEO, by using the FIWARE Augmented Reality Generic Enabler components. The SMART-AD will provides - on demand and for every workplace, and work item - not only just electronic manuals but also hands free necessary information to operate safely, by superimposing virtual images or text onto real life, significantly reducing the inefficiencies and the risks of accidents.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3116,INCE110,INCE,INCENSe,The Netherlands,VTEC Engineering BV,Intelligent Sensor-based Water Consumption Monitoring for Daily Living Activity Recognition,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The increasing availability of sensor technology stimulated the development of smart home applications. One of the prime application domains is ambient assisted living (AAL) solutions for elderly. A sheer number of these applications are focusing on the detection and recognition of activities of daily living (ADL), with the goal of monitoring the behavior of the elderly. These applications are preferably non-intrusive in the life of the elderly. In the context of the FP7 project Waternomics, VTEC Engineering has developed a cost-effective water flow sensor with an accompanying software platform to collect data regarding drink water consumption. Next to monitoring water consumption, the obtained data can also be analyzed to detect events (e.g. taking a shower, doing the dishes), and in this way get more insights in a users behavior. This forms the basis for our value proposition. The goal of this project is to validate the developed sensor technology in a smart home context, using FIWARE technology to gather and analyze the data in order to recognize ADLs and in this way support AAL by behavioral profiling (e.g. to detect irregularities in daily living patterns).",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3117,INCE111,INCE,INCENSe,Portugal,"Geratriz, Lda",Wemeter,0,Horizontal (solutions suitable for every verticals),B2B,6,6,YES,IN,  ,"The Wemeter project fits into the context of Intelligent Buildings as major actors in the Smart-Grid with the help of most recent ICTs. Our business proposal consists on providing to building and industry managers a web-based Building Utility Management System (BUMS) that integrates all the utilities (electricity, water and gas) and telemetry data (such as weather and occupancy) into one holistic tool for monitoring, management, diagnostic and forecasting of utility consumption and production. It relies on a standard-based communications platform that enables the integration of multi-vendor utility management equipment. The project will use FIWARE enablers to combine real-time data acquisition, utility usage/production insight and intuitive web and mobile GUIs, allowing building managers to follow, forecast and diagnostic technical and behavioural utility improvement measures. The revenue model consists a fee-based service, together with consultancy and certification services.",Tech provider,,X,0,0,0,0,,Software,Services Operations Management,Applications,Operations and Manufacturing Applications,1,X,0,SME,150000,geratriz.pt

3119,INCE113,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,Ecogriddy SRL A Capitale Ridotto,Ecogriddy mini and micro smart grid control system,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Renewable energy producers cant self-consume everything. It collects data from sensors and send them to a cloud based software. This software makes real-time analysis of the grid and provides decisional strategies, increasing self-consumption. 3120,INCE114,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Instagreen SL,InstaGreen,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Instagreen has developed a food-on-demand service, using its proprietary technology, bringing the production of perishable greens, like lettuce, to the point of consumption. The greens are grown by aeroponic technology at a central location in low value real estate, periodically a cartridge with fresh lettuce is taken to the client and installed in the local ƒ??InstaGrowƒ? unit. The InstaGrow is a beautifully designed intelligent frame, which monitors the plants growth, water needs and nutrient consumption, by using IoT enablers. A more advanced monitoring takes place in the central location, where similar but more advanced IoT sensoring will be applied to not only monitor, but also adapt the specific growth conditions, such as lighting, nutrient dosage, CO2-level and airflow. Advantages for the client are minimal waste, always fresh lettuce of superior quality, reduced carbon footprint, very local produce.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3122,INCE116,INCE,INCENSe,Denmark,Nordic IoT Cluster,Aquamatic,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Global population growth projections of 2ƒ??3 billion people over the next 40 years is going to increase the demand for clean fresh water extensively. As clean fresh water is a scarce resource it is critical to secure a fresh water purification solution that is energy and economically efficient. Aquamatic is a proven high quality water-purification technology, which uses UV light to purify the water. The very nature of the Aquamatic core technology enables a high degree of flexibility in design and implementation. Consequently, Aquamatic is able to meet the needs for small water-purification challenges as well medium/large-scale water purification challenges. There is a significant potential in merging Aquamatics core technologies with the Internet of Things (IoT) functionalities that are remotely and produce data that contribute to highly intelligent and innovative products. The merger between the core Aquamatic technologies and the emerging IoT features will contribute to a highly efficient solution that outperform the competition.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3124,INCE118,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,"Valor, Desarrollo e innovacion S.L.",Helki,0,"Consumer energy & home automation, ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING SUPPLY, WATER SUPPLY
column2: SEWERAGE, WASTE MANAGEMENT AND REMEDIATION ACTIVITIES, TELECOM AND MEDIA",B2B/B2C,#N/A,-,YES,OUT,Sergio Alvarez Menendez,"Helki is a complete SmartHome solution that allows consumers to reduce and manage their electricity and heating consumption as well as allows appliances control. Usability, proactive intelligence, attractive designs, cost effectiveness, easy installation and promotion are the main differentiations. It is a solution designed and manufactured in order to be a mass selling product, instead of the traditional high cost home automation systems. The short term business consists in selling devices (Smart Thermostats, power meters, smart plugs). Also there is a great potential using the platform as a gateway between the homes and the Smart Grid allowing demand response services, electric vehicles remote controlled charging services or renewable micro generation remote management. column1: 3125,INCE119,INCE,INCENSe,Belgium,LOGINCO BVBA,INESS = Integrated Network for Energy Steering and Storage,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Today Energy supply, especially electricity, is 100% DEMAND driven. It means purchase + production = DEMAND. As demand is fluctuating upon need, production has to match the fluctuation, making complex puzzle of green (also fluctuating) and grey production management. Trading becomes the standard method to balance to demand as grey production units lack the necessary flexibility. Household electricity demand is up to 20% of total electricity consumption and co-deciding the needed peakdemand (= needed production and trading capacity) especially on winter evenings. As such, residential consumption is the perfect mediator to balance and optimise electricity demand and availability reducing risk for unbalance cost, reducing risk of saturated networks and grid failures. INESS is the hybrid energy storage system allowing households to go off the grid up to 16 hours a day and / or to minimize demand especially during peak moments. The INESS systems are especially designed to operate within an (ICT) network, sharing important electricity management information with other energy market players. Also the network will allow to accumulate the total battery capacity and to manage portion of the capacity by third party. LOGINCO is the R and D company to develop the INESS system AND the network to connect the systems. LOGINCO will team up with an industrial or financial partner to industrialise INESS (JV). LOGINCO income will come from a commission on sales of the INESS systems and the sales of information and connectivity to the residential systems. System introduction is planned 2016. The ICT network should be operational by 2018.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3127,INCE121,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Wellness Smart Cities,FiSAVE : A FiWare based application for smart energy management using existing smart meters,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"In recent years the energy sector has undergone profound technological renovations. To date, Member States have committed close to 200 million smart meters for electricity. Currently smart meters are in under-use
column2: consumption data is remotely acquired several times a day but the bill is issued monthly. This intermediate data hides an extraordinary value to the consumer and holds the key to the smart management. WSC (2014) has developed WeSave Energy Monitor gathering high success among large consumers but the need of hardware is constraining a widespread adoption. FiSAVE aims at developing and demonstrating a FIWARE decision support system for energy consumers to allow a smart management based on real time energy pricing. FISAVE is sold to utilities to offer their customers demand-response tools bringing energy and money savings, boosting peak-shaving, resulting in a more resilient grid and secure supply. FISAVE provides a competitive advantage to utilities improving customer awareness, communication and care.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3128,INCE122,INCE,INCENSe,Israel,NJOIN Research Ltd,"n-Join, Production intelligence in a plug and play solution",0,MANUFACTURING,B2B,5,2,YES,IN,Elkana Porag,"n-Join leverages big data and machine learning algorithms to make production facilities more flexible, maximize their output and reduce their environmental signature. The 1st iteration of the technology arrives as a plug play on-premise appliance capable of autonomous analysis of a plants operations, continually learning and evolving with changes in the production lines. Building upon a low- level holistic view of the lines, the system derives contextual insights, empowering every factory to become a smart factory. Currently in the beta phase, n-Joins revenue model will be based on a subscription service, while physical sensors will be supplied free of charge. Exact pricing will be based on a combination of factors including number of sites and each sites complexity level. Sales and distribution is mainly done by territory based local partners who will be entitled to a share of the revenue stream generated by the clients subscription.",Tech provider,,0,0,0,X,0,,Hardware,Production Planning,Applications,Supply Chain Management (SCM) Applications,1,0,0,Startup,150000,n-join.com

3129,INCE123,INCE,INCENSe,Norway,Ocean Visuals AS,Ocean Visuals,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Ocean Visuals is developing sensor technology and software for detecting oil spills and industrial water pollution in sea environment. The sensor is based on hyperspectral LiDAR technology is based on 25 years of research by Estonian research and development company LDI Innovation and is patent-pending. The software consists of on-site graphical user interface, cloud database for sensor data storage and end-user applications. The data communication is over modem, capable of GDMA (ICE) and GSM connections. Current technology is applicable in the top-sea segment, i.e. for mounting the sensor on the side of ships, oil drilling platforms and off-loading bouys. Long-term vision is to enter into sub-sea segement (installations to deepwater drilling facilities and off-loading buoys) and in-air segment on UAVs/planes/helicopters for a more comprehensive overview of the target area.Target segments for the product are oil companies, operators, environmental agencies and coastal administrations. First entry market is Norway, as we have established relationships with 2 of the largest oil exploration and drilling companies in the world. The basic functionalities of the solution have been tested during a pilot project in Norwegian waters. Ocean Visuals is making money by licensing the software with sales of the hardware into a solution bundle and recurring maintenance fees.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3130,INCE124,INCE,INCENSe,Belgium,Createlli NV,SMEeFF,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"SMEeFF (from SME efficiency) is a disruptive innovation to drastically improve environmental performance and energy efficiency of thousands of SMEs. It is innovative in (1) the access to SMEs through SME associations (2) the communication to SMEs in their own language and with peer benchmarking (3) the app being a coach to SME-owners, providing a change and results communication path far beyond analysis of current alternatives. The SMEeFF app is (a) a virtual coach for SME owners, guiding in a pleasant, effective way to build the efficient and sustainable SME: healthy products, minimal waste, low footprint, efficient, giving clients a good AND feel good product. (b) a catalyst to SME federations who use SMEeFF to guide SME owners through a discovery quick audit to alerts and opportunities, step by step change path, starting with quick wins, closing the loop by promoting results to clients so they can enjoy a feel good product. (c) a powerful knowledge and benchmark database thanks to the use by many federations with thousands of SMEs It uses FIWARE to connect other apps to the SME (thus is an engine of new FIWARE apps), and (later) to IoT to track live results.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3131,INCE125,INCE,INCENSe,Denmark,WizArts Inc.,Energetic Art,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"On the basis of a wish to reduce the energy consumption in private homes and entire cities, WizArts Inc. has developed a visual solution which aims to nudge the common citizen towards a more climate friendly behaviour to ensure a continuous focus on energy-saving actions. Energetic Art refers to a mutable work of art that combines gamification, data information and graphics. It has a underlying purpose of inspiring citizens and cities to save energy and keep focus on this subject prospectively. The piece manifests itself via two parts
column2: a private and a public visualisation of energy. The motto is simple: The more reduction of energy, the more beautiful the work of art appears. By gathering, processing and transforming the consumption of energy from a home into a small piece of art, the family are able to follow their private consumption and also compare it to others, anonomously. Rewards are earned regularly. Likewise the citys total consumption of energy is seen as a physical work of art, creating public awareness of the subject on a daily basis. WizArts cooperates with Insero: www.inserolivelab.dk. Cities can buy the concept if they wish to encourage an eco-friendly awareness of energy consumption among their citizents.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

column1: 3132,INCE126,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,Route220 Srl,EasyEVRouter,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"EasyEvRouter aims to provide a mobile app in order to enable (i) owners and drivers of electric vehicles (EV) to have a freely available online access to charging stations for electric vehicles (EVSE) offered by hospitality businesses and energy providers and (ii) hospitality businesses and energy providers to use such services and network as a new marketing and commercial strategy. Indeed, the main issue hindering the expansion of e-mobility are the accessibility of EVSE (mainly limited to proprietary RFiD) and poor information on EV charging and assistance points. Our innovative solution close this gap by providing an environmentally friendly mobility by integrat-ing Internet of Things (IoT) BLE technology with both the EVSE and Mobile app. In addition, thanks to our partnership with Plugsurfing GmbH, our solution will contribute to the harmonization of technology and standards for electro-mobility. The mobile app will be freely available for owners and drivers of EV. Revenues will come from the sale of the BLE device and integrated app to charging station manufactures and network compa-nies, from complete charging system installation to hospitality business who will be digitally pro-moted on the mobile app that will attract customers to premises, enabling e-mobility and sustaina-ble tourism. Proximity marketing and integration of mobility services will be delivered through the digital platform.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3133,INCE127,INCE,INCENSe,Germany,Gridhound UG (haftungsbeschr?Ïnkt),Gridhound Grid Monitoring Unit (GMU),0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The Gridhound Grid Monitoring Unit (GMU) project aims at providing a cloud-based, data-driven, voltage monitoring service for power distribution systems. Although monitoring is already widely used in high voltage (HV) grids, there is very limited monitoring of low voltage and medium voltage distribution systems because of their huge extent which makes the cost of applying conventional HV monitoring techniques prohibitive. Our low-cost solution would allow the Distribution System Operators (DSOs) to detect violations of system operating limits in realtime and to plan and operate their systems more safely and effectively. Our novel approach to grid monitoring is based on the concept of using data that is not directly associated with the grid topology. It can perform grid voltage estimation with very few measurements, but with increasing accuracy as more measurements become available. The project will develop a product called GMU as a cloud-based application, based on FIWARE GEs and DSEs.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3135,INCE129,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Odin Solutions S.L.,FINEST: A FIWARE-based Information Management System for Energy Efficiency in Smart Buildings,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Existing solution for Energy Efficiency Management in Smart Buildings are mostly closed solutions based on proprietary protocols that normally do not allow interoperability between different vendors and sector (HVAC, lighting, alarms). Additionally, user is not able to control and manage in an easy way the rules and automation processes to manage the efficiency on the smart building. The actual situation is of silo solutions that reduce the competitiveness of the sector and possibility of open and integrated solutions. In this project, we propose a two-fold approach. Firstly, by the use of FI-WARE solutions we will be able to open the actual Scada Web City Explorer to new sensors and actuators and increase its openness by means of standard interfaces. Additionally we propose to implement a context-aware application using data that comes from all sensors and actuators deployed in buildings to notify users about the building status, without the need of programming alerts in the Scada web of City explorer. FI-WARE provides us with scalability and the possibility of covering new kind of clients which can benefit the proposed publishing/subscribing service. Furthermore, in a near future we intend to carry out more developments of our solutions in the FI-WARE direction. Hence, once implemented the FI-WARE subscribe/publish service proposed in this project, based on the Orion Context Broker, we will implement the CEP enabler which will be in charge of performing some data processing techniques over the data flows between data providers and consumers. Once implemented the FI-WARE subscribe/publish service proposed in this project, based on the Orion Context Broker, we will implement the CEP enabler which will be in charge of performing some data processing techniques over the data flows between data providers and consumers. Thus, users will be able to receive notifications about more complex events than those based on simple data updates.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3136,INCE130,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,"Creadores de estrategia para proyectos de ingenier?ğa, S.L.",dECOSYSTEMA,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The Project consists in the design and development of an environmental variables control device, and more concretely: temperature, relative humidity, CO2 concentration and light intensity. Due to its software and hardware, this device allows reading, processing and sending the information to an internet platform (FI-WARE ), and through which the user can access and interact with the device. Thanks to its geometry and design, this device can be attached to different structural surfaces (fixed or mobile ) through mechanic unions. This is an autonomous device, which means that all components are deployed within the same case, and, having a microprocessor and a communications board it operates independentenly. This device can be applied in every place where it may be needed to take indoor environmental control measures with the aim of providing information for the optimal use of energy and other resources.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A

3137,INCE131,INCE,INCENSe,Germany,Urban Software Institute GmbH Co. KG,reCHARGE ƒ?? Renewable Energy Charging for eFleets,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Leader companies are looking to introduce electric vehicles (EVs) in their fleets to offset their carbon footprint and innovate their vehicle fleets. However, EVs are considered only locally emission-free, making EVs only partially effective as a carbon-offset measure. Also, EVs have suffered from unresolved economic and reliability deficiencies making them less cost-effective than internal combustion engine (ICE) cars. We introduce a new car-sharing business model for fleets, together with software-supported cross-fleet booking, monitoring and optimization. The solution turns EVs into a real zero-emission measure by optimizing the charging cycle to use local renewable energy sources (RES). We developed and validated an end-to-end concept with a network of experts, and gathered more than 100M data records from our POCs. Hereby, we have proven that its possible to match ICEs economics and performance, as well as dramatically increase the EVs marginal value after 3 years.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A
3138,INCE132,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Seven Solutions S.L.,Time for Smart Grid,0,"ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING SUPPLY, WATER SUPPLY
column2: SEWERAGE, WASTE MANAGEMENT AND REMEDIATION ACTIVITIES",B2B,#N/A,-,YES,OUT,Javier Diaz,"In Smart Grid gathering precise information about all the users can enhance the efficiency of the energy distribution and improve failure detection. In this framework, accurate timing (all the elements having a global notion of time) and proper timestamping is necessary. Synchronization accuracy of few nanoseconds on the distributed clocks would allow high energy distribution optimization, event monitoring and precise location of failures in the Grid. Currently, Smart Grid highly depends on GPS, used with Ethernet protocols to locally synchronize different elements at the Grid. But this makes the infrastructure vulnerable since GPS signals can be affected by environmental conditions and can be disrupted with domestic equipment. Furthermore network protocols are not scalable and degrade the bandwidth available for data transmission. White Rabbit Technology is an emergent ultra-accurate Timing Technology capable to distribute time information with high scalability over wide areas. Being an extension of standard Ethernet it can make use of existing telecom networks for distributing time (cost effective). Seven Solutions has intensively participated in its development. We plan to customize and distribute accurate timing for Smart Grid using White Rabbit devices (switches, simple nodes for sensing or additional time-specific equipment).",Tech provider,X,X,0,0,X,0,,Hardware,Network Infrastructure Software,System Infrastructure Software,Network Software,1,0,0,0,0,#N/A

3140,INCE134,INCE,INCENSe,Portugal,"Is Green II, Lda",Intelligent space usability analisys,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Lighting in public spaces, either indoor or outdoor, must be lighted. Current systems are on or off independently of space usage. Our system analyses space usability and provide lighting levels according to the real needs. The system monitors continously monitors space usability based on data provided from environmental sensors for: people presence, movement and directions
column2: radio frequency spectrum on ISM bands
column3: sound and noise

column5: noise and air quality compliance with legal requirements

The system is mainly aimed at service providers, local government and to civil protection and environmental agencies.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

The Annual European and Middle East (EMEA) market size is approaching 1 billion EUR (EUROBAT members) as electricity storage devices and can be expected to increase over many years to come. If the technical performance of batteries is further improved, the market demand will become enormous. 3144,INCE138,INCE,INCENSe,Poland,Blast Lab Sp z o.o.,EcoHome Energy Meter,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"EcoHome Energy Meters is a system of connected, hardware devices which collect data about Energy consumption in our homes. Our solution creates a mesh architecture where collected data is send from an Energy Meter to a hub - main device which is connected to the internet, and which sends the collected data to the cloud platform. Collected data are transformed to more visual form and presented on the website or mobile app to a user. Our project focuses on hardware site of a whole idea. We have developed Energy Meters which collects data, connects to each other and send the collected data to the hub. Each element (device) of the system will be outstanding quality, reliability and functionality in a cost-effective device.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

3145,INCE139,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,WalletSaver,WalletSaver,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"WalletSaver started as a comparison app for mobile tariff plans extracting phone usage directly from the smartphone (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.walletsaver_app). However we decided not to link our name to this business because we have a broader vision: we want to become the first comparison platform that provides cost-saving suggestions by analyzing real consumption data of the users, extracted directly from the source. We have an algorithm that is easily adaptable to many other sectors (e.g. kwatt instead of phone calls minutes), and now we want to enter also the Energy business using an easy-to-use device that automatically extracts the energy consumption data directly from the energy meter and sends this information to our mobile app that lets the users see in real-time how much they are consuming and suggests also the most suitable tariff plan for their specific consumption profile.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

3146,INCE140,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Sinapse Energ?ğa,Lighting Environment Control App (LECA),0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"LECA is an application intended for use in sport installations. It consists on a lighting control system that allows the installation to use only the energy that they need in each moment, having a more efficient consumption. It consists on a sensor network that receives the information from the environment which is processed by IDAS. We use the ADMIN REST API to develop M2M application. IDAS obtains the measures of sensors, sends them to LECA and it chooses which is the necessary flux to get the levels previously specified for each activity. We will have an Open database in the FIWARE lab with the parameters to compare. They were uploaded by Sinapse. It is an Open database composed by standard parameters and others acquired by our experience. Also we will upload there the real lighting levels, to have an updated database of the energy used and the lighting obtained.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

3147,INCE141,INCE,INCENSe,Bulgaria,-,SOLAR SINGULAR,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"In Solar Singular we join the large scale industrial concentrated solar power systems together with small scale domestic solar power systems. By using state of the art computer and electronic technologies we created Solar Singular Smart Mirror, Solar Singular Server and Solar Singular Network. Result is concentrated solar power system as efficient as industrial concentrated solar power plant, but very affordable and suitable for every home and business. Basic idea of the Solar Singular system is to create a lot of small, low cost, flexible distributed concentrated power installations, while at the same time they have efficiency competitive to large, static and expensive concentrated solar power plants. System efficiency, compared to most popular non-concentrated domestic solar power that exist today is also much better. To achieve our goal we created three key innovative components: ƒ??Solar Singular Smart Mirrorƒ?, ƒ??Solar Singular Networkƒ? and ƒ??Solar Singular Serverƒ?. The ƒ??Solar Singular Smart Mirrorƒ? is electromechanical mirror device with integrated microcomputer and sensors into its structure, so all around the year, location, altitude, mirror and target positions the sun reflection is always into the target. Every mirror is linked with all other mirrors into the system via the ƒ??Solar Singular Networkƒ? creating one smart structure. The ƒ??Solar Singular Networkƒ? makes the system flexible and scalable. This helps easy integration on any terrain, backyard, hill, roof or parking lot and supports randomly spreading of the mirrors if needed. Finally but not last the ƒ??Solar Singular Serverƒ? takes place, it is also linked into the ƒ??Solar Singular Networkƒ? and takes care of entire system health, status, energy balance, emergency situations, user interface, energy dissipation control, etc. Those three key components are building one complete smart system and not just offer lower energy costs for every family or business, but also higher energy independence.",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

3152,INCE146,INCE,INCENSe,Italy,-,ReConNECT - REmotely CONtrollable Nfc-Enabled Cloud-oriented Tool,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,  ,"The ReConNECT project is based on cloud computing and on two widespread technologies, WiFi and NFC. The scope is to develop a hardware and software suite to ship every electronic and electric home-devices to the IoT environment. By introducing the NFC, ReConNECT simplifies the WiFi configuration. In fact, the specific ReConNECT mobile app can automatically connect a selected target device to the home network (LAN). Using the LAN gateway, a dedicated Fi-Ware cloud service can collect data. In this way, parameters and commands to/from remote devices (smartphones, PCs, etc) can be easily exchanged. We estimate that at the beginning a ƒ??call-birdƒ? open-source hardware (a plug) will be sold mostly among tech-skilled people
column2: but the final goal is the application of ReConNECT diffusion among each building with Internet connection via a multi-purpose platform. column1: 3153,INCE147,INCE,INCENSe,The Netherlands,Hevo Power,Wireless Charging System For Electric Vehicles,0,"Consumer energy & home automation, MANUFACTURING, WHOLESALE AND RETAIL TRADE
column2: REPAIR OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND MOTORCYCLES",B2B/B2C,#N/A,-,YES,IN,Jeremy McCool,"The diverse electric vehicle (EV) market (i.e. consumer, commercial, industrial) is growing and has lead to a greater demand for EV charging. Such demand is projected to grow rapidly through 2020 and beyond. Via interviews with fleet operators, HEVO learned that fleet operators have a strong desire to reduce operating costs, carbon emission footprints, and noise pollution as well as a means of charging that eliminates obstructiveness, hazards, the inconvenience of plug-in charging, and fleet management tools. Consumers simply desire quick, convenient, and affordable charging. Utilizing magnetic resonance, HEVOs wireless charging technology system provides a non-irradiative magnetic near field mode of wireless energy transfer coupled with a mobile app allowing users to seamlessly charge their EV(s) and track various vehicle data all requiring only the touch of a finger to activate the system. Unlike other charging companies, HEVO will court the commercial, industrial, and consumer markets.",Tech provider,X,0,0,X,0,0,,Software,Customer Service,Applications,Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Applications,1,0,0,Startup,0,hevopower.com

column1: 3154,INCE148,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,Consorcio de Infraestructuras y Servicios Sociedad Limitada (CIS S.L.),MyFIWARE (www.myfiware.com),0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"Automation and energy consumption control of homes, SMEs and stores through platform which integrates in FIWARE wireless devices (also wired ones) which uses nowadays most used communication protocols allowing the ƒ??do it yourselfƒ? for: -Energy saving, consumption cost forecasts (water, gas, electricity), detection of high consumption points, reporting -Management of database with anonymous consumption statistic data and external environment data -Management based on PC, mobile and tablet with an app connecting with FIWARE, saving the local control unit (HW+SW) -Generation of data traffic (DSL/mobile networks) -The app is a new advertising channel, mainly for energy saving and automation products Making money selling: -HW (integration platform + devices) -FIWARE access -Added value services over FIWARE like energy audits -Anonymous statistic data for enterprises and public entities -Space for advertising banners in the management application In the near future, surveillance and security systems will be integrated",#N/A,,0,0,0,0,0,,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,#N/A,1,0,0,#N/A,0,#N/A

3155,INCE149,INCE,INCENSe,Spain,0,Automatic Irrigation System to improve photovoltaic cells efficiency,0,0,0,#N/A,-,NO,0,#N/A,"The aim of this idea is to improve the performance of solar photovoltaic systems that have a strong proliferation in all European countries, especially Germany, Italy, Greeceand SpainThe system is able to detect over-temperature in the cell and over-dust. When this occur the system open the necessary valve to put temperature down and/or clean the panel. Wired or wireless connections allow manual operation, remote monitor and easy integration with 3rd systems. Improving the performance of these installations will have a positive impact on the environment by increasing the production of clean electricity and efficient use of resources invested in the construction of all the materials needed for the solar installations to work.
